  2368                                  
  2369                                  
  2370                                  ;************************************************************************
  2371                                  ;*									*
  2372                                  ;*	strategy - store es:bx (device driver request packet)		*
  2373                                  ;*		     away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call	*
  2374                                  ;*									*
  2375                                  ;************************************************************************
  2376                                  
  2377                                  strategy:	; proc far		
  2378 000006F5 2E891E[1200]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav], bx ; store es:bx (device driver request packet)
  2379                                  					; away at [ptrsav] for next driver function call
  2380 000006FA 2E8C06[1400]            		mov	[cs:ptrsav+2], es
  2381 000006FF CB                      		retf
  2382                                  
  2383                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2384                                  
  2385                                  ;************************************************************************
  2386                                  ;*									*
  2387                                  ;*	device driver entry points. these are the initial		*
  2388                                  ;*	  'interrupt' hooks out of the device driver chain.		*
  2389                                  ;*	  in the case of our resident drivers, they'll just		*
  2390                                  ;*	  stick a fake return address on the stack which		*
  2391                                  ;*	  points to dispatch tables and possibly some unit		*
  2392                                  ;*	  numbers, and then call through a common entry point		*
  2393                                  ;*	  which can take care of a20 switching				*
  2394                                  ;*									*
  2395                                  ;************************************************************************
  2396                                  
  2397                                  ; 01/10/2022 - Erdogan Tan
  2398                                  ; (disassembled MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS code here with fixed table
  2399                                  ;  addresses, they will be changed to table labels later)
  2400                                  
  2401                                  ; 09/12/2022
  2402                                  
  2403                                  con_entry:				
  2404 00000700 E84000                  		call	cdev_entry
  2405                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2406                                  		;dw 0E4h		; con_table
  2407 00000703 [E300]                  		dw con_table	
  2408                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  2409                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2410                                  
  2411                                  prn0_entry:

  2413                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2414                                  		;dw 0FBh		; prn_table

  2416                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2417 0000070A 0000                    		db 0, 0
  2418                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2419                                  
  2420                                  prn1_entry:

  2425                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  2426 00000711 0001                    		db 0, 1
  2427                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2428

  2431                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------

  2435 00000718 0102                    		db 1, 2

  2470                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  2471 00000732 02                      		db 2
  2472                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2473

  2476                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2477                                  		;dw 130h		; aux_table
  2478 00000736 [2F01]                  		dw aux_table
  2479                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h

  2503                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2504                                  
  2505                                  ;************************************************************************
  2506                                  ;*									*
  2507                                  ;*	Ensure A20 is enabled before jumping into code in HMA.		*
  2508                                  ;*	This code assumes that if Segment of Device request packet is	*
  2509                                  ;*	DOS DATA segment then the Device request came from DOS & that	*
  2510                                  ;*	A20 is already on.						*
  2511                                  ;*									*
  2512                                  ;************************************************************************
  2513                                  
  2514                                  cdev_entry:	; proc near		
  2515 00000743 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2516 00000749 740D                    		jz	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2517                                  				; optimized for DOS in HMA
  2518 0000074B 50                      		push	ax
  2519 0000074C 2EA1[0300]              		mov	ax, [cs:DosDataSg]
  2520 00000750 2E3906[1400]            		cmp	[cs:ptrsav+2], ax
  2521 00000755 58                      		pop	ax
  2522 00000756 7505                    		jnz	short not_from_dos
  2523                                  				; jump is coded this way to fall thru
  2524                                  				; in 99.99% of the cases
  2525                                  ce_enter_codeseg:
  2526 00000758 2EFF2E[DE06]            		jmp	far [cs:cdev]			
  2527                                  		;jmp	dword ptr cs:cdev
  2528                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2529                                  
  2530                                  not_from_dos:				
  2531 0000075D E86200                  		call	EnsureA20On
  2532 00000760 EBF6                    		jmp	short ce_enter_codeseg
  2533                                  
  2534                                  ;************************************************************************
  2535                                  ;*									*
  2536                                  ;*	outchr - this is our int 29h handler. it writes the		*
  2537                                  ;*	   character in al on the display using int 10h ttywrite	*
  2538                                  ;*									*
  2539                                  ;************************************************************************
  2540                                  
  2541                                  ; 30/12/2022
  2542                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:0762h)
  2543                                  
  2544                                  outchr:					
  2545 00000762 50                      		push	ax		; int 29h handler
  2546 00000763 56                      		push	si
  2547 00000764 57                      		push	di
  2548 00000765 55                      		push	bp
  2549 00000766 53                      		push	bx
  2550 00000767 B40E                    		mov	ah, 0Eh
  2551 00000769 BB0700                  		mov	bx, 7
  2552 0000076C CD10                    		int	10h		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTER AND	ADVANCE	CURSOR (TTY WRITE)
  2553                                  					; AL = character, BH = display page (alpha modes)
  2554                                  					; BL = foreground color	(graphics modes)
  2555 0000076E 5B                      		pop	bx
  2556 0000076F 5D                      		pop	bp
  2557 00000770 5F                      		pop	di
  2558 00000771 5E                      		pop	si
  2559 00000772 58                      		pop	ax
  2560 00000773 CF                      		iret
  2561                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2562                                  
  2563                                  ;************************************************************************
  2564                                  ;*									*
  2565                                  ;*	block13 - our int13 hooker					*
  2566                                  ;*									*
  2567                                  ;************************************************************************
  2568                                  
  2569                                  block13:				
  2570 00000774 2E803E[0D00]00          		cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2571 0000077A 7408                    		jz	short skipa20
  2572 0000077C E85400                  		call	IsA20Off	; A20 Off?
  2573 0000077F 7503                    		jnz	short skipa20
  2574 00000781 E84300                  		call	EnableA20	; assure a20 enabled
  2575                                  
  2576                                  skipa20:				
  2577 00000784 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds	; save caller's ds for call-through
  2578 00000789 9C                      		pushf			; fake interrupt
  2579 0000078A 2EFF1E[EA06]            		call	far [cs:i13x]
  2580                                  		;call	dword ptr cs:i13x
  2581                                  					; call through Bios_Code entry table
  2582 0000078F 2E8E1E[1C00]            		mov	ds, [cs:i13_ds]
  2583 00000794 CA0200                  		retf	2
  2584                                  
  2585                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  2586                                  
  2587                                  ; the int13 hook calls back here to call-through to the ROM
  2588                                  ; this is necessary because some people have extended their
  2589                                  ; ROM BIOSs to use ds as a parameter/result register and
  2590                                  ; our int13 hook relies heavily on ds to access Bios_Data
  2591                                  
  2592                                  call_orig13:	; proc far		
  2593 00000797 8E1E[1C00]              		mov	ds, [i13_ds]	; get caller's ds register
  2594 0000079B 9C                      		pushf			; simulate an int13
  2595 0000079C 2EFF1E[B400]            		call	far [cs:Orig13]
  2596                                  		;call	cs:Orig13
  2597 000007A1 2E8C1E[1C00]            		mov	[cs:i13_ds], ds
  2598 000007A6 0E                      		push	cs
  2599 000007A7 1F                      		pop	ds		; restore ds ->	Bios_Data before return
  2600                                  
  2601 000007A8 9C                      		pushf
  2602                                  		; 10/12/2022
  2603                                  		; ds = cs
  2604 000007A9 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; 16/10/2022
  2605                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:inHMA], 0
  2606 000007AE 7408                    		jz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2607 000007B0 E82000                  		call	IsA20Off
  2608 000007B3 7503                    		jnz	short corig13_popf_retf
  2609 000007B5 E80F00                  		call	EnableA20
  2610                                  corig13_popf_retf:			
  2611 000007B8 9D                      		popf
  2612 000007B9 CB                      		retf
  2613                                  
  2614                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2615                                  
  2616                                  ; BIOSDATA:07BBh (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  2617                                  ; BIOSDATA:07BBh (MSDOS 5.0, IO.SYS) ; 16/10/2022
  2618                                  
  2619 000007BA 9000FFFF                HiMem:		dd 0FFFF0090h		
  2620 000007BE 80000000                LoMem:		dd 80h

  2625                                  
  2626                                  
  2627                                  ;************************************************************************
  2628                                  ;*									*
  2629                                  ;*	EnsureA20On - ensure that a20 is enabled if we're running	*
  2630                                  ;*	  in the HMA before interrupt entry points into Bios_Code	*
  2631                                  ;*									*
  2632                                  ;************************************************************************
  2633                                  
  2634                                  EnsureA20On:	; proc near		
  2635 000007C2 E80E00                  		call	IsA20Off
  2636                                  		;jz	short EnableA20
  2637                                  		;retn
  2638                                  		; 18/12/2022
  2639 000007C5 750B                    		jnz	short A20On_retn	
  2640                                  
  2641                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2642                                  
  2643                                  
  2644                                  EnableA20:	; proc near		
  2645 000007C7 50                      		push	ax
  2646 000007C8 53                      		push	bx
  2647 000007C9 B405                    		mov	ah, 5	 ; local enable a20
  2648                                  		;call	cs:xms
  2649 000007CB 2EFF1E[0E00]            		call	far [cs:xms] ; 16/10/2022
  2650 000007D0 5B                      		pop	bx
  2651 000007D1 58                      		pop	ax
  2652                                  A20On_retn:	; 18/12/2022	
  2653 000007D2 C3                      		retn
  2654                                  
  2655                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2656                                  
  2657                                  
  2658                                  IsA20Off:	; proc near		
  2659 000007D3 1E                      		push	ds
  2660 000007D4 06                      		push	es
  2661 000007D5 51                      		push	cx
  2662 000007D6 56                      		push	si
  2663 000007D7 57                      		push	di
  2664 000007D8 2EC536[BA07]            		lds	si, [cs:HiMem]
  2665 000007DD 2EC43E[BE07]            		les	di, [cs:LoMem]
  2666 000007E2 B90800                  		mov	cx, 8
  2667 000007E5 F3A7                    		repe cmpsw
  2668 000007E7 5F                      		pop	di
  2669 000007E8 5E                      		pop	si
  2670 000007E9 59                      		pop	cx
  2671 000007EA 07                      		pop	es
  2672 000007EB 1F                      		pop	ds
  2673 000007EC C3                      		retn
  2674                                  
  2675                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2676                                  
  2677                                  DisableA20:
  2678 000007ED 50                      		push	ax
  2679 000007EE 53                      		push	bx
  2680 000007EF B406                    		mov	ah, 6		; local disable A20
  2681 000007F1 2EFF1E[0E00]            		call	far [cs:xms]
  2682                                  		;call	cs:xms
  2683 000007F6 5B                      		pop	bx
  2684 000007F7 58                      		pop	ax
  2685 000007F8 C3                      		retn
  2686                                  
  2687                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2688                                  
  2689                                  ;************************************************************************
  2690                                  ;*									*
  2691                                  ;*	int19 - bootstrap interrupt -- we must restore a bunch of the	*
  2692                                  ;*	  interrupt vectors before resuming the original int19 code	*
  2693                                  ;*									*
  2694                                  ;************************************************************************
  2695                                  
  2696                                  int19:					
  2697 000007F9 0E                      		push	cs
  2698 000007FA 1F                      		pop	ds
  2699 000007FB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; 16/10/2022
  2700 000007FF B90500                  		mov	cx, 5		; NUMROMVECTORS
  2701                                  		;mov	si, offset RomVectors
  2702 00000802 BE[0001]                		mov	si, RomVectors	; 19/10/2022
  2703                                  next_int:				
  2704 00000805 AC                      		lodsb			; get int number
  2705 00000806 98                      		cbw			; assume < 128
  2706 00000807 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  2707 00000809 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; int *	4
  2708 0000080B 89C7                    		mov	di, ax
  2709 0000080D AD                      		lodsw
  2710 0000080E AB                      		stosw
  2711 0000080F AD                      		lodsw
  2712 00000810 AB                      		stosw			; install the saved vector
  2713 00000811 E2F2                    		loop	next_int
  2714 00000813 803E[4006]00            		cmp	byte [int19sem], 0 ; 19/10/2022
  2715 00000818 7422                    		jz	short doint19
  2716 0000081A BE[4106]                		mov	si, i19_lst	; stacks code has changed these hardware interrupt vectors
  2717                                  					; stkinit in sysinit1 will initialize int19oldxx values
  2718 0000081D B90E00                  		mov	cx, 14		; num_i19
  2719                                  
  2720                                  i19_restore_loop:

  2722 00000821 98                      		cbw			; assume < 128
  2723 00000822 89C7                    		mov	di, ax

  2725 00000825 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; save it
  2726 00000827 AD                      		lodsw

  2728 0000082B 740D                    		jz	short i19_restor_1 ; opt no need to check selector too
  2729 0000082D 83F8FF                  		cmp	ax, 0FFFFh	; opt 0ffffh is	unlikely offset
  2730 00000830 7408                    		jz	short i19_restor_1
  2731 00000832 01FF                    		add	di, di
  2732 00000834 01FF                    		add	di, di
  2733 00000836 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
  2734 00000837 AB                      		stosw
  2735 00000838 93                      		xchg	ax, bx
  2736 00000839 AB                      		stosw			; put the vector back

  2751                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================

  2753                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2754                                  ;
  2755                                  ; procedure : int15
  2756                                  ;
  2757                                  ;		Int15 handler for recognizing ctrl-alt-del seq
  2758                                  ;		If it recognizes ctrl-alt-del and if DOS was
  2759                                  ;		is running high, it Erases the VDISK header
  2760                                  ;		present at 1MB boundary
  2761                                  ;
  2762                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2763                                  
  2764                                  ; 16/10/2022
  2765                                  ;DELKEY		equ	53h
  2766                                  ;ROMDATASEG	equ	40h
  2767                                  KBFLAG		equ	17h
  2768                                  ;CTRLSTATE	equ	04h
  2769                                  ;ALTSTATE	equ	08h
  2770                                  
  2771                                  Int15:		; proc near		
  2772                                  		;cmp	ax, 4F00h+DELKEY
  2773 00000848 3D534F                  		cmp	ax, 4F53h	; del keystroke ?
  2774 0000084B 7405                    		jz	short int15_1
  2775 0000084D 2EFF2E[0B01]            		jmp	far [cs:Old15]	; 16/10/2022
  2776                                  		;jmp	cs:Old15
  2777                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2778                                  
  2779                                  int15_1:				
  2780 00000852 1E                      		push	ds
  2781 00000853 50                      		push	ax
  2782 00000854 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; ROMDATASEG
  2783 00000857 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  2784                                  		;mov	al, ds:17h	; [KBFLAG]
  2785                                  		; 16/10/2022
  2786 00000859 A01700                  		mov	al, [KBFLAG]
  2787 0000085C 240C                    		and	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2788 0000085E 3C0C                    		cmp	al, 0Ch		; (CTRLSTATE | ALTSTATE)
  2789 00000860 750C                    		jnz	short int15_2
  2790 00000862 0E                      		push	cs
  2791 00000863 1F                      		pop	ds
  2792 00000864 803E[0D00]00            		cmp	byte [inHMA], 0	; is DOS running from HMA
  2793 00000869 7403                    		jz	short int15_2
  2794 0000086B E80800                  		call	EraseVDiskHead
  2795                                  int15_2:				
  2796 0000086E 58                      		pop	ax
  2797 0000086F 1F                      		pop	ds
  2798 00000870 F9                      		stc
  2799 00000871 2EFF2E[0B01]            		jmp	far [cs:Old15]	; 16/10/2022
  2800                                  		;jmp	cs:Old15
  2801                                  
  2802                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  2803                                  
  2804                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2805                                  ;
  2806                                  ; procedure : EraseVDiskHead
  2807                                  ;
  2808                                  ;		Erases the VDisk Header present in the 1MB boundary
  2809                                  ;
  2810                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2811                                  
  2812                                  EraseVDiskHead:	; proc near		
  2813 00000876 50                      		push	ax
  2814 00000877 51                      		push	cx
  2815 00000878 57                      		push	di
  2816 00000879 06                      		push	es

  2818 0000087D B8FFFF                  		mov	ax, 0FFFFh	; HMA seg
  2819 00000880 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  2820 00000882 BF1000                  		mov	di, 10h		; point	to VDISK header
  2821 00000885 B91000                  		mov	cx, 10h		; size of vdisk	header
  2822 00000888 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  2823 0000088A F3AB                    		rep stosw		; clear	it
  2824 0000088C 07                      		pop	es
  2825 0000088D 5F                      		pop	di
  2826 0000088E 59                      		pop	cx
  2827 0000088F 58                      		pop	ax
  2828 00000890 C3                      		retn
  2829

  2873                                  ;SR; WIN386 support
  2874                                  
  2875                                  ; WIN386 instance data structure
  2876                                  ;
  2877                                  ; Here is a Win386 startup info structure which we set up and to which
  2878                                  ; we return a pointer when Win386 initializes.
  2879                                  
  2880 0000089A 0300                    Win386_SI:	db 3, 0			; SI_Version
  2881                                  					; Startup Info for Win386
  2882 0000089C 00000000                SI_Next:	dd 0			; pointer to next info structure
  2883 000008A0 00000000                		dd 0			; a field we don't need
  2884 000008A4 00000000                		dd 0			; another field	we don't need
  2885 000008A8 [AC08]                  SI_Instance:	dw Instance_Table
  2886 000008AA 7000                    		dw 70h	; Bios_Data	; far pointer to instance table
  2887                                  
  2888                                  ; This table gives Win386 the instance data in the BIOS and ROM-BIOS data
  2889                                  ; areas. Note that the address and size of the hardware stacks must
  2890                                  ; be calculated and inserted at boot time.
  2891                                  
  2892 000008AC 00005000                Instance_Table:	dw 0, 50h		; print	screen status...
  2893 000008B0 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2	bytes
  2894 000008B2 0E005000                		dw 0Eh,	50h		; ROM Basic data...
  2895 000008B6 1400                    		dw 14h			; ... 14H bytes
  2896 000008B8 [0C00]                  		dw altah		; a con	device buffer...
  2897 000008BA 7000                    		dw 70h			; Bios_Data segment
  2898 000008BC 0100                    		dw 1			; ... 1 byte
  2899                                  
  2900                                  NextStack:
  2901                                  
  2902                                  ; NOTE:  If stacks are disabled by STACKS=0,0, the following
  2903                                  ;	instance items WILL NOT be filled in by SYSINIT.
  2904                                  ;	That's just fine as long as these are the last items
  2905                                  ;	in the instance list since the first item is initialized
  2906                                  ;	to 0000 at load time.
  2907                                  
  2908 000008BE 00000000                		dw 0, 0			; pointer to next stack	to be used...
  2909 000008C2 0200                    		dw 2			; ... 2 bytes
  2910 000008C4 00000000                IT_StackLoc:	dd 0			; location of hardware stacks
  2911 000008C8 0000                    IT_StackSize:	dw 0			; size of hardware stacks
  2912 000008CA 00000000                		dd 0			; terminate the	instance table
  2913                                  
  2914                                  					;SR;
  2915 000008CE 00                      IsWin386:	db 0			; Flag to indicate whether
  2916                                  					; Win386 is running or not
  2917                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2918                                  
  2919                                  ;This routine was originally in BIOS_CODE but this causes a lot of problems
  2920                                  ;when we call it including checking of A20. The code being only about 
  2921                                  ;30 bytes, we might as well put it in BIOS_DATA
  2922                                  
  2923                                  V86_Crit_SetFocus:			
  2924 000008CF 57                      		push	di
  2925 000008D0 06                      		push	es
  2926 000008D1 53                      		push	bx
  2927 000008D2 50                      		push	ax
  2928 000008D3 31FF                    		xor	di, di
  2929 000008D5 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
  2930 000008D7 BB1500                  		mov	bx, 15h		; Device ID of DOSMGR device
  2931 000008DA B88416                  		mov	ax, 1684h	; Get API entry	point
  2932 000008DD CD2F                    		int	2Fh		; - Multiplex -	MS WINDOWS - GET DEVICE	API ENTRY POINT
  2933                                  					; BX = virtual device (VxD) ID,	ES:DI =	0000h:0000h
  2934                                  					; Return: ES:DI	-> VxD API entry point,	or 0:0 if the VxD does not support an API
  2935 000008DF 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  2936 000008E1 09F8                    		or	ax, di
  2937 000008E3 740B                    		jz	short Skip	; Here,	es:di is address of API	routine.
  2938                                  					; Set up stack frame to	simulate a call.
  2939 000008E5 0E                      		push	cs
  2940                                  		;mov	ax, offset Skip
  2941 000008E6 B8[F008]                		mov	ax, Skip
  2942 000008E9 50                      		push	ax
  2943 000008EA 06                      		push	es
  2944 000008EB 57                      		push	di		; API far call address
  2945 000008EC B80100                  		mov	ax, 1		; SetFocus function number
  2946 000008EF CB                      		retf			; do the call
  2947                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2948                                  
  2949                                  Skip:					
  2950 000008F0 58                      		pop	ax
  2951 000008F1 5B                      		pop	bx
  2952 000008F2 07                      		pop	es
  2953 000008F3 5F                      		pop	di
  2954 000008F4 CB                      		retf
  2955                                  
  2956                                  ;End WIN386 support

  3209 00001201 202020200000000000-     		db 20h,	20h, 20h, 20h, 0, 0, 0,	0, 0, 46h, 41h,	54h, 31h
  3209 0000120A 46415431

  3211 00001213 FFFF                    		dw 0FFFFh
  3212 00001215 000050030002010100-     		db 0, 0, 50h, 3, 0, 2, 1, 1, 0,	2, 10h,	0, 0, 0, 0F8h
  3212 0000121E 0210000000F8

  3216 00001261 4E414D45

  3217 0000126E 46415431           
  3218 00001272 3220202000              		db 32h,	20h, 20h, 20h, 0

  3220 00001282 0210000000F8
