  3224 000012C5 4E414D45           
  3225 000012C9 202020200000000000-     		db 20h,	20h, 20h, 20h, 0, 0, 0,	0, 0, 46h, 41h,	54h, 31h
  3225 000012D2 46415431           
  3226 000012D6 3220202000              		db 32h,	20h, 20h, 20h, 0
  3227 000012DB 00                      		db 0
  3228                                  
  3229                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3230                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3231                                  ;***************************************************************************
  3232                                  
  3233                                  ; Possibly disposable data, goes at end of data group
  3234                                  
  3235                                  ;***	ibm_disk_io - main routine, fixes at rom bug
  3236                                  ;
  3237                                  ;	entry:	(ah) = function, 02 or 0a for read.
  3238                                  ;		(dl) = drive number (80h or 81h).
  3239                                  ;		(dh) = head number.
  3240                                  ;		(ch) = cylinder number.
  3241                                  ;		(cl) = sector number (high 2 bits has cylinder number).
  3242                                  ;		(al) = number of sectors.
  3243                                  ;		(es:bx) = address of read buffer.
  3244                                  ;		for more on register contents see rom bios listing.
  3245                                  ;		stack set up for return by an iret.
  3246                                  ;
  3247                                  ;	exit:	(ah) = status of current operation.
  3248                                  ;		(cy) = 1 if failed, 0 if successful.
  3249                                  ;		for other register contents see rom bios listing.
  3250                                  ;
  3251                                  ;	uses:	
  3252                                  ;
  3253                                  ;
  3254                                  ;	warning: uses old13 vector for non-read calls.
  3255                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3256                                  ;		does segment arithmatic.
  3257                                  ;
  3258                                  ;	effects: performs disk i/o operation.
  3259                                  
  3260                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3261                                  ; 28/05/2019
  3262                                  cmd_block equ 42h ; ROMBIOS DATA segment (40h) offset 42h ; 13/12/2022
  3263                                  
  3264                                  ;* offsets into cmd_block for registers
  3265                                  
  3266                                  pre_comp equ 0	;write pre-compensation
  3267                                  sec_cnt	 equ 1	;sector count
  3268                                  sec_num	 equ 2	;sector number
  3269                                  cyl_low	 equ 3	;cylinder number, low part
  3270                                  cyl_high equ 4	;cylinder number, high part
  3271                                  drv_head equ 5	;drive/head (bit 7 = ecc mode, bit 5 = 512 byte sectors, 
  3272                                  		;            bit 4 = drive number, bits 3-0 have head number)
  3273                                  cmd_reg  equ 6	;command register
  3274                                  
  3275                                  ; 01/10/2022
  3276                                  disk_status1	equ 74h
  3277                                  hf_num		equ 75h
  3278                                  control_byte	equ 76h
  3279                                  
  3280                                  ; 30/12/2022
  3281                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:12DEh)
  3282                                  
  3283                                  ibm_disk_io:				
  3284 000012DC 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h		; main routine,	fixes at rom bug
  3285 000012DF 720A                    		jb	short atd1	; pass through floppy disk calls. 
  3286 000012E1 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3287 000012E4 740A                    		jz	short atd2	; intercept call 02 (read sectors).
  3288 000012E6 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 0Ah
  3289 000012E9 7405                    		jz	short atd2	; and call 0Ah (read long).
  3290                                  atd1:
  3291 000012EB 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]					
  3292                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13	; use rom int 13h handler
  3293                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3294                                  
  3295                                  atd2:					
  3296 000012F0 53                      		push	bx
  3297 000012F1 51                      		push	cx
  3298 000012F2 52                      		push	dx
  3299 000012F3 57                      		push	di
  3300 000012F4 1E                      		push	ds
  3301 000012F5 06                      		push	es
  3302 000012F6 50                      		push	ax
  3303 000012F7 B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h		; bioseg (rombios data segment)
  3304                                  					; establish bios segment addressing
  3305 000012FA 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3306                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3307 000012FC C606740000              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 0
  3308                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 0 ; [disk_status1]
  3309                                  					; initially no error code.
  3310 00001301 80E27F                  		and	dl, 7Fh		; mask to hard disk number
  3311 00001304 3A167500                		cmp	dl, [hf_num]
  3312                                  		;cmp	dl, ds:75h	; [hf_num] ; 40h:75h
  3313 00001308 7207                    		jb	short atd3	; disk number in range
  3314                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:74h, 1 ; bad_disk
  3315 0000130A C606740001              		mov	byte [disk_status1], 1
  3316 0000130F EB20                    		jmp	short atd4	; disk number out of range error,
  3317                                  					; return
  3318                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3319                                  
  3320                                  atd3:					
  3321 00001311 53                      		push	bx
  3322 00001312 8CC0                    		mov	ax, es
  3323 00001314 C1EB04                  		shr	bx, 4		; make es:bx to seg:000x form.
  3324 00001317 01D8                    		add	ax, bx
  3325 00001319 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  3326 0000131B 5B                      		pop	bx
  3327 0000131C 83E30F                  		and	bx, 0Fh
  3328 0000131F 0E                      		push	cs
  3329 00001320 E8DF00                  		call	check_dma
  3330 00001323 720C                    		jb	short atd4	; abort if dma across segment boundary
  3331 00001325 58                      		pop	ax
  3332 00001326 50                      		push	ax
  3333 00001327 E81A00                  		call	setcmd		; set up command block for disk op
  3334 0000132A BAF603                  		mov	dx, 3F6h	; hf_reg_port 
  3335 0000132D EE                      		out	dx, al		; write out command modifier
  3336 0000132E E86B00                  		call	docmd		; carry out command
  3337                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3338                                  
  3339                                  atd4:	
  3340                                  
  3341                                  ;  new code - let logical or clear carry and then set carry if ah!=0
  3342                                  ;	      and save a couple bytes while were at it.
  3343                                  				
  3344 00001331 58                      		pop	ax
  3345                                  		;mov	ah, ds:74h	; [disk_status1]
  3346 00001332 8A267400                		mov	ah, [disk_status1]
  3347 00001336 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  3348 00001338 7401                    		jz	short atd5
  3349 0000133A F9                      		stc
  3350                                  atd5:					
  3351 0000133B 07                      		pop	es
  3352 0000133C 1F                      		pop	ds
  3353 0000133D 5F                      		pop	di
  3354 0000133E 5A                      		pop	dx
  3355 0000133F 59                      		pop	cx
  3356 00001340 5B                      		pop	bx
  3357 00001341 CA0200                  		retf	2		; far return, dropping flags
  3358                                  
  3359                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3360                                  
  3361                                  ;***	setcmd - set up cmd_block for the disk operation
  3362                                  ;
  3363                                  ;	entry:	(ds) = bios data segment.
  3364                                  ;		(es:bx) in seg:000x form.
  3365                                  ;		other registers as in int 13h call
  3366                                  ;	
  3367                                  ;	exit:	cmd_block set up for disk read call.
  3368                                  ;		control_byte set up for disk operation.
  3369                                  ;		(al) = control byte modifier
  3370                                  ;
  3371                                  ;	sets the fields of cmd_block using the register contents
  3372                                  ;	and the contents of the disk parameter block for the given drive.
  3373                                  ;
  3374                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3375                                  ;		does direct calls to the at rom.
  3376                                  
  3377                                  setcmd:		; proc near		
  3378                                  		;mov	ds:43h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3379                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3380 00001344 A24300                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_cnt], al
  3381                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 20h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3382 00001347 C606480020              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 20h ; assume function 02h (read)
  3383 0000134C 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2
  3384 0000134F 7405                    		jz	short setc1	; cmd_reg = 20h	if function 02h	(read)
  3385 00001351 C606480022              		mov	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 22h
  3386                                  		;mov	byte ptr ds:48h, 22h ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3387                                  					; cmd_reg = 22h	if function 0Ah	(read long)
  3388                                  setc1:					
  3389 00001356 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3390 00001358 243F                    		and	al, 3Fh		; mask sector number
  3391                                  		;mov	ds:44h,	al	; [cmd_block+sec_num]
  3392                                  		;mov	ds:45h,	ch	; [cmd_block+cyl_low]
  3393 0000135A A24400                  		mov	[cmd_block+sec_num], al ; mov [44h],al
  3394 0000135D 882E4500                		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_low], ch ; mov [45h],ch
  3395 00001361 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  3396 00001363 C0E806                  		shr	al, 6		; get two high bits of cylinder	number
  3397                                  		;mov	ds:46h,	al	; [cmd_block+cyl_high]
  3398 00001366 A24600                  		mov	[cmd_block+cyl_high], al ; mov [46h],al
  3399 00001369 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  3400 0000136B C0E004                  		shl	al, 4		; drive	number
  3401 0000136E 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh
  3402 00001371 08E0                    		or	al, ah		; head number
  3403 00001373 0CA0                    		or	al, 0A0h	; set ecc and 512 bytes	per sector
  3404                                  		;mov	ds:47h,	al	; [cmd_block+drv_head]
  3405 00001375 A24700                  		mov	[cmd_block+drv_head], al  ; mov [47h],al 
  3406 00001378 06                      		push	es
  3407 00001379 53                      		push	bx
  3408 0000137A 0E                      		push	cs
  3409 0000137B E85C00                  		call	get_vec
  3410 0000137E 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+fdp_precomp]
  3411                                  			 		; write pre-comp from disk parameters
  3412 00001382 C1E802                  		shr	ax, 2
  3413                                  		;mov	ds:42h,	al	; [cmd_block+pre_comp]
  3414 00001385 A24200                  		mov	[cmd_block+pre_comp], al ; mov [42h],al
  3415                                  					; only use low part
  3416 00001388 268A4708                		mov	al, [es:bx+8]	; [es:bx+fdp_control]
  3417                                  					; control byte modifier
  3418 0000138C 5B                      		pop	bx
  3419 0000138D 07                      		pop	es
  3420                                  		;mov	ah, ds:76h	; [control_byte]
  3421 0000138E 8A267600                		mov	ah, [control_byte] ; mov ah,[76h]
  3422 00001392 80E4C0                  		and	ah, 0C0h	; keep disable retry bits	
  3423 00001395 08C4                    		or	ah, al
  3424                                  		;mov	ds:76h,	ah
  3425 00001397 88267600                		mov	[control_byte], ah ; mov [76h],al
  3426 0000139B C3                      		retn
  3427                                  
  3428                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3429                                  
  3430                                  ;***	docmd - carry out read operation to at hard disk
  3431                                  ;
  3432                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = address for read in data.
  3433                                  ;		cmd_block set up for disk read.
  3434                                  ;
  3435                                  ;	exit:	buffer at (es:bx) contains data read.
  3436                                  ;		disk_status1 set to error code (0 if success).
  3437                                  ;
  3438                                  ;	
  3439                                  ;
  3440                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx), (dx), (di) destroyed.
  3441                                  ;		no check is made for dma boundary overrun.
  3442                                  ;
  3443                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3444                                  ;		performs disk input.
  3445                                  
  3446                                  docmd:		; proc near		
  3447 0000139C 89DF                    		mov	di, bx
  3448 0000139E 0E                      		push	cs
  3449 0000139F E84000                  		call	command
  3450 000013A2 7535                    		jnz	short doc3
  3451                                  doc1:					
  3452 000013A4 0E                      		push	cs
  3453 000013A5 E84200                  		call	waitt		; wait for controller to complete read
  3454 000013A8 752F                    		jnz	short doc3
  3455 000013AA B90001                  		mov	cx, 256		; 256 words per sector
  3456 000013AD BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3457 000013B0 FC                      		cld			; string op goes up
  3458 000013B1 FA                      		cli			; disable interrupts
  3459                                  					; (bug was forgetting this)
  3460                                  
  3461                                  ;	M062 -- some of these old machines have intermittent failures
  3462                                  ;		when the read is done at full speed. Instead of using
  3463                                  ;		a string rep instruction, we'll use a loop. There is
  3464                                  ;		a slight performance hit, but it only affects these
  3465                                  ;		very old machines with an exact date code match, and
  3466                                  ;		it makes said machines more reliable
  3467                                  ;
  3468                                  ;M062	repz	insw		;read in sector
  3469                                  
  3470                                  rsct_loop:				
  3471 000013B2 6D                      		insw
  3472 000013B3 E2FD                    		loop	rsct_loop
  3473 000013B5 FB                      		sti
  3474                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3475 000013B6 F606480002              		test	byte [cmd_block+cmd_reg], 02h
  3476                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:48h, 2 ; [cmd_block+cmd_reg]
  3477                                  					; (ds =	40h)
  3478 000013BB 7410                    		jz	short doc2	; no ecc bytes to read.
  3479 000013BD 0E                      		push	cs
  3480 000013BE E83100                  		call	wait_drq	; wait for controller to complete read
  3481 000013C1 7216                    		jb	short doc3
  3482 000013C3 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes of ecc
  3483 000013C6 BAF001                  		mov	dx, 1F0h	; hf_port
  3484 000013C9 FA                      		cli
  3485 000013CA F36C                    		rep insb		; read in ecc
  3486 000013CC FB                      		sti
  3487                                  doc2:					
  3488 000013CD 0E                      		push	cs
  3489 000013CE E82900                  		call	check_status
  3490 000013D1 7506                    		jnz	short doc3	; operation failed
  3491                                  		;dec	byte ptr ds:43h	; [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3492 000013D3 FE0E4300                		dec	byte [cmd_block+sec_cnt]
  3493 000013D7 75CB                    		jnz	short doc1	; loop while more sectors to read
  3494                                  doc3:					
  3495 000013D9 C3                      		retn
  3496                                  
  3497                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3498                                  
  3499                                  ;***	define where the rom routines are actually located
  3500                                  ;	   in the buggy old AT BIOS that we might need to
  3501                                  ;	   install a special level of int13 handler for
  3502                                  
  3503                                  ; 16/10/2022
  3504                                  
  3505                                  romsegment 	equ 0F000h  ; segment
  3506                                  romcommand 	equ 2E1Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3507                                  romwait		equ 2E7Fh   ; offset in romsegment
  3508                                  romwait_drq 	equ 2EE2h   ; offset in romsegment
  3509                                  romcheck_status equ 2EF8h   ; offset in romsegment
  3510                                  romcheck_dma 	equ 2F69h   ; offset in romsegment	
  3511                                  romget_vec	equ 2F8Eh   ; offset in romsegment
  3512                                  romfret		equ 0FF65h  ; far return in rom	
  3513                                  
  3514                                  ;***	get_vec - get pointer to hard disk parameters.
  3515                                  ;
  3516                                  ;	entry:	(dl) = low bit has hard disk number (0 or 1).
  3517                                  ;
  3518                                  ;	exit:	(es:bx) = address of disk parameters table.
  3519                                  ;
  3520                                  ;	uses:	ax for segment computation.
  3521                                  ;
  3522                                  ;	loads es:bx from interrupt table in low memory, vector 46h (disk 0)
  3523                                  ;	or 70h (disk 1).
  3524                                  ;	
  3525                                  ;	warning: (ax) destroyed.
  3526                                  ;		this does a direct call to the at rom.
  3527                                  
  3528                                  get_vec:	; proc near		
  3529                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3530                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F8Eh
  3531                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3532 000013DA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3533 000013DD EA8E2F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romget_vec
  3534                                  
  3535                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3536                                  
  3537                                  ;***	command - send contents of cmd_block to disk controller.
  3538                                  ;
  3539                                  ;	entry:	control_byte 
  3540                                  ;		cmd_block - set up with values for hard disk controller.
  3541                                  ;
  3542                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3543                                  ;		nz if error, zr for no error.
  3544                                  ;
  3545                                  ;
  3546                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3547                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3548                                  ;
  3549                                  ;	effects: programs disk controller.
  3550                                  
  3551                                  command:	; proc near		
  3552                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3553                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E1Eh
  3554                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3555 000013E2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3556 000013E5 EA1E2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcommand
  3557                                  
  3558                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3559                                  
  3560                                  ;***	waitt - wait for disk interrupt
  3561                                  ;
  3562                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3563                                  ;
  3564                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3565                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3566                                  ;
  3567                                  ;
  3568                                  ;	warning: (ax), (bl), (cx) destroyed.
  3569                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3570                                  ;		
  3571                                  ;	effects: calls int 15h, function 9000h.
  3572                                  
  3573                                  waitt:		; proc near		
  3574                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3575                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2E7Fh
  3576                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3577 000013EA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3578 000013ED EA7F2E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait
  3579                                  
  3580                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3581                                  
  3582                                  ;***	wait_drq - wait for data request.
  3583                                  ;
  3584                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3585                                  ;
  3586                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3587                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3588                                  ;
  3589                                  ;	warning: (al), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3590                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3591                                  
  3592                                  wait_drq:	; proc near		
  3593                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3594                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EE2h
  3595                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3596 000013F2 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3597 000013F5 EAE22E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romwait_drq
  3598                                  
  3599                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3600                                  
  3601                                  ;***	check_status - check hard disk status.
  3602                                  ;
  3603                                  ;	entry:	nothing.
  3604                                  ;
  3605                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 = error code.
  3606                                  ;		nz if error, zr if no error.
  3607                                  ;
  3608                                  ;	warning: (ax), (cx), (dx) destroyed.
  3609                                  ;		does a direct call to the at rom.
  3610                                  
  3611                                  check_status:	; proc near		
  3612                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3613                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2EF8h
  3614                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3615 000013FA 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3616 000013FD EAF82E00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_status
  3617                                  
  3618                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3619                                  
  3620                                  ;***	check_dma - check for dma overrun 64k segment.
  3621                                  ;
  3622                                  ;	entry:	(es:bx) = addr. of memory buffer in seg:000x form.
  3623                                  ;		cmd_block set up for operation.
  3624                                  ;
  3625                                  ;	exit:	disk_status1 - error code.
  3626                                  ;		cy if error, nc if no error.
  3627                                  ;
  3628                                  ;	warning: does a direct call to the at rom.
  3629                                  
  3630                                  check_dma:	; proc near		
  3631                                  		;push	0FF65h		; romfret ; far	return in rom
  3632                                  		;jmp	far ptr	0F000h:2F69h
  3633                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3634 00001402 6865FF                  		push	romfret		; far return in rom
  3635 00001405 EA692F00F0              		jmp	romsegment:romcheck_dma
  3636                                  
  3637                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3638                                  
  3639                                  endatrom:
  3640                                  
  3641                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3642                                  
  3643                                  ;; M015 -- begin changes
  3644                                  ;;
  3645                                  ;; Certain old COMPAQ '286 machines have a bug in their ROM BIOS.
  3646                                  ;; When Int13 is done with AH > 15h and DL >= 80h, they trash
  3647                                  ;; the byte at DS:74h, assuming that DS points to ROM_DATA.
  3648                                  ;; If our init code detects this error, it will install this
  3649                                  ;; special Int13 hook through the same mechanism that was set
  3650                                  ;; up for the IBM patch above. This code is also dynamically
  3651                                  ;; relocated by MSINIT.
  3652                                  
  3653                                  compaq_disk_io:
  3654 0000140A 80FC15                  		cmp	ah, 15h		; compaq_disk_io proc far
  3655                                  					;
  3656                                  					; the following	label defines the end of the at	rom patch.
  3657                                  					; this is used at configuration	time.
  3658                                  					;
  3659                                  					; warning!!!
  3660                                  					; this code will be dynamically	relocated by msinit
  3661 0000140D 7705                    		ja	short mebbe_hookit ; only deal with functions > 15h
  3662                                  no_hookit:				
  3663                                  		;jmp	cs:Old13
  3664                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3665 0000140F 2EFF2E[0601]            		jmp	far [cs:Old13]
  3666                                  
  3667                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3668                                  
  3669                                  mebbe_hookit:				
  3670 00001414 80FA80                  		cmp	dl, 80h
  3671 00001417 72F6                    		jb	short no_hookit
  3672 00001419 1E                      		push	ds
  3673 0000141A 50                      		push	ax
  3674 0000141B B84000                  		mov	ax, 40h
  3675 0000141E 8ED8                    		mov	ds, ax
  3676 00001420 58                      		pop	ax
  3677 00001421 9C                      		pushf
  3678                                  		;call	cs:Old13
  3679                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3680 00001422 2EFF1E[0601]            		call	far [cs:Old13]
  3681 00001427 1F                      		pop	ds
  3682 00001428 CA0200                  		retf	2
  3683                                  
  3684                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3685                                  
  3686 0000142B 00                      end_compaq_i13hook: db 0			
  3687                                  
  3688                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3689                                  
  3690                                  ; CMOS Clock setting support routines used by MSCLOCK.		
  3691                                  ; Warning!!! This code will be dynamically relocated by MSINIT.
  3692                                  
  3693                                  daycnt_to_day:	; proc far
  3694                                  
  3695                                  ; entry: [daycnt] = number of days since 1-1-80
  3696                                  ;
  3697                                  ; return: ch - century in bcd
  3698                                  ;	  cl - year in bcd
  3699                                  ;	  dh - month in bcd
  3700                                  ;	  dl - day in bcd
  3701                                  
  3702                                  		; 16/10/2022		
  3703 0000142C 2EFF36[F004]            		push	word [cs:daycnt] ; save daycnt
  3704 00001431 2E813E[F004]891C        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3705                                  					; # days from 1-1-1980 to 1-1-2000
  3706 00001438 730E                    		jnb	short century20
  3707 0000143A 2EC606[F404]13          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 19
  3708 00001440 2EC606[F504]50          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 80
  3709 00001446 EB13                    		jmp	short years
  3710                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3711                                  		
  3712                                  century20:				
  3713 00001448 2EC606[F404]14          		mov	byte [cs:base_century], 20
  3714 0000144E 2EC606[F504]00          		mov	byte [cs:base_year], 0
  3715 00001454 2E812E[F004]891C        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 7305	; (365*20+(20/4))
  3716                                  					; adjust daycnt
  3717                                  years:					
  3718 0000145B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3719 0000145D 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3720 00001461 BBB505                  		mov	bx, 1461	; (366+365*3)
  3721                                  					; # of days in a Leap year block
  3722 00001464 F7F3                    		div	bx		; AX = # of leap block,	DX = daycnt
  3723 00001466 2E8916[F004]            		mov	[cs:daycnt], dx	; save daycnt left
  3724 0000146B B304                    		mov	bl, 4
  3725 0000146D F6E3                    		mul	bl		; AX = # of years. Less	than 100
  3726 0000146F 2E0006[F504]            		add	[cs:base_year], al ; So, ah = 0. Adjust year
  3727 00001474 2EFF06[F004]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt]	; set daycnt to	1 base
  3728 00001479 2E813E[F004]6E01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; daycnt=remainder of leap year	bk
  3729 00001480 7626                    		jbe	short leapyear	; within 366+355+355+355 days.
  3730 00001482 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	; if daycnt <= 366, then leap year
  3731 00001487 2E812E[F004]6E01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 366	; else daycnt--, base_year++ ;
  3732 0000148E B90300                  		mov	cx, 3		; And next three years are normal
  3733                                  regularyear:				
  3734 00001491 2E813E[F004]6D01        		cmp	word [cs:daycnt], 365	; for(i=1; i>3 or daycnt <=365;	i++)
  3735 00001498 7614                    		jbe	short yeardone	; {if (daycnt >	365)
  3736 0000149A 2EFE06[F504]            		inc	byte [cs:base_year]	;   { daycnt -=	365
  3737 0000149F 2E812E[F004]6D01        		sub	word [cs:daycnt], 365	;   }
  3738 000014A6 E2E9                    		loop	regularyear	; }
  3739                                  					;
  3740                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3741                                  leapyear:				
  3742 000014A8 2EC606[F704]1D          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 29 ; leap year.
  3743                                  					; change month table.
  3744                                  yeardone:				
  3745 000014AE 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  3746 000014B0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3747 000014B2 2EA1[F004]              		mov	ax, [cs:daycnt]
  3748                                  		;mov	si, offset month_tab
  3749 000014B6 BE[F604]                		mov	si, month_tab	; 19/10/2022
  3750 000014B9 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12
  3751                                  months:					
  3752 000014BC FEC3                    		inc	bl
  3753                                  
  3754                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (if DS=CS, what for CS: prefixes are used !?)
  3755                                  		;mov	dl, [cs:si]
  3756                                  		; !!! -- 16/10/2022 -- (may be to keep code addrs as unchanged/fix!?)
  3757                                  		; ds = cs !? ((ofcourse ds must be same with cs here))
  3758                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 20/03/2019 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3759                                  		;mov	dl, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:14C0h)
  3760                                  		
  3761 000014BE 8A14                    		mov	dl, [si] ; ?	; mov dl, [cs:si]
  3762 000014C0 39D0                    		cmp	ax, dx		; cmp daycnt for each month till fit
  3763                                  					; dh=0
  3764 000014C2 7605                    		jbe	short month_done
  3765 000014C4 46                      		inc	si		; next month
  3766 000014C5 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx		; adjust daycnt
  3767 000014C7 E2F3                    		loop	months		;
  3768                                  					; should never fall through loop
  3769                                  month_done:				
  3770 000014C9 2EC606[F704]1C          		mov	byte [cs:month_tab+1], 28
  3771                                  					; restore month table value
  3772 000014CF 88DA                    		mov	dl, bl
  3773 000014D1 2E8A36[F504]            		mov	dh, [cs:base_year]
  3774 000014D6 2E8A0E[F404]            		mov	cl, [cs:base_century] ; al=day,dl=month,dh=year,cl=cntry
  3775 000014DB 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3776                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; convert "day"	to bcd
  3777                                  					; dl = bcd day,	al = month
  3778 000014E0 86D0                    		xchg	dl, al
  3779 000014E2 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3780                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; dh = bcd month, al = year
  3781 000014E7 86F0                    		xchg	dh, al
  3782 000014E9 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3783                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; cl = bcd year, al = century
  3784 000014EE 86C8                    		xchg	cl, al
  3785 000014F0 2EFF1E[0205]            		call	far [cs:bintobcd]
  3786                                  		;call	cs:bintobcd	; ch = bcd century
  3787 000014F5 88C5                    		mov	ch, al
  3788 000014F7 2E8F06[F004]            		pop	word [cs:daycnt] ; restore original value
  3789 000014FC CB                      		retf
  3790                                  
  3791                                  enddaycnttoday:	
  3792                                  
  3793                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3794                                  
  3795                                  bin_to_bcd:	; proc far		; real time clock support
  3796                                  
  3797                                  ;convert a binary input in al (less than 63h or 99 decimal)
  3798                                  ;into a bcd value in al. ah destroyed.	
  3799                                  		
  3800 000014FD 51                      		push	cx		
  3801 000014FE D40A                    		aam			; al=high digit	bcd, ah=low digit bc
  3802 00001500 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  3803 00001502 D2E4                    		shl	ah, cl		; mov the high digit to	high nibble
  3804 00001504 08E0                    		or	al, ah
  3805 00001506 59                      		pop	cx
  3806 00001507 CB                      		retf
  3807                                  
  3808                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3809                                  
  3810                                  ; the k09 requires the routines for reading the clock because of the suspend/
  3811                                  ; resume facility. the system clock needs to be reset after resume.
  3812                                  
  3813                                  ; the following routine is executed at resume time when the system
  3814                                  ; powered on after suspension. it reads the real time clock and
  3815                                  ; resets the system time and date, and then irets.
  3816                                  
  3817                                  ; warning!!! this code will be dynamically relocated by msinit.
  3818                                  
  3819                                  int6c:					
  3820 00001508 0E                      		push	cs
  3821 00001509 1F                      		pop	ds
  3822 0000150A 8F06[BB06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr]	; pop off return address
  3823 0000150E 8F06[BD06]              		pop	word [int6c_ret_addr+2]
  3824 00001512 9D                      		popf
  3825 00001513 E81300                  		call	read_real_date	; get the date from the clock
  3826 00001516 FA                      		cli
  3827 00001517 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si	; update dos copy of date
  3828 0000151B FB                      		sti
  3829 0000151C E8CB00                  		call	read_real_time	; get the time from the	rtc
  3830 0000151F FA                      		cli
  3831 00001520 B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  3832 00001522 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  3833                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  3834                                  					; Return: time of day set
  3835 00001524 FB                      		sti
  3836                                  		;jmp	int6c_ret_addr	; long jump
  3837                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3838 00001525 FF2E[BB06]              		jmp	far [int6c_ret_addr] ; long jump
  3839                                  
  3840                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3841                                  
  3842                                  ;   read_real_date reads real-time clock for date and returns the number
  3843                                  ;   of days elapsed since 1-1-80 in si
  3844                                  
  3845                                  read_real_date:	; proc near		
  3846 00001529 50                      		push	ax
  3847 0000152A 51                      		push	cx
  3848 0000152B 52                      		push	dx
  3849 0000152C 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; throw	away clock roll	over
  3850 0000152E CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  3851                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  3852                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  3853                                  					; midnight
  3854                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  3855 00001530 5A                      		pop	dx
  3856 00001531 59                      		pop	cx
  3857 00001532 58                      		pop	ax
  3858 00001533 50                      		push	ax
  3859 00001534 53                      		push	bx
  3860 00001535 51                      		push	cx
  3861 00001536 52                      		push	dx
  3862 00001537 2EC706[DB06]0100        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 1
  3863                                  					; REAL TIME CLOCK ERROR	FLAG (+1 DAY)
  3864 0000153E B404                    		mov	ah, 4
  3865 00001540 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ DATE FROM REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  3866                                  					; Return: DL = day in BCD
  3867                                  					; DH = month in	BCD
  3868                                  					; CL = year in BCD
  3869                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  3870 00001542 7303                    		jnb	short read_ok
  3871 00001544 E99300                  		jmp	r_d_ret
  3872                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3873                                  
  3874                                  read_ok:				
  3875 00001547 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch
  3876 0000154B 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl
  3877 0000154F 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh
  3878 00001553 8816[C206]              		mov	[bin_date_time+3], dl
  3879 00001557 2EC706[DB06]0200        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 2 ; READ OF R-T CLOCK SUCCESSFUL
  3880 0000155E E84201                  		call	bcd_verify	; verify bcd values in range
  3881 00001561 7277                    		jb	short r_d_ret	;  some	value out of range
  3882 00001563 2EC706[DB06]0300        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 3
  3883 0000156A E8E600                  		call	date_verify
  3884 0000156D 726B                    		jb	short r_d_ret
  3885 0000156F 2EC706[DB06]0000        		mov	word [cs:daycnt2], 0
  3886 00001576 E8AA00                  		call	in_bin
  3887 00001579 A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1]
  3888 0000157C 98                      		cbw
  3889 0000157D 803E[BF06]14            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20 ; 20th century?
  3890 00001582 7503                    		jnz	short century_19 ; no
  3891 00001584 83C064                  		add	ax, 100		; add in a century
  3892                                  
  3893                                  century_19:				
  3894 00001587 83E850                  		sub	ax, 80		; subtract off 1-1-80
  3895 0000158A B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; leap year every 4
  3896 0000158C F6F1                    		div	cl		; al= #	leap year blocks, ah= remainder
  3897 0000158E 88E3                    		mov	bl, ah		; save odd years
  3898 00001590 98                      		cbw			; zero ah
  3899 00001591 B9B505                  		mov	cx, 1461	; 366+(3*365)
  3900                                  					; # of days in leap year blocks
  3901 00001594 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  3902 00001596 2EA3[DB06]              		mov	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; SAVE COUNT OF DAYS
  3903 0000159A 88D8                    		mov	al, bl		; get odd years	count
  3904 0000159C 98                      		cbw
  3905 0000159D 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  3906 0000159F 740C                    		jz	short leap_year
  3907 000015A1 B96D01                  		mov	cx, 365		; days in year
  3908 000015A4 F7E1                    		mul	cx
  3909 000015A6 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax ; ADD ON DAYS IN ODD YEARS
  3910 000015AB EB07                    		jmp	short leap_adjustment ;	account	for leap year
  3911                                  					; possibly account for a leap day
  3912                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3913                                  
  3914                                  leap_year:				
  3915 000015AD 803E[C106]02            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 2 ; is	month february?
  3916 000015B2 7605                    		jbe	short no_leap_adjustment ; jan or feb. no leap day yet.
  3917                                  leap_adjustment:			
  3918 000015B4 2EFF06[DB06]            		inc	word [cs:daycnt2] ; account for leap day
  3919                                  no_leap_adjustment:			
  3920 000015B9 8A0E[C206]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+3] ; get days of month
  3921 000015BD 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  3922 000015BF 49                      		dec	cx		; because of offset from day 1,	not day	0
  3923 000015C0 2E010E[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], cx ; GET DAYS IN MONTHS PRECEEDING
  3924 000015C5 8A0E[C106]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+2] ; get month
  3925 000015C9 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
  3926 000015CB 49                      		dec	cx		; january starts at offset 0
  3927 000015CC D1E1                    		shl	cx, 1		; word offset
  3928 000015CE BE[C306]                		mov	si, month_table
  3929 000015D1 01CE                    		add	si, cx
  3930                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3931                                  		; ds must be same with cs here, if so..
  3932                                  		; what for cs: prefixes are used !?)
  3933                                  		; mov	ax, [cs:si]
  3934                                  		; mov	ax, [si] ; 16/10/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - BIOSDATA:15D5h)
  3935 000015D3 8B04                    		mov	ax, [si]	; mov ax, [cs:si]
  3936                                  					; get #	days in	previous months
  3937 000015D5 2E0106[DB06]            		add	[cs:daycnt2], ax
  3938                                  r_d_ret:				
  3939 000015DA 2E8B36[DB06]            		mov	si, [cs:daycnt2]
  3940 000015DF 5A                      		pop	dx
  3941 000015E0 59                      		pop	cx
  3942 000015E1 5B                      		pop	bx
  3943 000015E2 58                      		pop	ax
  3944 000015E3 C3                      		retn
  3945                                  
  3946                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  3947                                  
  3948                                  r_t_retj:				
  3949 000015E4 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  3950 000015E6 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  3951 000015E8 EB38                    		jmp	short r_t_ret
  3952                                  
  3953                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  3954                                  
  3955                                  ; read_real_time reads the time from the rtc. on exit, it has the number of
  3956                                  ; ticks (at 18.2 ticks per sec.) in cx:dx.
  3957                                  
  3958                                  read_real_time:	; proc near		
  3959 000015EA B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  3960 000015EC CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  3961                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  3962                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  3963                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  3964 000015EE 72F4                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  3965 000015F0 882E[BF06]              		mov	[bin_date_time], ch ; hours
  3966 000015F4 880E[C006]              		mov	[bin_date_time+1], cl ; minutes
  3967 000015F8 8836[C106]              		mov	[bin_date_time+2], dh ; seconds
  3968 000015FC C606[C206]00            		mov	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; unused for time
  3969 00001601 E89F00                  		call	bcd_verify
  3970 00001604 72DE                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  3971 00001606 E88500                  		call	time_verify
  3972 00001609 72D9                    		jb	short r_t_retj
  3973 0000160B E81500                  		call	in_bin		; from bcd to bin
  3974 0000160E 8A2E[BF06]              		mov	ch, [bin_date_time]
  3975 00001612 8A0E[C006]              		mov	cl, [bin_date_time+1]
  3976 00001616 8A36[C106]              		mov	dh, [bin_date_time+2]
  3977 0000161A 8A16[C206]              		mov	dl, [bin_date_time+3]
  3978                                  		; 16/10/2022
  3979                                  		; 17/09/2022
  3980                                  		; 31/05/2019
  3981 0000161E FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks] 
  3982                                  		;call	dword ptr ttticks ; note: indirect far call
  3983                                  					; cx:dx	= number of ticks
  3984                                  					; (at 18.2 ticks per sec.)
  3985                                  r_t_ret:				
  3986 00001622 C3                      		retn
  3987                                  
  3988                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  3989                                  
  3990                                  ;   in_bin converts bin_date_time values from bcd to bin
  3991                                  
  3992                                  in_bin:		; proc near		
  3993 00001623 A0[BF06]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time] ; century or hours
  3994 00001626 E81F00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3995 00001629 A2[BF06]                		mov	[bin_date_time], al
  3996 0000162C A0[C006]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+1] ; years or minutes
  3997 0000162F E81600                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  3998 00001632 A2[C006]                		mov	[bin_date_time+1], al
  3999 00001635 A0[C106]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+2] ; months or seconds
  4000 00001638 E80D00                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4001 0000163B A2[C106]                		mov	[bin_date_time+2], al
  4002 0000163E A0[C206]                		mov	al, [bin_date_time+3] ; days (not used for time)
  4003 00001641 E80400                  		call	bcd_to_bin
  4004 00001644 A2[C206]                		mov	[bin_date_time+3], al
  4005 00001647 C3                      		retn
  4006                                  
  4007                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  4008                                  
  4009                                  ;   bcd_to_bin converts two bcd nibbles in al (value <= 99.) to
  4010                                  ;   a binary representation in al
  4011                                  ;   ah is destroyed
  4012                                  
  4013                                  bcd_to_bin:	; proc near		
  4014 00001648 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4015 0000164A 240F                    		and	al, 0Fh
  4016 0000164C B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  4017 0000164E D2EC                    		shr	ah, cl
  4018 00001650 D50A                    		aad
  4019 00001652 C3                      		retn
  4020                                  
  4021                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4022                                  
  4023                                  ;   date_verify loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4024                                  ;   in bin_date_time
  4025                                  
  4026                                  date_verify:	; proc near		
  4027 00001653 803E[BF06]20            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 20h ; century check
  4028 00001658 7732                    		ja	short date_error
  4029 0000165A 740E                    		jz	short century_20 ; jmp in 21th century
  4030 0000165C 803E[BF06]19            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 19h ; century check
  4031                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4032                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4033 00001661 722A                    		jb	short date_err2
  4034 00001663 803E[C006]80            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 80h ; year check
  4035                                  		;jb	short date_error
  4036                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4037 00001668 7223                    		jb	short date_err2
  4038                                  century_20:				
  4039 0000166A 803E[C006]99            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 99h ; year check
  4040 0000166F 771B                    		ja	short date_error
  4041 00001671 803E[C106]12            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 12h ; month check
  4042 00001676 7714                    		ja	short date_error
  4043 00001678 803E[C106]00            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 0
  4044                                  		;jbe	short date_error
  4045 0000167D 760D                    		jna	short date_error
  4046 0000167F 803E[C206]31            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 31h ; day check
  4047 00001684 7706                    		ja	short date_error
  4048                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 0 ; day check
  4049                                  		;;jbe	short date_error
  4050                                  		;jna	short date_error
  4051                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4052                                  		; cf=0
  4053                                  		;clc
  4054                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4055 00001686 803E[C206]01            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+3], 1 ; day check
  4056 0000168B C3                      		retn
  4057                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4058                                  
  4059                                  date_error:				
  4060 0000168C F9                      		stc
  4061                                  date_err2:
  4062 0000168D C3                      		retn
  4063                                  
  4064                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4065                                  
  4066                                  ; time_verify very loosely checks bcd date values to be in range
  4067                                  ; in bin_date_time
  4068                                  
  4069                                  time_verify:	; proc near		
  4070 0000168E 803E[BF06]24            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time], 24h ; hour check
  4071 00001693 770C                    		ja	short time_error
  4072 00001695 803E[C006]59            		cmp	byte [bin_date_time+1], 59h ; minute check
  4073 0000169A 7705                    		ja	short time_error
  4074                                  		; 12/12/2022h
  4075                                  		;cmp	byte [bin_date_time+2], 59h ; second check
  4076                                  		;ja	short time_error
  4077                                  		;clc
  4078                                  		;retn
  4079                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4080 0000169C 803E[C106]5A            		cmp	byte  [bin_date_time+2], 5Ah	
  4081                                  time_error:
  4082                                  bv_error:	
  4083 000016A1 F5                      		cmc	; cf=0 -> cf=1, cf=1 -> cf=0
  4084 000016A2 C3                      		retn
  4085                                  
  4086                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4087                                  
  4088                                  ;time_error:				
  4089                                  		;stc
  4090                                  		;retn
  4091                                  
  4092                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E ========================================
  4093                                  
  4094                                  ;   bcd_verify checks values in bin_date_time to be valid
  4095                                  ;   bcd numerals.  carry set if any nibble out of range
  4096                                  
  4097                                  bcd_verify:	; proc near		
  4098 000016A3 B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; 4 bytes to check
  4099 000016A6 BB[BF06]                		mov	bx, bin_date_time
  4100                                  bv_loop:				
  4101 000016A9 8A07                    		mov	al, [bx]	; get a	bcd number (0..99)
  4102 000016AB 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  4103 000016AD 250FF0                  		and	ax, 0F00Fh	; 10's place in high ah, 1's in al
  4104                                  					; is 1's place in range?
  4105 000016B0 3C0A                    		cmp	al, 10
  4106 000016B2 77ED                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4107 000016B4 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4108 000016B6 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4109 000016B8 D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4110 000016BA D0EC                    		shr	ah, 1
  4111 000016BC 80E40F                  		and	ah, 0Fh		; get rid of any erroneous bits
  4112 000016BF 80FC0A                  		cmp	ah, 10		; is 10's place in range
  4113 000016C2 77DD                    		ja	short bv_error	; jmp out of range
  4114 000016C4 43                      		inc	bx		; next byte
  4115 000016C5 49                      		dec	cx
  4116 000016C6 75E1                    		jnz	short bv_loop
  4117 000016C8 F8                      		clc			; set success flag
  4118 000016C9 C3                      		retn
  4119                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4120                                  
  4121                                  		; 12/12/2022
  4122                                  ;bv_error:				
  4123                                  		;stc			; set error flag
  4124                                  		;retn
  4125                                  
  4126                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4127                                  
  4128                                  endk09:

  4130                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4131                                  
  4132                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4133                                  ;									:
  4134                                  ;	System initialization						:
  4135                                  ;									:
  4136                                  ;	The entry conditions are established by the bootstrap		:
  4137                                  ;	loader and are considered unknown. The following jobs		:
  4138                                  ;	will be performed by this module:				:
  4139                                  ;									:
  4140                                  ;	1.	All device initialization is performed			:
  4141                                  ;	2.	A local stack is set up and DS:SI are set		:
  4142                                  ;		to point to an initialization table. Then		:
  4143                                  ;		an inter-segment call is made to the first		:
  4144                                  ;		byte of the dos 					:
  4145                                  ;	3.	Once the dos returns from this call the ds		:
  4146                                  ;		register has been set up to point to the start		:
  4147                                  ;		of free memory. The initialization will then		:
  4148                                  ;		load the command program into this area 		:
  4149                                  ;		beginning at 100 hex and transfer control to		:
  4150                                  ;		this program.						:
  4151                                  ;									:
  4152                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
  4153                                  
  4154                                  ; 01/10/2022
  4155                                  ; 08/01/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  4156                                  
  4157                                  ; drvfat must be the first location of freeable space!
  4158                                  
  4159                                  ; 22/12/2022
  4160                                  align 2
  4161                                  		;db 90h
  4162                                  
  4163                                  ; 30/12/2022
  4164                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, BIOSDATA:16D6h)
  4165

  4168 000016CE 0000                    bios_h:		dw 0			; first	sector of data (high word)
  4169 000016D0 0000                    doscnt:		dw 0			; how many sectors to read
  4170 000016D2 00                      fbigfat:	db 0			; flags	for drive
  4171 000016D3 0000                    fatloc:		dw 0			; seg addr of fat sector
  4172 000016D5 0000                    init_bootseg:	dw 0			; seg addr of buffer for reading boot record
  4173 000016D7 80                      rom_drv_num:	db 80h			; rom drive number
  4174 000016D8 0002                    md_sectorsize:	dw 200h			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4175 000016DA 0000                    temp_cluster:	dw 0			; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4176 000016DC FFFF                    last_fat_sec_num: dw 0FFFFh		; used by get_fat_sector proc.
  4177                                  
  4178                                  ; the following two bytes are used to save the info returned by int 13, ah = 8
  4179                                  ; call to determine drive parameters.
  4180                                  
  4181 000016DE 02                      num_heads:	db 2			; number of heads returned by rom
  4182 000016DF 09                      sec_trk:	db 9			; sec/trk returned by rom
  4183 000016E0 28                      num_cyln:	db 40			; number of cylinders returned by rom
  4184 000016E1 00                      fakefloppydrv:	db 0			; if 1,	then no	diskette drives	in the system.
