  8035 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8036 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8037 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8038 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8039 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8040                                  prn_table_end:
  8041 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8042                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8043 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8044 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8045 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8046 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8047 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8048 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8049 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8050 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8051 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8052 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8053 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8054                                  aux_table_end:
  8055 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8056                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8057 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8058 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8059 0000014B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8060 0000014D [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8061 0000014F [2904]                  		dw tim_read   ;	435h	; tim_read
  8062 00000151 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8063 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8064 00000155 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8065 00000157 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; tim_writ
  8066 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8067                                  tim_table_end:
  8068                                  
  8069                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8070                                  
  8071                                  ;************************************************************************
  8072                                  ;*									*
  8073                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8074                                  ;*									*
  8075                                  ;************************************************************************
  8076                                  
  8077                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8078                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8079 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8080                                  con_loop:				
  8081 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8082 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8083 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8084                                  con_exit:				
  8085 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8086 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8087                                  
  8088                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8089                                  
  8090                                  ;************************************************************************
  8091                                  ;*									*
  8092                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8093                                  ;*									*
  8094                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8095                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8096                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8097                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8098                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8099                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8100                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8101                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8102                                  ;*									*
  8103                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8104                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8105                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8106                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8107                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8108                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8109                                  ;*									*
  8110                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8111                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8112                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8113                                  ;*									*
  8114                                  ;************************************************************************
  8115                                  
  8116                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8117                                  chrin:		
  8118 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8119 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8120 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8121 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8122 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8123 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8124 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8125 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8126 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8127 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8128 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8129 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8130                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8131                                  
  8132                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8133                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8134                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8135                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8136                                  ;      else
  8137                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8138                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8139                                  ;      endif
  8140                                  ;    endif
  8141                                  ;  endif
  8142                                  
  8143                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8144 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8145 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8146 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8147 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8148 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8149 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8150 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8151 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8152                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8153                                  
  8154                                  not_ext:				
  8155 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8156 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8157                                  alt_save:				
  8158 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8159                                  keyret:					
  8160 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8161                                  
  8162                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8163                                  
  8164                                  ;************************************************************************
  8165                                  ;*									*
  8166                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8167                                  ;*									*
  8168                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8169                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8170                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8171                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8172                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8173                                  ;*									*
  8174                                  ;************************************************************************
  8175                                  
  8176                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8177                                  con_rdnd:				
  8178 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8179 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8180 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8181 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8182 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8183 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8184 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8185 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8186 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8187                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8188 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8189                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8190 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8191 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8192 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8193 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8194                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8195                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8196                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8197                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8198 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8199 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8200 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8201                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8202                                  
  8203                                  gotchr:					
  8204 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8205 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8206 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8207 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8208 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8209                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8210                                  
  8211                                  notbrk:					
  8212 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8213 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8214 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8215 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8216                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8217                                  
  8218                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8219 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8220 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8221 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8222 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8223 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8224 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8225 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8226                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8227                                  rdexit:					
  8228 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8229 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8230                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8231                                  bc_exvec:				
  8232 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8233                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8234 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8235                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8236                                  
  8237                                  ;************************************************************************
  8238                                  ;*									*
  8239                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8240                                  ;*									*
  8241                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8242                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8243                                  ;*									*
  8244                                  ;************************************************************************
  8245                                  
  8246                                  con_writ:
  8247                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8248 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8249                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8250                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8251                                  con_lp:					
  8252 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8253 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8254 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8255                                  					; AL = character to display
  8256 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8257                                  cc_ret:					
  8258 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8259 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8260                                  
  8261                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8262                                  
  8263                                  ;************************************************************************
  8264                                  ;*									*
  8265                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8266                                  ;*									*
  8267                                  ;************************************************************************
  8268                                  
  8269                                  con_flush:
  8270 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8271                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8272 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8273 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8274                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8275                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8276                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8277 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8278 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8279 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8280                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8281 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8282                                  
  8283                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8284                                  
  8285                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8286                                  
  8287                                  ;************************************************************************
  8288                                  ;*									*
  8289                                  ;*	some equates for rom bios printer i/o				*
  8290                                  ;*									*
  8291                                  ;************************************************************************
  8292                                  
  8293                                  ; ibm rom status bits (i don't trust them, neither should you)
  8294                                  ; warning!!! the ibm rom does not return just one bit. it returns a
  8295                                  ; whole slew of bits, only one of which is correct.
  8296                                  
  8297                                  ;notbusystatus	equ 10000000b		; not busy
  8298                                  ;nopaperstatus	equ 00100000b		; no more paper
  8299                                  ;prnselected	equ 00010000b		; printer selected
  8300                                  ;ioerrstatus	equ 00001000b		; some kinda error
  8301                                  ;timeoutstatus	equ 00000001b		; time out.
  8302                                  ;
  8303                                  ;noprinter	equ 00110000b		; no printer attached
  8304                                  
  8305                                  ; 18/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  8306                                  ;error_I24_out_of_paper	equ 9 ; MSDOS 6.0, ERR.INC, 1991
  8307                                  
  8308                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8309                                  
  8310                                  ;************************************************************************
  8311                                  ;*									*
  8312                                  ;*	prn_input - return with no error but zero chars read		*
  8313                                  ;*									*
  8314                                  ;*	enter with cx = number of characters requested			*
  8315                                  ;*									*
  8316                                  ;************************************************************************
  8317                                  
  8318                                  prn_input:				; 2C7h:21Ah = 70h:278Ah
  8319 00000218 E8BCFE                  		call	bc_err_cnt	; reset	count to zero
  8320                                  					; (sub reqpkt.count,cx)
  8321                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8322                                  prn_done:
  8323 0000021B F8                      		clc			; but return with carry	reset for no error
  8324 0000021C C3                      		retn
  8325                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8326                                  
  8327                                  ;************************************************************************
  8328                                  ;*									*
  8329                                  ;*	prn_writ - write cx bytes from es:di to printer device		*
  8330                                  ;*									*
  8331                                  ;*	auxnum has printer number					*
  8332                                  ;*									*
  8333                                  ;************************************************************************
  8334                                  
  8335                                  prn_writ:				; 2C7h:21Fh = 70h:278Fh
  8336                                  		;jcxz	short prn_done	; no chars to output
  8337 0000021D E3FC                    		jcxz	prn_done	; 19/10/2022
  8338                                  prn_loop:				
  8339 0000021F BB0200                  		mov	bx, 2		; retry	count
  8340                                  prn_out:				
  8341 00000222 E83600                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8342 00000225 751D                    		jnz	short TestPrnError
  8343 00000227 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to print
  8344 0000022A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8345 0000022C E82E00                  		call	prnop		; print	to printer
  8346 0000022F 7419                    		jz	short prn_con	; no error - continue
  8347 00000231 80FCFF                  		cmp	ah, 0FFh	; MODE_CTRLBRK
  8348 00000234 7509                    		jnz	short _prnwf
  8349 00000236 B00C                    		mov	al, 0Ch		; error_I24_gen_failure
  8350 00000238 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0
  8351 0000023D EB08                    		jmp	short pmessg
  8352                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8353                                  
  8354                                  _prnwf:					
  8355 0000023F F6C401                  		test	ah, 1		; timeoutstatus
  8356 00000242 7406                    		jz	short prn_con
  8357                                  TestPrnError:				
  8358 00000244 4B                      		dec	bx		; retry	until count is exhausted.
  8359 00000245 75DB                    		jnz	short prn_out
  8360                                  pmessg:					
  8361 00000247 E98DFE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8362                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8363                                  
  8364                                  prn_con:				
  8365 0000024A 47                      		inc	di		; point	to next	char and continue
  8366 0000024B E2D2                    		loop	prn_loop
  8367                                  ;prn_done:				
  8368                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8369                                  prn_done2:
  8370                                  		;clc
  8371                                  		; cf=0
  8372 0000024D C3                      		retn
  8373                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8374                                  
  8375                                  ;************************************************************************
  8376                                  ;*									*
  8377                                  ;*	prn_stat - device driver entry to return printer status		*
  8378                                  ;*									*
  8379                                  ;************************************************************************
  8380                                  
  8381                                  prn_stat:				; 2C7h:251h = 70h:27C1h
  8382 0000024E E80A00                  		call	prnstat		; device in dx
  8383 00000251 75F4                    		jnz	short pmessg
  8384 00000253 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; notbusystatus
  8385                                  		;jnz	short prn_done
  8386                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8387 00000256 75F5                    		jnz	short prn_done2 ; cf=0
  8388 00000258 E96BFF                  		jmp	z_bus_exit
  8389                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8390                                  
  8391                                  ;************************************************************************
  8392                                  ;*									*
  8393                                  ;*	prnstat - utility function to call ROM BIOS to check		*
  8394                                  ;*		 printer status. Return meaningful error code		*
  8395                                  ;*									*
  8396                                  ;************************************************************************
  8397                                  
  8398                                  prnstat:				
  8399 0000025B B402                    		mov	ah, 2		; set command for get status
  8400                                  					; PRINTER - GET	STATUS
  8401                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  8402                                  					; Return: AH = status
  8403                                  
  8404                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8405                                  
  8406                                  ;************************************************************************
  8407                                  ;*									*
  8408                                  ;*	prnop - call ROM BIOS printer function in ah			*
  8409                                  ;*		return zero true if no error				*
  8410                                  ;*		return zero false if error, al = error code		*
  8411                                  ;*									*
  8412                                  ;************************************************************************
  8413                                  
  8414                                  prnop:	
  8415 0000025D 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; get printer number
  8416 00000261 CD17                    		int	17h		
  8417                                  
  8418                                  	; This check was added to see if this is a case of no
  8419                                  	; printer being installed. This tests checks to be sure
  8420                                  	; the error is noprinter (30h)
  8421                                  
  8422 00000263 50                      		push	ax
  8423 00000264 80E430                  		and	ah, 30h
  8424 00000267 80FC30                  		cmp	ah, 30h		; noprinter
  8425 0000026A 58                      		pop	ax
  8426 0000026B 7506                    		jnz	short NextTest
  8427 0000026D 80E4DF                  		and	ah, 0DFh	; ~nopaperstatus
  8428 00000270 80CC08                  		or	ah, 8		; ioerrstatus
  8429                                  
  8430                                  ; examine the status bits to see if an error occurred. unfortunately, several
  8431                                  ; of the bits are set so we have to pick and choose. we must be extremely
  8432                                  ; careful about breaking basic.
  8433                                  
  8434                                  NextTest:				
  8435 00000273 F6C428                  		test	ah, 28h		; (ioerrstatus+nopaperstatus)
  8436                                  					; i/o error?
  8437 00000276 740A                    		jz	short checknotready ; no, try not ready
  8438                                  
  8439                                  ; at this point, we know we have an error. the converse is not true
  8440                                  
  8441 00000278 B009                    		mov	al, 9		; error_I24_out_of_paper
  8442                                  					; first, assume	out of paper
  8443 0000027A F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; out of paper set?
  8444 0000027D 7502                    		jnz	short ret1	; yes, error is	set
  8445 0000027F FEC0                    		inc	al		; return al=10 (i/o error)
  8446                                  ret1:					
  8447 00000281 C3                      		retn
  8448                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8449                                  
  8450                                  checknotready:				
  8451 00000282 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; assume not-ready
  8452 00000284 F6C401                  		test	ah, 1
  8453 00000287 C3                      		retn
  8454                                  
  8455                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8456                                  
  8457                                  ;************************************************************************
  8458                                  ;*									*
  8459                                  ;*	prn_tilbusy - output until busy. Used by print spooler.		*
  8460                                  ;*		     this entry point should never block waiting for	*
  8461                                  ;*		     device to come ready.				*
  8462                                  ;*									*
  8463                                  ;*	inputs:	cx = count, es:di -> buffer				*
  8464                                  ;*	outputs: set the number of bytes transferred in the		*
  8465                                  ;*		 device driver request packet				*
  8466                                  ;*									*
  8467                                  ;************************************************************************
  8468                                  
  8469                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8470                                  prn_tilbusy:				; 2C7h:28Bh = 70h:27FBh
  8471 00000288 89FE                    		mov	si, di		; everything is	set for	lodsb
  8472                                  prn_tilbloop:				
  8473 0000028A 51                      		push	cx
  8474 0000028B 53                      		push	bx
  8475 0000028C 30FF                    		xor	bh, bh
  8476 0000028E 8A1E[E704]              		mov	bl, [printdev]
  8477 00000292 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1
  8478                                  		;mov	cx, ds:wait_count[bx] ;	wait count times to come ready
  8479 00000294 8B8F[E804]              		mov	cx, [wait_count+bx]
  8480 00000298 5B                      		pop	bx
  8481                                  prn_getstat:				
  8482 00000299 E8BFFF                  		call	prnstat		; get status
  8483 0000029C 7514                    		jnz	short prn_bperr	; error
  8484 0000029E F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; ready	yet?
  8485 000002A1 E1F6                    		loope	prn_getstat	; no, go for more
  8486 000002A3 59                      		pop	cx		; get original count
  8487 000002A4 740D                    		jz	short prn_berr	; still	not ready => done
  8488 000002A6 26                      		es
  8489 000002A7 AC                      		lodsb
  8490                                  		;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ; es
  8491                                  					; lodsb
  8492 000002A8 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8493 000002AA E8B0FF                  		call	prnop
  8494 000002AD 7504                    		jnz	short prn_berr	; error
  8495 000002AF E2D9                    		loop	prn_tilbloop
  8496                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8497                                  		; cf=0 (prnop)
  8498                                  		;clc			; normal no-error return
  8499 000002B1 C3                      		retn			;   from device driver
  8500                                  
  8501                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8502                                  
  8503                                  prn_bperr:				
  8504 000002B2 59                      		pop	cx		; restore transfer count from stack
  8505                                  prn_berr:				
  8506 000002B3 E921FE                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt

  8508                                  
  8509                                  ; 15/10/2022

  8522                                  ;********************************;*
  8523

  8540                                  					; ioc_pc

  8549 000002C8 26C47D13                		les	di, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]

  8557 000002DA 7407                    		jz	short prngetcount

  8602                                  ;************************************************************************
  8603                                  ;*									*
  8604                                  ;*	aux port driver code -- "aux" == "com1"				*
  8605                                  ;*									*
  8606                                  ;*	the device driver entry/dispatch code sets up auxnum to		*
  8607                                  ;*	give the com port number to use (0=com1, 1=com2, 2=com3...)	*
  8608                                  ;*									*

  8612

  8614                                  ;auxfunc_receive equ	2	;read
  8615                                  ;auxfunc_status	 equ	3	;request status

  8618                                  
  8619                                  ;flag_data_ready equ	01h	;data ready
  8620                                  ;flag_overrun	 equ	02h	;overrun error
  8621                                  ;flag_parity	 equ	04h	;parity error
  8622                                  ;flag_frame	 equ	08h	;framing error
  8623                                  ;flag_break	 equ	10h	;break detect
  8624                                  ;flag_tranhol_emp equ	20h	;transmit holding register empty
  8625                                  ;flag_timeout	 equ	80h	;timeout

  8627                                  ;	these flags reported in al:
  8628

  8635                                  ;************************************************************************

  8638                                  ;*		   at es:di						*
  8639                                  ;*									*

  8642                                  aux_read:				; 2C7h:30Dh = 70h:287Dh

  8647 0000030D 8607                    		xchg	al, [bx]
  8648 0000030F 08C0                    		or	al, al

  8650                                  aux1:					
  8651 00000313 E80500                  		call	auxin		; get character	from port
  8652                                  					; won't return if error

  8664                                  ;*	auxin - call rom bios to read character from aux port		*

  8666                                  ;*		level up to device driver exit code, setting		*
  8667                                  ;*		the number of bytes transferred appropriately		*

  8671                                  auxin:

  8675                                  		;jnz	short arbad	; skip if any error bits set
  8676                                  		;retn
  8677                                  		; 25/06/2023 (BugFix)
  8678 00000323 74F5                    		jz	short auxin_retn

  8680

  8683 00000326 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8684 00000328 0CB0                    		or	al, 0B0h	; flag_rec_sig|	flag_dsr|flag_cts
  8685 0000032A E9AAFD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt
  8686

  8688                                  
  8689                                  ;************************************************************************
  8690                                  ;*									*
  8691                                  ;*	aux_rdnd - non-destructive aux port read			*
  8692                                  ;*									*

  8702 0000033C 740C                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8703 0000033E A820                    		test	al, 20h		; flag_dsr - test data set ready
  8704 00000340 7408                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8705 00000342 E8D6FF                  		call	auxin		; else aux is ready, get character
  8706 00000345 8807                    		mov	[bx], al

  8725 00000354 F6C420                  		test	ah, 20h		; flag_tranhol_emp - test transmit hold	reg empty
  8726 00000357 74F1                    		jz	short auxbus	; then device is busy (not ready)
  8727                                  		; 12/12/2022

  8729                                  		;clc

  8733                                  ;************************************************************************
  8734                                  ;*									*

  8737                                  ;*	exit:	ax = status						*
  8738                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*
  8739                                  ;*									*
  8740                                  ;************************************************************************
  8741                                  
  8742                                  auxstat:				
  8743 0000035A B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; auxfunc_status
  8744                                  
  8745                                  		; fall into auxop
  8746                                  
  8747                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8748                                  
  8749                                  ;************************************************************************
  8750                                  ;*									*
  8751                                  ;*	auxop - perform rom-biox aux port interrupt			*
  8752                                  ;*									*
  8753                                  ;*	entry:	ah = int 14h function number				*
  8754                                  ;*	exit:	ax = results						*
  8755                                  ;*		dx = [auxnum]						*

  8760 0000035C 8B16[2100]              		mov	dx, [auxnum]	; ah=function code
  8761                                  					; 0=init, 1=send, 2=receive, 3=status
  8762                                  					; get port number
  8763 00000360 CD14                    		int	14h		; SERIAL I/O - GET USART STATUS
  8764                                  					; DX = port number (0-3)
  8765                                  					; Return: AX = port status code
  8766 00000362 C3                      		retn
  8767                                  
  8768                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8769                                  
  8770                                  ;************************************************************************
  8771                                  ;*									*
  8772                                  ;*	aux_flsh - flush aux input buffer - set contents of		*
  8773                                  ;*		   auxbuf [auxnum] to zero				*
  8774                                  ;*									*
  8775                                  ;*	cas - shouldn't this code call the rom bios input function	*
  8776                                  ;*	      repeatedly until it isn't ready?  to flush out any	*
  8777                                  ;*	      pending serial input queue if there's a tsr like MODE	*
  8778                                  ;*	      which is providing interrupt-buffering of aux port?	*
  8779                                  ;*									*
  8780                                  ;************************************************************************
  8781                                  
  8782                                  aux_flsh:				; 2C7h:36Ch = 70h:28DCh
  8783 00000363 E81C00                  		call	getbx		; flush	aux input buffer
  8784 00000366 C60700                  		mov	byte [bx], 0	; get bx to point to auxbuf
  8785                                  					; zero out buffer
  8786                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8787                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8788                                  		; cf=0 ('add' instruction in 'getbx')
  8789 00000369 C3                      		retn
  8790                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8791                                  
  8792                                  ;************************************************************************
  8793                                  ;*									*
  8794                                  ;*	aux_writ - write to aux device					*
  8795                                  ;*									*

  8797                                  
  8798                                  aux_writ:				; 2C7h:374h = 70h:28E4h
  8799                                  		;jcxz	short exvec2	; write	to aux device (if cx > 0)
  8800 0000036A E3AD                    		jcxz	exvec2		; 19/10/2022
  8801                                  aux_loop:				
  8802 0000036C 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]	; get character	to be written
  8803                                  					; move di pointer to next character

  8806 00000372 E8E7FF                  		call	auxop		; send character over aux port
  8807 00000375 F6C480                  		test	ah, 80h		; check	for error
  8808 00000378 7405                    		jz	short awok	; then no error

  8810 0000037C E958FD                  		jmp	bc_err_cnt	; call error routines
  8811                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8812                                  
  8813                                  awok:

  8815                                  					; still	more character to print
  8816                                  		;clc			; all done, successful return
  8817                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8818                                  		; cf=0 (test instruction above)	
  8819 00000381 C3                      		retn

  8821                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================

  8841                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8842                                  
  8843                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8844                                  ;								:
  8845                                  ;		    clock device driver 			:
  8846                                  ;								:
  8847                                  ;								:
  8848                                  ;   this file contains the clock device driver. 		:
  8849                                  ;								:
  8850                                  ;   the routines in this files are:				:
  8851                                  ;								:
  8852                                  ;	routine 		function			:
  8853                                  ;	------- 		--------			:
  8854                                  ;	tim_writ		set the current time		:
  8855                                  ;	tim_read		read the current time		:
  8856                                  ;	time_to_ticks		convert time to corresponding	:
  8857                                  ;				  number of clock ticks 	:
  8858                                  ;								:
  8859                                  ; the clock ticks at the rate of:				:
  8860                                  ;								:
  8861                                  ;	1193180/65536 ticks/second (about 18.2 ticks per second):
  8862                                  ; see each routine for information on the use.			:
  8863                                  ;								:
  8864                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------
  8865                                  
  8866                                  ; convert time to ticks
  8867                                  ; input : time in cx and dx
  8868                                  ; ticks returned in cx:dx
  8869                                  
  8870                                  ;19/07/2019
  8871                                  ;09/03/2019
  8872                                  
  8873                                  time_to_ticks:				; 0070h:2906h =	02C7h:0396h
  8874                                  
  8875                                  ; first convert from hour,min,sec,hund. to
  8876                                  ; total number of 100th of seconds
  8877                                  
  8878 0000038B B03C                    		mov	al, 60
  8879 0000038D F6E5                    		mul	ch		; hours	to minutes
  8880 0000038F B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8881 00000391 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; total	minutes
  8882 00000393 B97017                  		mov	cx, 6000	; 60*100
  8883 00000396 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; get out of the way of	the multiply
  8884 00000398 F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to 1/100 sec
  8885 0000039A 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
  8886 0000039C B064                    		mov	al, 100
  8887 0000039E F6E7                    		mul	bh		; convert seconds to 1/100 sec
  8888 000003A0 01C1                    		add	cx, ax		; combine seconds with hours and min
  8889 000003A2 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0		; ripple carry
  8890 000003A5 B700                    		mov	bh, 0
  8891 000003A7 01D9                    		add	cx, bx		; combine 1/100	sec
  8892 000003A9 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8893                                  
  8894                                  	; dx:cx is time in 1/100 sec
  8895                                  
  8896 000003AC 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  8897 000003AD 91                      		xchg	ax, cx		; now time is in cx:ax
  8898 000003AE BB0BE9                  		mov	bx, 59659
  8899 000003B1 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply low half
  8900 000003B3 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx
  8901 000003B5 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; cx->ax, ax->dx, dx->cx
  8902 000003B6 F7E3                    		mul	bx		; multiply high	half
  8903 000003B8 01C8                    		add	ax, cx		; combine overlapping products
  8904 000003BA 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  8905 000003BD 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; ax:dx=time*59659
  8906 000003BE BB0500                  		mov	bx, 5
  8907 000003C1 F6F3                    		div	bl		; divide high half by 5
  8908 000003C3 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
  8909 000003C5 B500                    		mov	ch, 0
  8910 000003C7 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; remainder of divide-by-5
  8911 000003C9 98                      		cbw
  8912 000003CA 92                      		xchg	ax, dx		; use it to extend low half
  8913 000003CB F7F3                    		div	bx		; divide low half by 5
  8914 000003CD 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax		; cx:dx	is now number of ticks in time
  8915 000003CF CB                      		retf			; far return
  8916                                  
  8917                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8918                                  
  8919                                  ; 17/10/2022
  8920                                  ; 15/10/2022
  8921                                  
  8922                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8923                                  ;
  8924                                  ; tim_writ sets the current time
  8925                                  ;
  8926                                  ; on entry es:[di] has the current time:
  8927                                  ;
  8928                                  ;	number of days since 1-1-80	(word)
  8929                                  ;	minutes (0-59)			(byte)
  8930                                  ;	hours (0-23)			(byte)
  8931                                  ;	hundredths of seconds (0-99)	(byte)
  8932                                  ;	seconds (0-59)			(byte)
  8933                                  ;
  8934                                  ; each number has been checked for the correct range.
  8935                                  ;
  8936                                  ;	NOTE: Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  8937                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  8938                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  8939                                  ;
  8940                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------------
  8941                                  
  8942                                  tim_writ:				; 2C7h:3DBh = 70h:294Bh
  8943 000003D0 268B05                  		mov	ax, [es:di]
  8944 000003D3 50                      		push	ax		; daycnt. we need to set this at the very
  8945                                  					; end to avoid tick windows.
  8946 000003D4 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8947                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8948 000003D9 7426                    		jz	short no_cmos_1
  8949 000003DB 268A4503                		mov	al, [es:di+3]	; near indirect	calls
  8950                                  					; get binary hours
  8951                                  					; convert to bcd
  8952 000003DF FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8953                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; call far [bintobcd]
  8954 000003E3 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch = bcd hours
  8955 000003E5 268A4502                		mov	al, [es:di+2]	; get binary minutes
  8956 000003E9 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8957                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd	; convert to bcd
  8958 000003ED 88C1                    		mov	cl, al		; cl = bcd minutes
  8959 000003EF 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; get binary seconds
  8960 000003F3 FF1E[0205]              		call	far [bintobcd]
  8961                                  		;call	ds:bintobcd
  8962 000003F7 88C6                    		mov	dh, al		; dh = bcd seconds
  8963 000003F9 B200                    		mov	dl, 0		; dl = 0 (st) or 1 (dst)
  8964 000003FB FA                      		cli
  8965 000003FC B403                    		mov	ah, 3
  8966 000003FE CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8967                                  					; CH = hours in	BCD, CL	= minutes in BCD
  8968                                  					;  DH =	seconds	in BCD,DL = 01h	if daylight savings, 00h if standard time
  8969                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8970 00000400 FB                      		sti
  8971                                  no_cmos_1:				
  8972 00000401 268B4D02                		mov	cx, [es:di+2]
  8973 00000405 268B5504                		mov	dx, [es:di+4]
  8974                                  		; 17/10/2022
  8975 00000409 FF1E[E206]              		call	far [ttticks]
  8976                                  		;call	dword ptr ds:ttticks ; call far	[ttticks]
  8977                                  					; convert time to ticks
  8978                                  					; cx:dx	now has	time in	ticks
  8979 0000040D FA                      		cli			; turn off timer
  8980 0000040E B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8981 00000410 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET TIME OF DAY
  8982                                  					; CX:DX	= clock	count
  8983                                  					; Return: time of day set
  8984                                  		;pop	ds:daycnt
  8985 00000412 8F06[F004]              		pop	word [daycnt]
  8986 00000416 FB                      		sti
  8987                                  		;cmp	ds:havecmosclock, 0
  8988 00000417 803E[F304]00            		cmp	byte [havecmosclock], 0
  8989 0000041C 740A                    		jz	short no_cmos_2
  8990 0000041E FF1E[0605]              		call	far [daycnttoday]
  8991                                  		;call	ds:daycnttoday	; call far [daycnttoday]
  8992                                  					; convert to bcd format
  8993 00000422 FA                      		cli
  8994 00000423 B405                    		mov	ah, 5
  8995 00000425 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- SET DATE IN REAL TIME	CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  8996                                  					; DL = day in BCD, DH =	month in BCD, CL = year	in BCD
  8997                                  					; CH = century (19h or 20h)
  8998                                  					; Return: CMOS clock set
  8999 00000427 FB                      		sti
  9000                                  no_cmos_2:
  9001                                  		; 12/12/2022
  9002                                  		; cf=0				
  9003                                  		;clc
  9004 00000428 C3                      		retn
  9005                                  
  9006                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9007                                  
  9008                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9009                                  
  9010                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9011                                  ; gettime reads date and time
  9012                                  ; and returns the following information:
  9013                                  ;
  9014                                  ;	es:[di]  =count of days since 1-1-80
  9015                                  ;	es:[di+2]=hours
  9016                                  ;	es:[di+3]=minutes
  9017                                  ;	es:[di+4]=seconds
  9018                                  ;	es:[di+5]=hundredths of seconds
  9019                                  ;
  9020                                  ;	NOTE:  Any changes in this routine probably require corresponding
  9021                                  ;	changes in the version that is built with the power manager driver.
  9022                                  ;	See ptime.asm.
  9023                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9024                                  
  9025                                  tim_read:				; 2C7h:435h = 70h:29A5h
  9026 00000429 E84E00                  		call	GetTickCnt
  9027 0000042C 8B36[F004]              		mov	si, [daycnt]
  9028                                  
  9029                                  ; we now need to convert the time in tick to the time in 100th of
  9030                                  ; seconds. the relation between tick and seconds is:
  9031                                  ;
  9032                                  ;		 65,536 seconds
  9033                                  ;	       ----------------
  9034                                  ;		1,193,180 tick
  9035                                  ;
  9036                                  ; to get to 100th of second we need to multiply by 100. the equation is:
  9037                                  ;
  9038                                  ;	ticks from clock  * 65,536 * 100
  9039                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9040                                  ;		1,193,180
  9041                                  ;
  9042                                  ; fortunately this formula simplifies to:
  9043                                  ;
  9044                                  ;	ticks from clock * 5 * 65,536
  9045                                  ;      --------------------------------- = time in 100th of seconds
  9046                                  ;		59,659
  9047                                  ;
  9048                                  ; the calculation is done by first multipling tick by 5. next we divide by
  9049                                  ; 59,659. in this division we multiply by 65,536 by shifting the dividend
  9050                                  ; my 16 bits to the left.
  9051                                  ;
  9052                                  ; start with ticks in cx:dx
  9053                                  ; multiply by 5
  9054                                  
  9055 00000430 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
  9056 00000432 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; start	with ticks in cx:dx
  9057                                  					; multiply by 5
  9058 00000434 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9059 00000436 D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	2
  9060 00000438 D1E2                    		shl	dx, 1
  9061 0000043A D1D1                    		rcl	cx, 1		; times	4
  9062 0000043C 01DA                    		add	dx, bx
  9063 0000043E 11C8                    		adc	ax, cx		; times	5
  9064 00000440 92                      		xchg	ax, dx
  9065                                  
  9066                                  ; now have ticks * 5 in	dx:ax
  9067                                  ; we now need to multiply by 65536 and divide by 59659 d.
  9068                                  
  9069 00000441 B90BE9                  		mov	cx, 59659	; get divisor
  9070 00000444 F7F1                    		div	cx		; dx now has remainder
  9071                                  					; ax has high word of final quotient
  9072 00000446 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; put high word	in safe	place
  9073 00000448 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax		; this is the multiply by 65536
  9074 0000044A F7F1                    		div	cx		; bx:ax	now has	time in	100th of seconds
  9075                                  
  9076                                  ; rounding based on the	remainder may be added here
  9077                                  ; the result in	bx:ax is time in 1/100 second.
  9078                                  
  9079 0000044C 89DA                    		mov	dx, bx		
  9080 0000044E B9C800                  		mov	cx, 200		;extract 1/100's
  9081                                  
  9082                                  ; division by 200 is necessary to ensure no overflow--max result
  9083                                  ; is number of seconds in a day/2 = 43200.
  9084                                  
  9085 00000451 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9086 00000453 80FA64                  		cmp	dl, 100		; remainder over 100?
  9087 00000456 7203                    		jb	short noadj
  9088 00000458 80EA64                  		sub	dl, 100		; keep 1/100's less than 100
  9089                                  noadj:					
  9090 0000045B F5                      		cmc			; if we	subtracted 100,	carry is now set
  9091 0000045C 88D3                    		mov	bl, dl		; save 1/100's
  9092                                  
  9093                                  ; to compensate	for dividing by	200 instead of 100, we now multiply
  9094                                  ; by two, shifting a one in if the remainder had exceeded 100.
  9095                                  
  9096 0000045E D1D0                    		rcl	ax, 1		
  9097 00000460 B200                    		mov	dl, 0
  9098 00000462 D1D2                    		rcl	dx, 1
  9099 00000464 B93C00                  		mov	cx, 60		; divide out seconds
  9100 00000467 F7F1                    		div	cx
  9101 00000469 88D7                    		mov	bh, dl		; save the seconds
  9102 0000046B F6F1                    		div	cl		; break	into hours and minutes
  9103 0000046D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah
  9104                                  
  9105                                  ; time is now in ax:bx (hours, minutes, seconds, 1/100 sec)
  9106                                  
  9107 0000046F 50                      		push	ax
  9108 00000470 89F0                    		mov	ax, si		; daycnt
  9109 00000472 AB                      		stosw
  9110 00000473 58                      		pop	ax
  9111 00000474 AB                      		stosw
  9112 00000475 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  9113 00000477 AB                      		stosw
  9114 00000478 F8                      		clc
  9115 00000479 C3                      		retn
  9116                                  
  9117                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9118                                  
  9119                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9120                                  
  9121                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9122                                  ;
  9123                                  ; procedure : GetTickCnt
  9124                                  ;
  9125                                  ;		Returns the tick count in CX:DX. Takes care of DayCnt in case
  9126                                  ;		of rollover [except when power management driver is in use]. 
  9127                                  ;		Uses the following logic for updating Daycnt
  9128                                  ;
  9129                                  ;		if ( rollover ) {
  9130                                  ;			if ( t_switch )
  9131                                  ;				daycnt++ ;
  9132                                  ;			else
  9133                                  ;				daycnt += rollover ;
  9134                                  ;		}
  9135                                  ;
  9136                                  ; USES : AX
  9137                                  ;
  9138                                  ; RETURNS : CX:DX - tick count
  9139                                  ; MODIFIES : daycnt
  9140                                  ;
  9141                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9142                                  
  9143                                  		; 17/10/2022
  9144                                  GetTickCnt:	
  9145 0000047A 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  9146 0000047C CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- GET TIME OF DAY
  9147                                  					; Return: CX:DX	= clock	count
  9148                                  					; AL = 00h if clock was	read or	written	(via AH=0,1) since the previous
  9149                                  					; midnight
  9150                                  					; Otherwise, AL	> 0
  9151 0000047E 803E[F204]00            		cmp	byte [t_switch], 0 ; use old method ? (>0 is yes)
  9152 00000483 7507                    		jnz	short inc_case	; old method assumes  that Int 1Ah returns rollover flag
  9153 00000485 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; new method assumes that Int 1Ah returns roll over count
  9154                                  					; and not flag
  9155 00000487 0106[F004]              		add	[daycnt], ax
  9156 0000048B C3                      		retn
  9157                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9158                                  
  9159                                  inc_case:				
  9160 0000048C 08C0                    		or	al, al
  9161 0000048E 7404                    		jz	short no_rollover
  9162 00000490 FF06[F004]              		inc	word [daycnt]
  9163                                  no_rollover:				
  9164 00000494 C3                      		retn
  9165

  9193                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9194                                  ;	disk interface routines
  9195                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9196                                  
  9197                                  ; device attribute bits:
  9198                                  ;	bit 6 - get/set map for logical drives and generic ioctl.
  9199                                  
  9200                                  ;MAXERR		equ	5
  9201                                  ;MAX_HD_FMT_ERR	equ	2
  9202                                  
  9203                                  ;LSTDRV	equ 504h
  9204                                  
  9205                                  ; some floppies do not have changeline. as a result, media-check would
  9206                                  ; normally return i-don't-know, the dos would continually reread the fat and
  9207                                  ; discard cached data. we optimize this by implementing a logical door-latch:
  9208                                  ; it is physically impossible to change a disk in under 2 seconds. we retain
  9209                                  ; the time of the last successful disk operation and compare it with the current
  9210                                  ; time during media-check. if < 2 seconds and at least 1 timer tick has passed,
  9211                                  ; the we say no change. if > 2 seconds then we say i-don't-know. finally, 
  9212                                  ; since we cannot trust the timer to be always available, we record the number 
  9213                                  ; of media checks that have occurred when no apparent time has elapsed. while
  9214                                  ; this number is < a given threshold, we say no change. when it exceeds that
  9215                                  ; threshold, we say i-don't-know and reset the counter to 0. when we store 
  9216                                  ; the time of last successful access, if we see that time has passed too,
  9217                                  ; we reset the counter.
  9218                                  
  9219                                  accessmax	equ	5
  9220                                  
  9221                                  ; due to various bogosities, we need to continually adjust what the head
  9222                                  ; settle time is.  the following algorithm is used:
  9223                                  ;
  9224                                  ;   get the current head settle value.
  9225                                  ;   if it is 0, then
  9226                                  ;	set slow = 15
  9227                                  ;   else
  9228                                  ;	set slow = value
  9229                                  ;   ...
  9230                                  ;*********************************************
  9231                                  ;************ old algorithm ******************
  9232                                  ;*   if we are seeking and writing then
  9233                                  ;*	 use slow
  9234                                  ;*   else
  9235                                  ;*	 use fast
  9236                                  ;*********************************************
  9237                                  ;*********** ibm's requested logic ***********
  9238                                  ;   if we are seeking and writing and not on an at then
  9239                                  ;	use slow
  9240                                  ;   else
  9241                                  ;	use fast
  9242                                  ;   ...
  9243                                  ;   restore current head settle value
  9244                                  ;
  9245                                  ;
  9246                                  ;---------------------------------------
  9247                                  multrk_on	equ	10000000b	;user spcified mutitrack=on, or system turns
  9248                                  					; it on after handling config.sys file as a
  9249                                  					; default value, if multrk_flag = multrk_off1.
  9250                                  multrk_off1	equ	00000000b	;initial value. no "multitrack=" command entered.
  9251                                  multrk_off2	equ	00000001b	;user specified multitrack=off.
  9252                                  
  9253                                  ; close data segment, open Bios_Code segment
  9254                                  
  9255                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9256                                  
  9257                                  ; BIOSCODE:04A2h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  9258

  9260                                  ;	command jump table
  9261                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------
  9262                                  
  9263 00000495 00                      		db 0
  9264

  9266                                  %if 0

  9268                                  dsktbl:		db 26			; 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h

  9333                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9334                                  ; setdrive scans through the data structure of bdss, and returns a pointer to
  9335                                  ; the one that belongs to the drive specified. carry is set if none exists
  9336                                  ; for the drive. Pointer is returned in es:[di]
  9337                                  ;
  9338                                  ;  AL contains the logical drive number.
  9339                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9340                                  
  9341                                  SetDrive:	
  9342                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds ; Point es:di to first bds	
  9343 000004CB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; 19/10/2022
  9344                                  X_Scan_Loop:				
  9345 000004CF 26384505                		cmp	[es:di+5], al	
  9346 000004D3 7409                    		jz	short X_SetDrv
  9347 000004D5 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link] ; Go	to next	bds
  9348 000004D8 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
  9349 000004DB 75F2                    		jnz	short X_Scan_Loop
  9350 000004DD F9                      		stc
  9351                                  X_SetDrv:				
  9352 000004DE C3                      		retn
  9353

  9356                                  ; 15/10/2022
  9357                                  
  9358                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9359                                  ; if id is f9, have a 96tpi disk else
  9360                                  ; if bit 2 is 0 then media is not removable and could not have changed
  9361                                  ;  otherwise if within 2 secs of last disk operation media could not
  9362                                  ;    have changed, otherwise dont know if media has changed
  9363                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------
  9364                                  
  9365                                  media_chk:				; 2C7h:4EBh = 70h:2A5Bh
  9366 000004DF E8E9FF                  		call	SetDrive
  9367 000004E2 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1
  9368 000004E5 26F6452401              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
  9369                                  					; fchanged_by_format

  9376                                  					; Ensure that we ask the rom if media has changed

  9378                                  					; fnon_removable

  9443                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  9444                                  
  9445                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9446                                  ; perform a check on the time passed since the last access for this physical
  9447                                  ; drive.
  9448                                  ; we are accessing the same drive. if the time of last successful access was
  9449                                  ; less than 2 seconds ago, then we may presume that the disk was not changed.
  9450                                  ; returns in si:
  9451                                  ;	0 - if time of last access was >= 2 seconds
  9452                                  ;	1 - if time was < 2 seconds (i.e no media change assumed)
  9453                                  ; registers affected ax,cx,dx, flags.
  9454                                  ;
  9455                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds->Bios_Data
  9456                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9457                                  
  9458                                  		; 19/10/2022
  9459                                  Check_Time_Of_Access:
  9460 00000553 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; presume no change.
  9461 00000556 E821FF                  		call	GetTickCnt	; cx:dx	is the elapsed time
  9462 00000559 268B4547                		mov	ax, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
  9463                                  					; get stored time
  9464 0000055D 29C2                    		sub	dx, ax
  9465 0000055F 268B4549                		mov	ax, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
  9466 00000563 19C1                    		sbb	cx, ax
  9467 00000565 751A                    		jnz	short timecheck_unk ; cx<>0 => >1 hour
  9468 00000567 09D2                    		or	dx, dx		; time must pass
  9469 00000569 7511                    		jnz	short timepassed ; yes, examine max value
  9470 0000056B FE06[1D01]              		inc	byte [accesscount]
  9471 0000056F 803E[1D01]05            		cmp	byte [accesscount], 5 
  9472                                  					; if count is less than threshold, ok
  9473 00000574 720C                    		jb	short timecheck_ret
  9474 00000576 FE0E[1D01]              		dec	byte [accesscount] ; don't let the count wrap
  9475 0000057A EB05                    		jmp	short timecheck_unk ; "i don't know" if media changed
  9476                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  9477                                  
  9478                                  timepassed:				
  9479 0000057C 83FA24                  		cmp	dx, 36		; 18*2 ; 18.2 tics per second.
  9480                                  					; min elapsed time? (2 seconds)
  9481 0000057F 7601                    		jbe	short timecheck_ret ; yes, presume no change
  9482                                  
  9483                                  		; everything indicates that we do not know what has happened.
  9484                                  timecheck_unk:				
  9485 00000581 4E                      		dec	si		; presume i don't know
  9486                                  timecheck_ret:				
  9487 00000582 C3                      		retn
  9488                                  
  9489                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
