 10522                                  
 10523                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10524                                  ; set the drive-last-accessed flag for diskette only. 
 10525                                  ; we know that the hard disk will not be removed.
 10526                                  ; es:di -> current bds.
 10527                                  ; ds -> Bios_Data
 10528                                  ; ax,cx,si are destroyed.
 10529                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10530                                  
 10531                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10532                                  iosetup:	
 10533 00000999 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10534 0000099D A2[1E01]                		mov	[tim_drv], al	; save drive letter
 10535                                  
 10536                                  ; determine proper head settle values
 10537                                  
 10538 000009A0 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10539 000009A5 7539                    		jnz	short skip_dpt_setting
 10540 000009A7 A0[2C01]                		mov	al, [eot]	; fetch	up eot before changing ds
 10541 000009AA 1E                      		push	ds
 10542 000009AB C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]	; get pointer to disk base table
 10543 000009AF 884404                  		mov	[si+4],	al
 10544 000009B2 8A440A                  		mov	al, [si+10]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 10545 000009B5 8A6404                  		mov	ah, [si+4]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 10546 000009B8 1F                      		pop	ds
 10547 000009B9 A2[2601]                		mov	[motorstartup], al
 10548 000009BC 8826[2B01]              		mov	[save_eot], ah
 10549                                  
 10550                                  ; for 3.5" drives, both external as well as on the k09, we need to set the
 10551                                  ; motor start time to 4. this checking for every i/o is going to affect
 10552                                  ; performance across the board, but is necessary!!
 10553                                  
 10554 000009C0 1E                      		push	ds
 10555 000009C1 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]	; get pointer to disk base table
 10556 000009C5 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 10557                                  					; ffSmall
 10558 000009CA 7505                    		jnz	short motor_start_ok
 10559 000009CC B004                    		mov	al, 4
 10560 000009CE 86440A                  		xchg	al, [si+10]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 10561                                  motor_start_ok:
 10562                                  
 10563                                  ; ds:si now points to disk parameter table.
 10564                                  ; get current settle and set fast settle
 10565                                  				
 10566                                  		;xor	al, al
 10567                                  		;inc	al		; ibm wants fast settle	to be 1
 10568                                  		; 18/12/2022
 10569 000009D1 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
 10570 000009D3 40                      		inc	ax
 10571 000009D4 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10572                                  					; get settle and set up	for fast
 10573 000009D7 1F                      		pop	ds
 10574 000009D8 A2[2701]                		mov	[settlecurrent], al
 10575 000009DB B00F                    		mov	al, 15		; NORMSETTLE
 10576                                  					; someone has diddled the settle
 10577 000009DD A2[2801]                		mov	[settleslow], al
 10578                                  skip_dpt_setting:			
 10579 000009E0 C3                      		retn
 10580                                  
 10581                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10582                                  
 10583                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10584                                  ; set time of last access, and reset default values in the dpt.
 10585                                  ;
 10586                                  ;	  note: trashes (at least) si
 10587                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10588                                  
 10589                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10590                                  done:
 10591 000009E1 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10592                                  					; fnon_removable
 10593 000009E6 752F                    		jnz	short ddbx	; do not set for non-removable media
 10594 000009E8 E8FD01                  		call	set_tim
 10595                                  ;diddleback:
 10596                                  ; 09/12/2022
 10597                                  diddle_back:				
 10598 000009EB 9C                      		pushf
 10599 000009EC 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10600 000009F1 7523                    		jnz	short nodiddleback
 10601 000009F3 50                      		push	ax
 10602 000009F4 06                      		push	es
 10603 000009F5 C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 10604 000009F9 A0[2B01]                		mov	al, [save_eot]
 10605 000009FC 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 10606 00000A00 A0[2701]                		mov	al, [settlecurrent]
 10607 00000A03 8A26[2601]              		mov	ah, [motorstartup]
 10608 00000A07 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10609 00000A0B 26C6440302              		mov	byte [es:si+3], 2 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 10610 00000A10 2688640A                		mov	[es:si+0Ah], ah	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 10611 00000A14 07                      		pop	es
 10612 00000A15 58                      		pop	ax
 10613                                  nodiddleback:				
 10614 00000A16 9D                      		popf
 10615                                  ddbx:					
 10616 00000A17 C3                      		retn
 10617                                  
 10618                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10619                                  
 10620                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10621                                  ;read the number of sectors specified in ax, 
 10622                                  ;handling track boundaries
 10623                                  ;es:di -> bds for this drive
 10624                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10625                                  
 10626                                  		 ; 19/10/2022
 10627                                  block:	
 10628 00000A18 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
 10629 00000A1A 74FB                    		jz	short ddbx
 10630 00000A1C 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10631                                  					; fnon_removable
 10632 00000A21 740D                    		jz	short block_floppy ;
 10633                                  
 10634                                  ; check	to see if multi	track operation	is allowed. if not
 10635                                  ; we have to go	to the block_floppy below to break up the operation.
 10636                                  
 10637 00000A23 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 10638                                  		;test	byte ptr ds:multrk_flag, 80h ; multrk_on
 10639 00000A28 7406                    		jz	short block_floppy
 10640 00000A2A E82900                  		call	Disk
 10641 00000A2D 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
 10642 00000A2F C3                      		retn
 10643                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10644                                  
 10645                                  block_floppy:
 10646                                  
 10647                                  ; read at most 1 track worth. perform minimization at sector / track
 10648                                  				
 10649 00000A30 268A4D13                		mov	cl, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10650 00000A34 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 10651 00000A36 2A0E[3101]              		sub	cl, [cursec]
 10652 00000A3A 30ED                    		xor	ch, ch
 10653 00000A3C 39C8                    		cmp	ax, cx
 10654 00000A3E 7302                    		jnb	short gotmin
 10655 00000A40 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax
 10656                                  
 10657                                  gotmin:
 10658                                  
 10659                                  ; ax is the requested number of sectors to read
 10660                                  ; cx is the number that we can do on this track
 10661                                  					
 10662 00000A42 50                      		push	ax
 10663 00000A43 51                      		push	cx
 10664 00000A44 89C8                    		mov	ax, cx
 10665 00000A46 E80D00                  		call	Disk
 10666 00000A49 59                      		pop	cx
 10667 00000A4A 58                      		pop	ax
 10668                                  
 10669                                  ; cx is the number of sectors just transferred
 10670                                  
 10671 00000A4B 29C8                    		sub	ax, cx		; reduce sectors-remaining by last i/o
 10672 00000A4D D0E1                    		shl	cl, 1
 10673 00000A4F 00CF                    		add	bh, cl		; adjust transfer address
 10674 00000A51 EBC5                    		jmp	short block
 10675                                  dskerr_brdg:				
 10676 00000A53 E9EC00                  		jmp	dskerr
 10677                                  
 10678                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10679                                  
 10680                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10681                                  
 10682                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10683                                  ;perform disk i/o with retries
 10684                                  ; al = number of sectors (1-8, all on one track)
 10685                                  ; es:di point to drive parameters
 10686                                  ; xfer_seg:bx = transfer address 
 10687                                  ;		(must not cross a 64k physical boundary)
 10688                                  ; [rflag] = 2 if read, 3 if write
 10689                                  ; [verify] = 0 for normal, 1 for verify after write
 10690                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10691                                  
 10692                                  		 ; 19/10/2022
 10693                                  Disk:
 10694                                  
 10695                                  ; Check for hard disk format and
 10696                                  ; if TRUE then set max error count to 2
 10697                                  
 10698 00000A56 BD0500                  		mov	bp, 5		; MAXERR
 10699                                  					; set up retry count
 10700 00000A59 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1	;
 10701                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fnon_removable
 10702 00000A5E 7408                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 10703 00000A60 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify ; Is this a	track verify?
 10704 00000A63 7403                    		jz	short GetRdWrInd
 10705 00000A65 BD0200                  		mov	bp, 2		; This is not verify so only 1 retry
 10706                                  GetRdWrInd:				
 10707 00000A68 892E[3205]              		mov	[vretry_cnt], bp ; verify op. retry cnt for write-verify
 10708 00000A6C 892E[3405]              		mov	[soft_ecc_cnt], bp ; soft ecc error retry count.
 10709 00000A70 8A26[2001]              		mov	ah, [rflag]	; get read/write indicator
 10710                                  ;retry:
 10711                                  ; 09/12/2022
 10712                                  _retry:					
 10713 00000A74 50                      		push	ax
 10714 00000A75 8B16[3301]              		mov	dx, [curtrk]
 10715 00000A79 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10716 00000A7E 740B                    		jz	short disk_not_mini
 10717 00000A80 26837D4701              		cmp	word [es:di+47h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
 10718                                  					; is this a mini disk? ((logical dos partition))
 10719 00000A85 7504                    		jnz	short disk_not_mini ; no. continue to next.
 10720 00000A87 26035549                		add	dx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
 10721                                  					; add hidden trks.
 10722                                  disk_not_mini:				
 10723 00000A8B D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 10724 00000A8D D0CE                    		ror	dh, 1
 10725 00000A8F 0A36[3101]              		or	dh, [cursec]
 10726 00000A93 89D1                    		mov	cx, dx
 10727 00000A95 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl		;  cl =	sector,	ch = cylinder
 10728 00000A97 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]	; load current head number and
 10729 00000A9B 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; physical drive number
 10730                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10731 00000A9F 26807D2205              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 5 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffHardFile
 10732 00000AA4 7413                    		jz	short do_fast	; hard files use fast speed
 10733                                  
 10734                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.
 10735                                  ; this helps when we have just done a reset disk operation and the head has
 10736                                  ; been moved to another cylinder - the problem crops up with 3.5" drives.
 10737                                  
 10738 00000AA6 803E[7600]FF            		cmp	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 10739 00000AAB 740A                    		jz	short do_writej
 10740 00000AAD 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; romread
 10741 00000AB0 7407                    		jz	short do_fast
 10742 00000AB2 80FC04                  		cmp	ah, 4		; romverify
 10743 00000AB5 7402                    		jz	short do_fast
 10744                                  do_writej:	
 10745                                  
 10746                                  ; reads always fast, unless we have just done a disk reset operation
 10747                                  			
 10748 00000AB7 EB56                    		jmp	short do_write	; reads	always fast
 10749                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10750                                  
 10751                                  do_fast:				
 10752 00000AB9 E8FC00                  		call	fastspeed	; change settle	mode
 10753                                  
 10754                                  testerr:				
 10755 00000ABC 7295                    		jb	short dskerr_brdg
 10756                                  
 10757                                  ; set drive and track of last access
 10758                                  
 10759 00000ABE 8816[7600]              		mov	[step_drv], dl
 10760 00000AC2 26886D46                		mov	[es:di+46h], ch	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10761                                  no_set:
 10762                                  		;cmp	word [wrtverify], 103h
 10763 00000AC6 813E[2001]0301          		cmp	word [rflag], 103h ; check for write and verify
 10764 00000ACC 7452                    		jz	short doverify
 10765                                  noverify:				
 10766 00000ACE 58                      		pop	ax
 10767                                  
 10768                                  ; check the flags word in the bds to see if the drive is non removable
 10769                                  ; if not we needn't do anything special
 10770                                  ; if it is a hard disk then check to see if multi-track operation
 10771                                  ; is specified. if specified we don't have to calculate for the next
 10772                                  ; track since we are already done. so we can go to the exit of this routine.
 10773                                  
 10774 00000ACF 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10775                                  					; fnon_removable
 10776 00000AD4 7407                    		jz	short its_removable
 10777 00000AD6 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h ; multrk_on
 10778 00000ADB 7530                    		jnz	short disk_ret
 10779                                  its_removable:				
 10780 00000ADD 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh		; eliminate cylinder bits from sector
 10781 00000AE0 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
 10782 00000AE2 2906[2201]              		sub	[seccnt], ax	; reduce count of sectors to go	next sector
 10783 00000AE6 00C1                    		add	cl, al
 10784 00000AE8 880E[3101]              		mov	[cursec], cl
 10785 00000AEC 263A4D13                		cmp	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10786                                  					; see if sector/track limit reached
 10787 00000AF0 761B                    		jbe	short disk_ret
 10788 00000AF2 C606[3101]01            		mov	byte [cursec], 1 ; start with first sector of next track
 10789 00000AF7 8A36[3201]              		mov	dh, [curhd]
 10790 00000AFB FEC6                    		inc	dh
 10791 00000AFD 263A7515                		cmp	dh, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 10792 00000B01 7206                    		jb	short noxor
 10793 00000B03 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
 10794 00000B05 FF06[3301]              		inc	word [curtrk]
 10795                                  noxor:					
 10796 00000B09 8836[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dh
 10797                                  disk_ret:				
 10798 00000B0D F8                      		clc
 10799 00000B0E C3                      		retn
 10800                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10801                                  
 10802                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10803                                  
 10804                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10805                                  ; the request is for write. determine if we are talking about
 10806                                  ; the same track and drive. if so, use the fast speed.
 10807                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10808                                  
 10809                                  do_write:				
 10810 00000B0F 3A16[7600]              		cmp	dl, [step_drv]
 10811 00000B13 7506                    		jnz	short do_norm	; we have changed drives
 10812 00000B15 263A6D46                		cmp	ch, [es:di+46h]	; [es:di+BDS.track]
 10813 00000B19 749E                    		jz	short do_fast	; we are still on the same track
 10814                                  
 10815                                  do_norm:				
 10816 00000B1B E87500                  		call	normspeed
 10817 00000B1E EB9C                    		jmp	short testerr
 10818                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10819                                  
 10820                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10821                                  ; we have a verify request also. get state info and go verify
 10822                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10823                                  
 10824                                  doverify:				
 10825 00000B20 58                      		pop	ax
 10826 00000B21 50                      		push	ax
 10827 00000B22 B404                    		mov	ah, 4
 10828 00000B24 E89100                  		call	fastspeed
 10829 00000B27 73A5                    		jnb	short noverify
 10830                                  
 10831                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 10832                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 10833                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 10834                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to
 10835                                  ; no_verify but if we can still try then we call the routine to reset
 10836                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.
 10837                                  
 10838 00000B29 80FC11                  		cmp	ah, 11h		; soft ecc error ?
 10839 00000B2C 750B                    		jnz	short not_softecc_err
 10840 00000B2E FF0E[3405]              		dec	word [soft_ecc_cnt]
 10841 00000B32 749A                    		jz	short noverify	; no more retry
 10842 00000B34 E84405                  		call	ResetDisk	; reset	disk
 10843 00000B37 EB3E                    		jmp	short dskerr1	; retry
 10844                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10845                                  
 10846                                  not_softecc_err:			; other error.			
 10847 00000B39 E83F05                  		call	ResetDisk
 10848 00000B3C FF0E[3205]              		dec	word [vretry_cnt]
 10849 00000B40 EB1C                    		jmp	short dskerr0
 10850                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10851                                  
 10852                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10853                                  ; need to special case the change-line error ah=06h.
 10854                                  ; if we get this, we need to return it.
 10855                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10856                                  
 10857                                  dskerr:					
 10858 00000B42 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0	; do we	have changeline	support?
 10859 00000B47 7403                    		jz	short dskerr_nochangeline ; brif not
 10860 00000B49 E8220D                  		call	checkio
 10861                                  dskerr_nochangeline:			
 10862 00000B4C 803E[3605]01            		cmp	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1 ; multi trk format request?
 10863 00000B51 7508                    		jnz	short dochkagain ; no more retry.
 10864 00000B53 BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1
 10865 00000B56 C606[3605]00            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 0 ; clear the flag.
 10866                                  dochkagain:				
 10867 00000B5B E8AA00                  		call	again
 10868                                  dskerr0:				
 10869 00000B5E 7420                    		jz	short harderr
 10870 00000B60 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10871                                  					; fnon_removable
 10872 00000B65 7505                    		jnz	short skip_timeout_chk
 10873 00000B67 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; timeout?
 10874 00000B6A 7414                    		jz	short harderr
 10875                                  skip_timeout_chk:			
 10876 00000B6C 80FCCC                  		cmp	ah, 0CCh	; write	fault error?
 10877 00000B6F 740A                    		jz	short write_fault_err ;	then, don't retry.
 10878 00000B71 C706[3405]0500          		mov	word [soft_ecc_cnt], 5 ; MAXERR
 10879                                  					; set soft_ecc_cnt back	to maxerr
 10880                                  dskerr1:				
 10881 00000B77 58                      		pop	ax		; restore sector count
 10882                                  		;jmp	retry
 10883                                  		; 09/12/2022
 10884 00000B78 E9F9FE                  		jmp	_retry
 10885                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10886                                  
 10887                                  write_fault_err:			
 10888 00000B7B BD0100                  		mov	bp, 1		; just retry only once
 10889                                  					; for write fault error.
 10890 00000B7E EBF7                    		jmp	short dskerr1
 10891                                  
 10892                                  		; fall into harderr
 10893                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10894                                  
 10895                                  ; entry point for routines that call maperror themselves
 10896                                  
 10897                                  harderr:				
 10898 00000B80 E84D00                  		call	maperror
 10899                                  harderr2:				
 10900 00000B83 C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 10901                                  					; force a media check through rom
 10902 00000B88 8B0E[2201]              		mov	cx, [seccnt]	; get count of sectors to go
 10903 00000B8C 8B26[3501]              		mov	sp, [spsav]	; recover entry	stack pointer
 10904                                  
 10905                                  ; since we are performing a non-local goto, restore the disk parameters
 10906                                  
 10907                                  		;jmp	diddleback
 10908                                  		; 09/12/2022
 10909 00000B90 E958FE                  		jmp	diddle_back
 10910                                  
 10911                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10912                                  
 10913                                  ; change settle value from settlecurrent to whatever is appropriate
 10914                                  ; note that this routine is never called for a fixed disk.
 10915                                  
 10916                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10917                                  normspeed:
 10918 00000B93 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10919 00000B98 751E                    		jnz	short fastspeed
 10920 00000B9A 06                      		push	es
 10921 00000B9B 50                      		push	ax
 10922 00000B9C A0[2801]                		mov	al, [settleslow]
 10923 00000B9F C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]	; current disk parm table
 10924 00000BA3 26884409                		mov	[es:si+9], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10925 00000BA7 58                      		pop	ax
 10926 00000BA8 07                      		pop	es
 10927 00000BA9 E80C00                  		call	fastspeed
 10928 00000BAC 06                      		push	es
 10929 00000BAD C436[2D01]              		les	si, [dpt]
 10930 00000BB1 26C6440901              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 1 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10931                                  					; 1 is fast settle value
 10932 00000BB6 07                      		pop	es
 10933 00000BB7 C3                      		retn
 10934                                  
 10935                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10936                                  
 10937                                  ; if the drive has been marked as too big (i.e. starting sector of the
 10938                                  ; partition is > 16 bits, then always return drive not ready.
 10939                                  
 10940                                  fastspeed:		
 10941 00000BB8 26F6451F80              		test	byte [es:di+1Fh], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.fatsiz]
 10942                                  					; ftoobig
 10943 00000BBD 750D                    		jnz	short notready
 10944 00000BBF 06                      		push	es
 10945 00000BC0 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 10946 00000BC4 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 10947 00000BC6 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es
 10948 00000BCA 07                      		pop	es
 10949 00000BCB C3                      		retn
 10950                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10951                                  
 10952                                  notready:				
 10953 00000BCC F9                      		stc
 10954 00000BCD B480                    		mov	ah, 80h
 10955 00000BCF C3                      		retn
 10956                                  
 10957                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10958                                  
 10959                                  ; map error returned by rom in ah into corresponding code to be returned to
 10960                                  ; dos in al. trashes di. guaranteed to set carry.
 10961                                  
 10962                                  maperror:	
 10963 00000BD0 51                      		push	cx
 10964 00000BD1 06                      		push	es
 10965 00000BD2 1E                      		push	ds		; set es=Bios_Data
 10966 00000BD3 07                      		pop	es
 10967 00000BD4 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; put error code in al
 10968 00000BD6 A2[4401]                		mov	[lsterr], al	; terminate list with error code
 10969 00000BD9 B90900                  		mov	cx, 9		; numerr (= errout-errin)
 10970                                  					; number of possible error conditions
 10971 00000BDC BF[3C01]                		mov	di, errin	; point to error conditions
 10972 00000BDF F2AE                    		repne scasb
 10973                                  		; 10/12/2022
 10974 00000BE1 8A4508                  		mov	al, [di+8]	; [di+numerr-1]
 10975                                  					; get translation
 10976                                  		; 19/10/2022 - Temporary ! 
 10977                                  		;db	8Ah, 85h, 8, 0	; mov al, [di+8]
 10978 00000BE4 07                      		pop	es
 10979 00000BE5 59                      		pop	cx
 10980 00000BE6 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 10981 00000BE7 C3                      		retn
 10982                                  
 10983                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10984                                  
 10985                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 10986                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 10987                                  
 10988                                  set_tim:		
 10989 00000BE8 50                      		push	ax
 10990 00000BE9 E88EF8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 10991                                  
 10992                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 10993                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 10994                                  
 10995 00000BEC 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 10996 00000BF0 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 10997 00000BF2 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 10998                                  		;jz	short done_set
 10999                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11000 00000BF6 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11001                                  setaccess:				
 11002 00000BF8 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11003 00000BFD 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11004 00000C01 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11005                                  done_set:				
 11006 00000C05 F8                      		clc
 11007                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11008 00000C06 58                      		pop	ax
 11009 00000C07 C3                      		retn
 11010                                  
 11011                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11012                                  
 11013                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11014                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11015                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11016                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11017                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11018                                  
 11019                                  again:	
 11020 00000C08 E87004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11021 00000C0B 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11022 00000C0E 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11023                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11024 00000C10 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11025 00000C11 C3                      		retn
 11026                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11027                                  
 11028                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11029 00000C12 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11030 00000C14 C3                      		retn
 11031

 11041                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11042                                  ;
 11043                                  ; NOTE: GetAccessFlag/SetAccessFlag is unpublished function.
 11044                                  ;
 11045                                  ;      This function is intended to give the user to control the
 11046                                  ;      bds table flags of unformatted_media bit.
 11047                                  ;      GetAccessFlag will show the status -
 11048                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 disk i/o not allowed
 11049                                  ;						1 disk i/o allowed
 11050                                  ;      SetAccessFlag will set/reset the unformatted_media bit in flags -
 11051                                  ;	 a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 allow disk i/o
 11052                                  ;						1 disallow disk i/o

 11136                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11137                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11138                                  ;
 11139                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11140                                  ;
 11141                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11142                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11143                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11144                                  ;
 11145                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11146                                  
 11147                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11148                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11149                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11150 00000C45 E883F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11151 00000C48 06                      		push	es
 11152 00000C49 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11153 00000C4D 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11154                                  					; RAWIO
 11155 00000C52 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11156 00000C56 07                      		pop	es
 11157 00000C57 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11158                                  
 11159                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11160                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11161                                  
 11162                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11163 00000C59 BE[160C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11164                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11165                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11166 00000C5C A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11167 00000C5E 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11168                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11169 00000C60 BE[290C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11170                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11171                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11172                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11173 00000C63 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11174 00000C65 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11175 00000C67 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11176 00000C6A 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11177 00000C6C 98                      		cbw
 11178 00000C6D D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11179 00000C6F 46                      		inc	si
 11180 00000C70 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11181 00000C72 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11182                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11183 00000C75 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11184                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11185                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11186 00000C7A B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11187 00000C7C C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code

 11205                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)

 11421                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11422                                  
 11423                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11424                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11425                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11426                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11427                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11428                                  ;
 11429                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11430                                  ;
 11431                                  ; output:
 11432                                  ;	for status call:
 11433                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11434                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11435                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11436                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11437                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11438                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11439                                  ;
 11440                                  ;	for format track:
 11441                                  ;		carry set if error
 11442                                  ;
 11443                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11444                                  
 11445                                  ; 16/03/2019
 11446                                  
 11447                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11448                                  FormatTrack:
 11449 00000D97 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]

 11593 00000E7C 8B0E[3905]              		mov	cx, [sectorspertrack]
 11594                                  
 11595                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11596                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11597                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11598                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11599                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to
 11600                                  		; VerifyTrack_Err. If not multiply the number of tracks by the
 11601                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 11602                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 11603                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay
 11604                                  		; we initalise cx to the total sectors. use ax as a temporary
 11605                                  		; register.
 11606                                  
 11607                                  					; Special function requested?

 11609 00000E83 7421                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack

 11612 00000E89 752C                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #tracks > 255
 11613 00000E8B F6E1                    		mul	cl
 11614 00000E8D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11615 00000E8F 7526                    		jnz	short VerifyTrack_Err ; #sectors > 255	
 11616 00000E91 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax

 11618 00000E93 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+35], 1
 11619                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11620                                  					; fnon_removable
 11621 00000E98 740C                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 11622                                  					; Multitrack operation = on?
 11623                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11624                                  		; 19/10/2022

 11626                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11627                                  		;;test	ds:multrk_flag,	80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11628 00000E9F 7405                    		jz	short NormVerifyTrack
 11629 00000EA1 C606[3605]01            		mov	byte [multitrk_format_flag], 1

 11683                                  ReadWriteTrack:	
 11684                                  		; save bds pointer segment so we can use it to access
 11685                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register
 11686                                  		; assignment for accessing packets
 11687

 11696 00000EDF 268B4705                		mov	ax, [es:bx+5]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_FIRSTSECTOR]
 11697 00000EE3 268B4F07                		mov	cx, [es:bx+7]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_SECTORSTOREADWRITE]
 11698 00000EE7 26C45F09                		les	bx, [es:bx+9]	; [es:bx+A_TRACKREADWRITEPACKET.TRWP_TRANSFERADDRESS]
 11699                                  					; Get transfer address
 11700

 11702

 11704 00000EEF 07                      		pop	es
 11705                                  
 11706                                  		; Fall into TrackIo
 11707                                  
 11708                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11709                                  
 11710                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11711                                  
 11712                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11713                                  ;
 11714                                  ; TrackIo:
 11715                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11716                                  ;
 11717                                  ;   input:
 11718                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11719                                  ;		  3 = write
 11720                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11721                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11722                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11723                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11724                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11725                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11726                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11727                                  ;
 11728                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11729                                  
 11730                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11731                                  		
 11732                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11733                                  TrackIo:	
 11734                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11735 00000EF0 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11736 00000EF4 E844F9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11737 00000EF7 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11738                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11739 00000EFC 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11740 00000EFE 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11741 00000EFF 51                      		push	cx
 11742 00000F00 E896FA                  		call	iosetup
 11743 00000F03 59                      		pop	cx
 11744 00000F04 58                      		pop	ax
 11745                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 11746 00000F05 BE[3B05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 11747 00000F08 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11748 00000F0A D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11749 00000F0C 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11750                                  
 11751                                  		; WE WANT:
 11752                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11753                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11754                                  		
 11755 00000F0E BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11756                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11757 00000F11 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 11758                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11759                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11760 00000F16 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 11761                                  		
 11762 00000F18 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 11763                                  ionextsector:				
 11764 00000F1A 51                      		push	cx
 11765 00000F1B 52                      		push	dx
 11766 00000F1C 46                      		inc	si
 11767 00000F1D 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 11768                                  					; the track table
 11769 00000F1E AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 11770 00000F1F A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 11771                                  
 11772                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 11773                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11774                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11775                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 11776                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 11777                                  		
 11778                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11779 00000F22 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11780                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11781                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 11782 00000F27 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 11783                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11784 00000F29 F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 11785                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11786                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 11787 00000F2E 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 11788 00000F30 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 11789 00000F34 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11790 00000F36 E81DFB                  		call	Disk
 11791 00000F39 5A                      		pop	dx
 11792 00000F3A 59                      		pop	cx
 11793 00000F3B F8                      		clc
 11794 00000F3C C3                      		retn
 11795                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11796                                  
 11797                                  IoRemovable:				
 11798 00000F3D AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 11799                                  					; table	and save it
 11800 00000F3E 50                      		push	ax
 11801 00000F3F 56                      		push	si
 11802 00000F40 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 11803 00000F41 50                      		push	ax
 11804 00000F42 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 11805                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 11806 00000F46 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11807 00000F4A 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 11808 00000F4D 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 11809 00000F50 58                      		pop	ax
 11810 00000F51 1F                      		pop	ds
 11811 00000F52 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 11812 00000F54 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax
 11813 00000F57 E8FCFA                  		call	Disk
 11814 00000F5A 5E                      		pop	si		; Advance buffer pointer by adding
 11815                                  					; sector size
 11816 00000F5B 58                      		pop	ax
 11817 00000F5C E81D00                  		call	SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize
 11818 00000F5F 01C3                    		add	bx, ax
 11819 00000F61 5A                      		pop	dx
 11820 00000F62 59                      		pop	cx
 11821 00000F63 E2B5                    		loop	ionextsector
 11822 00000F65 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11823                                  		;jz	short NoNeedDone
 11824                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11825 00000F6A 7404                    		je	short NoNeedDone2
 11826 00000F6C E872FA                  		call	done		; set time of last access, and reset
 11827                                  					; entries in Dpt.
 11828                                  NoNeedDone:				
 11829 00000F6F F8                      		clc
 11830                                  NoNeedDone2:
 11831 00000F70 C3                      		retn
 11832                                  
 11833                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11834                                  
 11835                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11836                                  ;
 11837                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 11838                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 11839                                  ; are permissible.
 11840                                  ;
 11841                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 11842                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 11843                                  ; All other registers preserved
 11844                                  ;
 11845                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11846                                  
 11847                                  SectSizeToSectIndex:	
 11848 00000F71 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 11849                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 11850 00000F74 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 11851 00000F76 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 11852 00000F78 C3                      		retn
 11853                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11854                                  
 11855                                  OneK:					
 11856 00000F79 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 11857 00000F7B C3                      		retn
 11858                                  
 11859                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11860                                  
 11861                                  
 11862                                  SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize:
 11863 00000F7C 88C1                    		mov	cl, al
 11864 00000F7E B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 11865 00000F81 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 11866 00000F83 C3                      		retn
 11867                                  
 11868                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11869                                  
 11870                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11871                                  
 11872                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11873                                  ;
 11874                                  ; SetDASD
 11875                                  ;
 11876                                  ; Set up the rom for formatting.
 11877                                  ; we have to tell the rom bios what type of disk is in the drive.
 11878                                  ;
 11879                                  ; On Input   - ES:di - Points to bds
 11880                                  ;
 11881                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

 11883                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11884                                  SetDasd:	
 11885 00000F84 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1 ;

 11887 00000F89 740C                    		jz	short DoSetDasd
 11888                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11889 00000F8B 26F6452380              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 80h
 11890                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 80h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11891                                  					; set_dasd_true
 11892 00000F90 744A                    		jz	short DasdHasBeenSet
 11893                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11894 00000F92 268065237F              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 7Fh
 11895                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FF7Fh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11896                                  					; ~set_dasd_true
 11897                                  DoSetDasd:				
 11898 00000F97 C606[3906]00            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 0 ; Reset it
 11899 00000F9C C606[3B01]50            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 50h ; Format gap for 48tpi disks
 11900 00000FA1 B004                    		mov	al, 4
 11901 00000FA3 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11902                                  					; DEV_3INCH720KB
 11903 00000FA8 741A                    		jz	short DoSet
 11904 00000FAA 26807D2201              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11905                                  					; DEV_5INCH96TPI
 11906 00000FAF 7404                    		jz	short GotBig
 11907 00000FB1 B001                    		mov	al, 1
 11908 00000FB3 EB0F                    		jmp	short DoSet
 11909                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11910                                  
 11911                                  GotBig:					
 11912 00000FB5 B002                    		mov	al, 2		; 160/320k in a	1.2 meg	drive
 11913 00000FB7 803E[3706]00            		cmp	byte [mediatype], 0
 11914 00000FBC 7506                    		jnz	short DoSet
 11915                                  		;mov	al, 3		; 1.2meg in a 1.2meg drive
 11916                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11917                                  		;inc	al  ; al = 3
 11918                                  		; 18/12/2022
 11919 00000FBE 40                      		inc	ax  ; al = 3
 11920 00000FBF C606[3B01]54            		mov	byte [gap_patch], 54h
 11921                                  DoSet:					
 11922 00000FC4 1E                      		push	ds
 11923 00000FC5 56                      		push	si
 11924 00000FC6 8E1E[1A00]              		mov	ds, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vectors
 11925                                  
 11926 00000FCA C5367800                		lds	si, [DSKADR]
 11927                                  		;lds	si, [78h]	; [DSKADR]  (Int 1Eh)
 11928                                  		;;lds	si, ds:78h		
 11929                                  
 11930 00000FCE C644090F                		mov	byte [si+9], 0Fh ;
 11931                                  					; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11932 00000FD2 5E                      		pop	si
 11933 00000FD3 1F                      		pop	ds
 11934 00000FD4 B417                    		mov	ah, 17h
 11935 00000FD6 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]
 11936 00000FDA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 11937                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 11938                                  DasdHasBeenSet:				
 11939 00000FDC 268A6513                		mov	ah, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 11940 00000FE0 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah
 11941 00000FE4 C3                      		retn
 11942                                  
 11943                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11944                                  
 11945                                  ; 16/10/2022
 11946                                  
 11947                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11948                                  ;
 11949                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 11950                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 11951                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 11952                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 11953                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 11954                                  ;
 11955                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 11956                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 11957                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 11958                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 11959                                  ;
 11960                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 11961                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 11962                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 11963                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 11964                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 11965                                  ;
 11966                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11967                                  
 11968                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11969                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 11970 00000FE5 51                      		push	cx
 11971 00000FE6 52                      		push	dx
 11972                                  
 11973                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 11974                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 11975                                  
 11976 00000FE7 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 11977 00000FEC 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 11978 00000FEE 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 11979 00000FF0 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11980 00000FF5 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 11981 00000FF7 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 11982                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11983                                  
 11984                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 11985 00000FF9 06                      		push	es
 11986 00000FFA 56                      		push	si
 11987 00000FFB 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 11988 00000FFF 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 11989                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 11990                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 11991 00001004 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 11992 00001008 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 11993                                  
 11994                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 11995                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 11996                                  
 11997 0000100C 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 11998 00001011 5E                      		pop	si
 11999 00001012 07                      		pop	es
 12000                                  
 12001                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 12002 00001013 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12003 00001017 49                      		dec	cx
 12004 00001018 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12005 0000101B D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12006 0000101D D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12007 0000101F 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12008 00001021 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12009 00001025 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12010 00001029 06                      		push	es
 12011 0000102A 1E                      		push	ds
 12012 0000102B 56                      		push	si
 12013 0000102C 57                      		push	di
 12014 0000102D B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12015 0000102F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12016                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12017 00001031 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12018 00001033 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12019 00001038 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12020 0000103A 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12021 0000103B 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12022 0000103F 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12023                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12024                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12025 00001044 8936[3A06]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12026 00001048 8C06[3C06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12027 0000104C 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12028                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12029 00001050 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12030                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12031 00001055 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12032 0000105A C606[3806]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12033                                  skip_disk_base_setting:			
 12034 0000105F 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12035                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12036 00001061 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12037 00001064 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12038                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12039                                  
 12040                                  FormaStatErr:
 12041                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12042 00001066 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12043                                  				
 12044 00001068 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 12045                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12046 0000106B 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12047 0000106D 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR
 12048 00001070 7402                    		jz	short FormatStatTimeOut
 12049                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12050                                  		;dec	al
 12051                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12052 00001072 48                      		dec	ax
 12053                                  		; al = 2
 12054                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12055                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12056                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12057                                  
 12058                                  FormatStatIllegalComb:
 12059                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12060                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 12061                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12062 00001073 48                      		dec	ax
 12063                                  		; al = 2				
 12064                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12065                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12066                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12067                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12068                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12069                                  
 12070                                  FormatStatTimeOut:			
 12071                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12072                                  		; al = 3
 12073                                  		;mov	al, 3		; Function supported, but
 12074                                  					; Media	not present.
 12075                                  PopStatRet:				
 12076 00001074 5F                      		pop	di
 12077 00001075 5E                      		pop	si
 12078 00001076 1F                      		pop	ds
 12079 00001077 07                      		pop	es
 12080                                  SetMediaRet:

 12082 00001079 59                      		pop	cx
 12083 0000107A C3                      		retn

 12086                                  
 12087                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12088                                  
 12089                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12090                                  ;
 12091                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12092                                  ;
 12093                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12094                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12095                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12096                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12097                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12098                                  ;
 12099                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12100                                  
 12101                                  ResetDisk:	
 12102 0000107B 50                      		push	ax
 12103 0000107C 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12104                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12105 00001081 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12106                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12107 00001083 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12108                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12109 00001088 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12110 0000108A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12111                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12112 0000108C C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12113                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12114 00001091 58                      		pop	ax
 12115 00001092 C3                      		retn
 12116                                  
 12117                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12118                                  
 12119                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12120                                  
 12121                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12122                                  ;
 12123                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12124                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12125                                  ;
 12126                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12127                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12128                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12129                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12130                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12131                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12132                                  ;
 12133                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12134                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12135                                  ;
 12136                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12137                                  
 12138                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12139                                  ToRom:	
 12140 00001093 53                      		push	bx
 12141 00001094 56                      		push	si
 12142                                  
 12143                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12144                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12145                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12146                                  
 12147 00001095 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12148 0000109A 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12149 0000109C 50                      		push	ax
 12150 0000109D 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12151 0000109E 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12152                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12153 000010A3 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12154 000010A4 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12155                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12156 000010A8 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12157                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12158                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12159 000010AD 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12160 000010B1 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12161                                  		
 12162 000010B5 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12163 000010B8 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12164 000010BC A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12165 000010BF 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12166                                  					; Important for	format
 12167 000010C3 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12168                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12169                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12170 000010C8 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12171 000010C9 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12172 000010CB 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12173                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12174 000010D0 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12175 000010D1 58                      		pop	ax
 12176                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12177 000010D2 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12178 000010D6 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12179 000010D8 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12180 000010DC 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12181 000010E0 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12182 000010E1 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12183 000010E5 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12184 000010E7 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12185 000010E8 5E                      		pop	si
 12186 000010E9 5B                      		pop	bx
 12187 000010EA C3                      		retn
