 12190                                  
 12191                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12192                                  
 12193                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12194                                  
 12195                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12196                                  ;
 12197                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12198                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12199                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12200                                  ;
 12201                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12202                                  
 12203                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12204                                  ioctl_getown:
 12205 000010EB E8DDF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12206 000010EE 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12207                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12208 000010F2 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12209                                  ownloop:				
 12210 000010F6 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12211 000010FA 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12212                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12213 000010FC 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12214                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12215                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12216 00001101 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12217                                  getnextBDS:				
 12218 00001103 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12219 00001106 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12220                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12221                                  
 12222                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12223                                  ;
 12224                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12225                                  ; in al to al.
 12226                                  ;
 12227                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12228                                  
 12229                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12230                                  ioctl_setown:
 12231 00001108 E8C0F3                  		call	SetDrive
 12232 0000110B C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12233                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12234 00001110 E828F7                  		call	checksingle
 12235 00001113 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12236                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12237                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12238                                  
 12239                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12240                                  ;
 12241                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12242                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12243                                  ;
 12244                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12245                                  
 12246                                  exitown:				
 12247 00001118 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12248                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12249 0000111A 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12250                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12251                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12252 0000111F 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12253 00001121 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12254                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12255                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12256 00001125 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12257                                  exitnomult:				
 12258 00001127 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12259 0000112B 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12260                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12261                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12262                                  		; cf=0
 12263                                  		;clc
 12264 0000112E C3                      		retn
 12265                                  
 12266                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12267                                  
 12268                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12269                                  
 12270                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12271                                  ;
 12272                                  ; moves the old Dpt that had been saved in TempDpt back to Dpt. this is done
 12273                                  ; only if the first byte of TempDpt is not -1.
 12274                                  ; all registers (including flags) are preserved.
 12275                                  ;
 12276                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12277                                  
 12278                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12279                                  RestoreOldDpt:
 12280                                  		; if we have already restored the disk base table earlier,
 12281                                  		; do not do it again.
 12282                                  	
 12283 0000112F 50                      		push	ax
 12284 00001130 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 12285 00001132 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al	; Reset flag and 
 12286 00001135 8606[3806]              		xchg	al, [media_set_for_format] ; get current flag setting
 12287 00001139 08C0                    		or	al, al

 12289 0000113D 56                      		push	si
 12290 0000113E 1E                      		push	ds
 12291 0000113F 06                      		push	es
 12292 00001140 C536[3A06]              		lds	si, [tempdpt]
 12293                                  
 12294                                  		; 17/10/2022
 12295 00001144 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12296                                  		;mov	es, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12297 00001149 268E06[1A00]            		mov	es, [es:zeroseg]
 12298                                  		;mov	es, es:zeroseg	; CAS -- bleeeech!
 12299                                  
 12300                                  		;mov	es:78h,	si	; [es:DSKADR]
 12301 0000114E 2689367800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], si
 12302                                  		;mov	word ptr es:7Ah, ds ; [es:DSKADR+2]

 12310                                  		; cf=0
 12311                                  		;clc			;  Clear carry

 12313                                  
 12314                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12315                                  
 12316                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12317                                  
 12318                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12319                                  ;	get media id
 12320                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12321                                  ;
 12322                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12323                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12324                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12325                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12326                                  ;
 12327                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12328                                  ;
 12329                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12330                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12331                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12332                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12333                                  ;
 12334                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12335                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12336                                  ;
 12337                                  ; LOGIC:
 12338                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12339                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12340                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12341                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12342                                  ;
 12343                                  ; {
 12344                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12345                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12346                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12347                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12348                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12349                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12350                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12351                                  ;		};
 12352                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12353                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12354                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12355                                  ;		};
 12356                                  ;	else
 12357                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12358                                  ;
 12359                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12360                                  
 12361                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12362                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12363                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12364                                  
 12365                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12366                                  GetMediaId:
 12367 0000115D E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12368 00001160 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12369 00001164 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12370 00001169 E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12371 0000116C 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12372                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12373 0000116E 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12374                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12375 00001173 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12376                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12377 00001175 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12378 00001178 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12379                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12380                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12381 0000117B 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12382 0000117D C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12383 00001181 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12384                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12385 00001185 46                      		inc	si
 12386                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12387                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12388 00001186 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12389 00001189 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12390                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12391                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12392 0000118C F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12393                                  	
 12394                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12395                                  		; cf = 0
 12396                                  		;clc
 12397                                  
 12398 0000118E C3                      		retn
 12399                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12400                                  
 12401                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12402 0000118F B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12403 00001191 F9                      		stc
 12404                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12405 00001192 C3                      		retn
 12406                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12407                                  
 12408                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12409                                  
 12410                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12411                                  ;  set media id
 12412                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12413                                  
 12414                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12415                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12416                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12417                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12418                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12419                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12420                                  ;
 12421                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12422                                  ;
 12423                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12424                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12425                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12426                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12427                                  ;
 12428                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12429                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12430                                  ;
 12431                                  ; logic:
 12432                                  ;
 12433                                  ; {
 12434                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12435                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12436                                  ;	BootIo;
 12437                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12438                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12439                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12440                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12441                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12442                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12443                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12444                                  ;		};
 12445                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12446                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12447                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12448                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12449                                  ;		};
 12450                                  ;	else
 12451                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12452                                  ;
 12453                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12454                                  
 12455                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12456                                  SetMediaId:
 12457 00001193 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12458 00001196 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12459                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12460 0000119A 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12461 0000119C C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12462 000011A1 52                      		push	dx
 12463 000011A2 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12464 000011A5 5A                      		pop	dx
 12465 000011A6 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12466                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12467 000011A8 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12468                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12469 000011AD 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12470 000011AF 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12471                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12472 000011B4 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12473 000011B6 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12474 000011B7 57                      		push	di
 12475 000011B8 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12476 000011B9 07                      		pop	es
 12477 000011BA BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12478 000011BD C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12479 000011C1 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12480 000011C4 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12481 000011C7 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12482                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12483                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12484 000011CA F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12485 000011CC 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12486 000011CD 1F                      		pop	ds
 12487 000011CE 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12488 000011CF 07                      		pop	es
 12489 000011D0 E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12490 000011D3 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12491 000011D5 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12492 000011DA E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12493 000011DD C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12494                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12495                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12496 000011E2 C3                      		retn
 12497                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12498                                  
 12499                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12500 000011E3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12501 000011E5 F9                      		stc
 12502                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12503 000011E6 C3                      		retn
 12504                                  
 12505                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12506                                  
 12507                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12508                                  
 12509                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12510                                  ;	BootIo
 12511                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12512                                  ;
 12513                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12514                                  ;
 12515                                  ; input :
 12516                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12517                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12518                                  ;
 12519                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12520                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12521                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12522                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12523                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12524                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12525                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12526                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12527                                  ;
 12528                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12529                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12530                                  ;
 12531                                  ; logic:
 12532                                  ;
 12533                                  ; {
 12534                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12535                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12536                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12537                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12538                                  ; }
 12539                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12540                                  
 12541                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12542                                  BootIo:	
 12543 000011E7 06                      		push	es
 12544 000011E8 57                      		push	di
 12545 000011E9 53                      		push	bx
 12546 000011EA 1E                      		push	ds
 12547 000011EB 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12548                                  
 12549                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12550                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12551                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12552                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12553                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12554                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12555                                  
 12556 000011EC BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12557 000011EF 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12558 000011F1 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12559 000011F5 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12560 000011F8 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 12561 000011FB 5B                      		pop	bx
 12562 000011FC 5F                      		pop	di
 12563 000011FD 07                      		pop	es
 12564 000011FE C3                      		retn
 12565                                  
 12566                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12567                                  
 12568                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12569                                  
 12570                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12571                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12572                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12573                                  ;
 12574                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12575                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12576                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12577                                  ; history in the flags.
 12578                                  ;
 12579                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12580                                  ;
 12581                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12582                                  ;
 12583                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12584                                  ;
 12585                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12586                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12587                                  ;
 12588                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12589                                  
 12590                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12591 000011FF 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12592 00001203 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12593 00001205 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12594                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12595 00001207 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12596                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12597                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12598 0000120C 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12599 0000120E 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12600 00001213 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12601 00001215 E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12602 00001218 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12603                                  
 12604                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12605                                  
 12606 0000121A B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12607 0000121C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12608                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12609                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12610 0000121E 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12611 00001220 53                      		push	bx
 12612 00001221 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12613                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12614                                  					; physical drive
 12615 00001224 E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12616 00001227 5B                      		pop	bx
 12617                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12618 00001228 C3                      		retn
 12619                                  
 12620                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12621                                  
 12622                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12623                                  
 12624                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12625                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12626                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12627                                  ;
 12628                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12629                                  ;
 12630                                  ; INPUT :
 12631                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12632                                  ;
 12633                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12634                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12635                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12636                                  
 12637                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12638                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12639 00001229 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12640 0000122D C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12641                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12642                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12643 00001230 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12644                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12645 00001232 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12646                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12647                                  					; unformatted_media
 12648 00001237 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12649 00001239 FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12650                                  
 12651                                  GafDone:				
 12652 0000123B 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12653 0000123E C3                      		retn
 12654                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12655                                  
 12656                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12657                                  
 12658                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12659                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12660                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12661                                  ;
 12662                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12663                                  ;
 12664                                  ; input :
 12665                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12666                                  ;
 12667                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12668                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12669                                  
 12670                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12671                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12672 0000123F C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12673 00001243 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12674                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12675 00001246 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12676                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12677                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12678 0000124B 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12679 0000124F 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12680                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12681 00001251 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12682                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12683                                  					; unformatted_media
 12684                                  saf_Done:				
 12685 00001256 C3                      		retn
 12686                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12687                                  
 12688                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12689                                  
 12690                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12691                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12692                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12693                                  ;
 12694                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12695                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12696                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12697                                  ;
 12698                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12699                                  
 12700                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12701                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12702 00001257 06                      		push	es
 12703 00001258 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12704 0000125C 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12705                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12706 00001260 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12707                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12708 00001262 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12709 00001264 0E                      		push	cs
 12710 00001265 07                      		pop	es
 12711 00001266 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12712                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12713 00001269 BF[3A0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12714                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12715                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12716 0000126C 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12717 0000126E F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12718 00001270 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12719 00001272 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12720                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12721                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12722                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12723                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12724                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12725                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12726                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12727 00001275 07                      		pop	es
 12728                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12729                                  		; cf = 0
 12730                                  		;clc
 12731 00001276 C3                      		retn
 12732                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12733                                  nosupport:				
 12734 00001277 07                      		pop	es
 12735 00001278 E95AEE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12736                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12737                                  
 12738                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12739                                  
 12740                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12741                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12742                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12743                                  ;
 12744                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12745                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 12746                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 12747                                  ;	    drive)
 12748                                  ;
 12749                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 12750                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 12751                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 12752                                  ;
 12753                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 12754                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 12755                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 12756                                  ;
 12757                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 12758                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 12759                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12760                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12761                                  ;
 12762                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 12763                                  ;
 12764                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 12765                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 12766                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 12767                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 12768                                  ; 
 12769                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12770                                  
 12771                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12772                                  SenseMediaType:				
 12773 0000127B C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 12774 0000127F C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12775                                  		; 10/10/2022
 12776                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 12777 00001282 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 12778 00001284 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 12779                                  		;
 12780 00001286 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12781                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 12782                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12783                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 12784 0000128A B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 12785                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 12786 0000128C CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 12787 0000128E 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 12788 00001290 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 12789                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 12790 00001292 FEC8                    		dec	al
 12791 00001294 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 12792 00001296 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12793 00001298 0404                    		add	al, 4
 12794 0000129A 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 12795 0000129C 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12796 0000129E 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 12797 000012A0 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 12798                                  GotMediaType:				
 12799 000012A2 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 12800                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12801                                  		; cf = 0
 12802                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 12803 000012A5 C3                      		retn
 12804                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12805                                  
 12806                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 12807 000012A6 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 12808 000012A9 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error

 12810 000012AD 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 12811 000012B0 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 12812                                  UnknownMediaType:

 12814                                  SenseErrExit:

 12817 000012B7 C3                      		retn

 12823                                  
 12824                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12825                                  
 12826                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12827                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 12828                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12829                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12830                                  
 12831                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 12832                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 12833                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 12834                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 12835                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 12836                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 12837                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 12838                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 12839                                  ;
 12840                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 12841                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 12842                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 12843                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 12844                                  ;
 12845                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 12846                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 12847                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 12848                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 12849                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 12850                                  ;
 12851                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 12852                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 12853                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 12854                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 12855                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 12856                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 12857                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 12858                                  
 12859                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 12860                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 12861                                  
 12862                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12863                                  
 12864                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 12865 000012B8 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 12866 000012BB 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 12867 000012BD 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 12868 000012C0 743B                    		jz	short mine
 12869                                  
 12870                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 12871                                  
 12872 000012C2 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 12873 000012C5 7479                    		jz	short win386call
 12874 000012C7 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 12875 000012CA 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 12876 000012CC E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 12877                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12878                                  
 12879                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 12880 000012CF CF                      		iret
 12881                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12882                                  
 12883                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 12884 000012D0 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 12885 000012D1 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 12886                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 12887                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 12888                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 12889 000012D3 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 12890                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12891                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 12892                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 12893                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 12894                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 12895 000012D8 FF36[B400]              		push	word [Orig13]
 12896 000012DC FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 12897 000012E0 FF36[0601]              		push	word [Old13]
 12898 000012E4 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 12899                                  
 12900                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 12901                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 12902                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 12903                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 12904 000012E8 8916[B400]              		mov	[Orig13], dx
 12905 000012EC A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 12906 000012EF 891E[0601]              		mov	[Old13], bx
 12907 000012F3 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 12908                                  
 12909 000012F7 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 12910 000012F8 5B                      		pop	bx
 12911 000012F9 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 12912 000012FA 5A                      		pop	dx
 12913 000012FB 58                      		pop	ax
 12914                                  i2f_iret:				
 12915 000012FC CF                      		iret

 12950                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of

 12964                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data

 12973 00001335 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]

 12975 0000133A C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 12976                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 12977                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022

 12983                                  
 12984                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 12985                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 12986                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 12987                                  
 12988                                  win386call:				
 12989 00001340 1E                      		push	ds
 12990 00001341 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 12991                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12992                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 12993 00001346 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 12994                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 12995 00001348 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 12996 0000134A 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 12997                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 12998 0000134C 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 12999                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13000 0000134E F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13001                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13002 00001351 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13003                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 13004 00001353 8026[CE08]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 13005 00001358 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 13006                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13007                                  
 13008                                  Win386Init:	
 13009                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13010 0000135A F6C201                  		test	dl, 1			
 13011                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13012 0000135D 7512                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13013                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 13014 0000135F 800E[CE08]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1
 13015                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 13016                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 13017 00001364 891E[9C08]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx
 13018 00001368 8C06[9E08]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es
 13019                                  		;mov	bx, offset Win386_SI ; point ES:BX to Win386_SI
 13020 0000136C BB[9A08]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 13021 0000136F 1E                      		push	ds
 13022 00001370 07                      		pop	es
 13023                                  win_iret:				
 13024 00001371 1F                      		pop	ds
 13025                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022	
 13026 00001372 EB88                    		jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 13027                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13028                                  
 13029                                  handle_multmult:			
 13030 00001374 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 13031 00001376 7515                    		jnz	short try_2
 13032 00001378 1E                      		push	ds
 13033 00001379 E84700                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13034                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13035                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 13036                                  		;dec	bx
 13037 0000137C BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 13038 0000137F 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 13039 00001381 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 13040 00001383 F7D3                    		not	bx
 13041 00001385 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 13042 00001387 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 13043 00001389 43                      		inc	bx
 13044                                  try_1:					
 13045 0000138A 1F                      		pop	ds
 13046 0000138B EBE5                    		jmp	short ii2f_iret
 13047                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13048                                  
 13049                                  try_2:					
 13050 0000138D 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 13051 0000138F 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 13052 00001391 1E                      		push	ds
 13053                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13054                                  		;xor	di, di
 13055                                  		;dec	di
 13056 00001392 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 13057 00001395 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
 13058 00001397 E82900                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13059 0000139A 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 13060 0000139D 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA
 13061 0000139F F7DF                    		neg	di		; free space in HMA
 13062 000013A1 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 13063 000013A3 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 13064                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13065                                  		;sub	di, di
 13066                                  		;dec	di
 13067 000013A5 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh
 13068 000013A8 EB16                    		jmp	short InsuffHMA
 13069                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13070                                  
 13071                                  try_4:					
 13072                                  		;mov	di, ds:FreeHMAPtr
 13073 000013AA 8B3E[F508]              		mov	di, [FreeHMAPtr]
 13074 000013AE 83C30F                  		add	bx, 15
 13075                                  		;and	bx, 0FFF0h
 13076                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13077 000013B1 80E3F0                  		and	bl, 0F0h
 13078                                  		;add	ds:FreeHMAPtr, bx ; update the free pointer	
 13079 000013B4 011E[F508]              		add	[FreeHMAPtr], bx
 13080 000013B8 7506                    		jnz	short InsuffHMA
 13081 000013BA C706[F508]FFFF          		mov	word [FreeHMAPtr], 0FFFFh ; -1
 13082                                  		;mov	ds:FreeHMAPtr, 0FFFFh
 13083                                  					; no more HMA if we have wrapped
 13084                                  InsuffHMA:				
 13085 000013C0 1F                      		pop	ds
 13086                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13087                                  try_3:		
 13088 000013C1 EBAF                    		jmp	short ii2f_iret
 13089                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13090                                  
 13091                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13092                                  ;try_3:					
 13093                                  		;jmp	ii2f_iret
