 14140                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14141                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14142                                  
 14143                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14144 0000176E 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14145 00001770 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14145 00001779 736B6574746520666F-
 14145 00001782 7220647269766520   
 14146                                  
 14147                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14148 0000178A 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14148 00001793 65737320616E79206B-
 14148 0000179C 6579207768656E2072-
 14148 000017A5 656164790D0A       
 14149 000017AB 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14150                                  
 14151                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14152                                  
 14153                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14154                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14155                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14156                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14157                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14158                                  
 14159                                  chkopcnt:		
 14160 000017AD 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14161 000017B2 C3                      		retn
 14162                                  
 14163                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14164                                  
 14165                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14166                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14167                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14168                                  ;
 14169                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14170                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14171                                  
 14172                                  mediacheck:	
 14173 000017B3 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14174 000017B6 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14175 000017B8 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14176 000017BB 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14177 000017BD E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14178 000017C0 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14179 000017C2 50                      		push	ax
 14180 000017C3 52                      		push	dx
 14181 000017C4 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14182                                  					; set logical drive number
 14183 000017C8 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14184 000017CA CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14185                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14186                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14187 000017CC 5A                      		pop	dx
 14188 000017CD 58                      		pop	ax
 14189 000017CE 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14190 000017D0 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14191                                  
 14192                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14193                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14194                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14195                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14196                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14197                                  ; status.
 14198                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14199 000017D3 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14200 000017D7 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14201                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14202                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14203                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14204                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14205 000017DB 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14206                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14207                                  
 14208                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14209                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14210                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14211                                  
 14212 000017DD 50                      		push	ax
 14213 000017DE 51                      		push	cx
 14214 000017DF 52                      		push	dx
 14215 000017E0 E870ED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14216 000017E3 5A                      		pop	dx
 14217 000017E4 59                      		pop	cx
 14218 000017E5 58                      		pop	ax
 14219 000017E6 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14220 000017E8 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14221                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14222 000017EA 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14223                                  mediaret:				
 14224 000017EC C3                      		retn
 14225                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14226                                  
 14227                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14228                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14229                                  ; or write.
 14230                                  
 14231                                  mediadovolid:				
 14232 000017ED E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14233 000017F0 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14234 000017F2 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14235 000017F5 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14236 000017F7 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14237                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14238                                  
 14239                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14240                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14241                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14242                                  ; dos.
 14243                                  ;
 14244                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14245                                  
 14246                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14247                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14248                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14249                                  
 14250                                  checklatchio:	
 14251                                  
 14252                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14253                                  			
 14254 000017FA E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14255 000017FD 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14256                                  
 14257                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14258                                  
 14259 000017FF E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14260 00001802 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14261                                  
 14262                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14263                                  ; expensive verification.
 14264                                  
 14265 00001804 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14266 00001807 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14267 00001809 E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14268 0000180C 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14269 0000180E 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14270 00001810 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14271 00001812 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14272                                  checklatchret:				
 14273 00001815 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14274                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14275 00001818 F9                      		stc
 14276 00001819 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14277                                  checkret:				
 14278 0000181A C3                      		retn
 14279                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14280                                  
 14281                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14282                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14283                                  ;
 14284                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14285                                  
 14286                                  checkfatvid:				
 14287 0000181B E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14288 0000181E 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14289 00001820 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14290                                  
 14291                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14292                                  
 14293                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14294                                  
 14295                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14296                                  
 14297                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14298                                  ;
 14299                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14300                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14301                                  ;
 14302                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14303                                  ;
 14304                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14305                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14306                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14307                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14308                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14309                                  ;
 14310                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14311                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14312                                  ; routine.)
 14313                                  ;
 14314                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14315                                  
 14316                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14317                                  check_vid:
 14318                                  
 14319                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14320                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14321                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14322                                  
 14323 00001822 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14324                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14325                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14326 00001827 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14327 00001829 E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14328 0000182C 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14329 0000182E 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14330 00001830 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14331                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14332 00001835 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14333                                  					; if not fat system
 14334 00001837 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14335 0000183A 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14336 0000183C E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14337 0000183F BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14338                                  					; definitely changed
 14339 00001842 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14340                                  
 14341 00001844 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14342                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14343 00001845 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14344                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14345                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14346                                  		;clc
 14347                                  checkfatret:				
 14348 00001848 C3                      		retn
 14349                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14350                                  
 14351                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14352                                  changed_drv:
 14353 00001849 F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14354 0000184A C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14355                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14356 0000184F C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14357                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14358                                  
 14359                                  ; extended id check
 14360                                  
 14361                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14362                                  
 14363                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14364                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14365                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14366                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14367                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14368                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14369                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14370                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14371                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14372                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14373                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14374                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14375                                  ;
 14376                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14377                                  
 14378                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14379                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14380 00001850 50                      		push	ax
 14381                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14382                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14383 00001851 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14384 00001854 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14385 00001858 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14386 0000185A A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14387 0000185D 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14388 00001861 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14389 00001863 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14390                                  					; don't know
 14391 00001865 58                      		pop	ax
 14392 00001866 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14393                                  					; reset the flag
 14394                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14395                                  
 14396                                  ext_changed:				
 14397 00001868 58                      		pop	ax
 14398 00001869 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14399                                  					; disk changed!
 14400                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14401                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14402                                  		;clc
 14403 0000186C EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14404                                  
 14405                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14406                                  
 14407                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14408                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14409                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14410                                  ;
 14411                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14412                                  
 14413                                  checkio:				
 14414 0000186E 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14415 00001871 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14416 00001873 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14417 00001876 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14418 00001878 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14419 0000187B 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14420 0000187D E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14421 00001880 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14422 00001882 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14423 00001884 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14424 00001886 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14425 00001887 C3                      		retn
 14426                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14427                                  
 14428                                  checkioerr:				
 14429 00001888 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14430                                  
 14431                                  checkioret:				
 14432 0000188B F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14433 0000188C E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14434                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14435                                  
 14436                                  no_error_map:				
 14437 0000188F E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14438                                  
 14439                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14440                                  
 14441                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14442                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14443                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14444                                  
 14445                                  returnvid:		
 14446 00001892 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14447                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14448 00001895 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14449 00001898 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14450 0000189A F9                      		stc
 14451 0000189B C3                      		retn
 14452                                  
 14453                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14454                                  
 14455                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14456                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14457                                  ;
 14458                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14459                                  ; **trashes si**
 14460                                  
 14461                                  media_set_vid:				
 14462 0000189C BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14463                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14464                                  
 14465                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14466                                  
 14467                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14468                                  
 14469                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14470                                  
 14471                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14472                                  vid_into_packet:
 14473 0000189F 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14474 000018A0 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14475 000018A4 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14476 000018A7 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14477 000018A9 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14478 000018AC 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14479 000018AF 1F                      		pop	ds
 14480                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14481 000018B0 C3                      		retn
 14482                                  
 14483                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14484                                  
 14485                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14486                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14487                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14488                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14489                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14490                                  ;
 14491                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14492                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14493                                  ;
 14494                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14495                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14496                                  ;		carry set
 14497                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14498                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14499                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14500                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14501                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14502                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14503                                  ;
 14504                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14505                                  
 14506                                  hidensity:
 14507                                  
 14508                                  ; check for correct drive
 14509                                  		
 14510                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14511 000018B1 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14512                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14513                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14514 000018B6 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14515                                  
 14516                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14517                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14518                                  
 14519 000018B8 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14520 000018BD 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14521                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14522                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14523 000018BF 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14524 000018C2 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14525                                  
 14526                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14527                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14528                                  
 14529 000018C4 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14530                                  					; ffOther
 14531 000018C9 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14532 000018CB 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14533                                  					; ff288
 14534 000018D0 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14535 000018D2 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14536 000018D4 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14537                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14538                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14539 000018D7 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14540                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14541                                  					; 2 sides
 14542 000018DA BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14543                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14544                                  					; & head max
 14545 000018DD 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14546 000018E0 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14547                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14548                                  
 14549                                  Is720K:					
 14550 000018E3 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14551 000018E6 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14552                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14553                                  
 14554                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14555                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14556                                  		;retn
 14557                                  
 14558                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14559                                  
 14560                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14561                                  
 14562                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14563                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14564                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14565                                  ;
 14566                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14567                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14568                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14569                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14570                                  ;
 14571                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14572                                  ;
 14573                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14574                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14575                                  
 14576                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14577 000018E9 06                      		push	es
 14578 000018EA 57                      		push	di
 14579                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14580                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14581 000018EB C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14582                                  
 14583                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14584                                  
 14585                                  scan_bds:				
 14586 000018EF 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14587 000018F3 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14588                                  
 14589                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14590                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14591                                  
 14592 000018F5 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14593                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14594                                  get_next_bds:				
 14595 000018F9 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14596                                  					; go to	next bds
 14597 000018FC 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14598 000018FF 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14599 00001901 5F                      		pop	di
 14600 00001902 07                      		pop	es
 14601 00001903 C3                      		retn
 14602                                  
 14603                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14604                                  
 14605                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14606                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14607                                  ;
 14608                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14609                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14610                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14611                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14612                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14613                                  
 14614                                  checkromchange:	
 14615                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14616                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14617 00001904 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14618                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14619                                  					; fchanged
 14620 00001909 C3                      		retn
 14621                                  
 14622                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14623                                  
 14624                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14625                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14626                                  ;
 14627                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14628                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14629                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14630                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14631                                  
 14632                                  resetchanged:	
 14633                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14634                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14635 0000190A 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14636                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14637                                  					; ~fchanged
 14638 0000190F C3                      		retn
 14639                                  
 14640                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14641                                  
 14642                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14643                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14644                                  ;
 14645                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14646                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14647                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14648                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14649                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14650                                  
 14651                                  haschange:
 14652                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14653                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14654 00001910 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14655                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14656                                  					; fchangeline
 14657 00001915 C3                      		retn
 14658                                  
 14659                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14660                                  
 14661                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14662                                  
 14663                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14664                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14665                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14666                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14667                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14668                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14669                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14670                                  
 14671                                  ; set_volume_id
 14672                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14673                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14674                                  ;
 14675                                  ;   on entry:
 14676                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14677                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14678                                  ;
 14679                                  ;   on exit:
 14680                                  ;	carry clear:
 14681                                  ;	   successful call
 14682                                  ;	carry set
 14683                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14684                                  
 14685                                  set_volume_id:				
 14686 00001916 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14687 00001917 50                      		push	ax
 14688 00001918 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14689 0000191B 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14690 0000191D E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14691 00001920 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14692 00001922 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14693 00001925 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14694                                  setvret:				
 14695                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14696                                  		; cf = 0
 14697                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14698 00001928 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14699 00001929 5A                      		pop	dx
 14700 0000192A C3                      		retn
 14701                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14702                                  
 14703                                  seterr:					
 14704 0000192B 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14705 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14706 0000192D C3                      		retn
 14707                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14708 0000192E 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14709                                  
 14710                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14711                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14712                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14713                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14714                                  
 14715                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14716                                  
 14717                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14718                                  
 14719                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14720                                  ;
 14721                                  ;   on entry:
 14722                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14723                                  ;
 14724                                  ;   on exit:
 14725                                  ;	carry clear
 14726                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14727                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14728                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14729                                  ;
 14730                                  ;	carry set:
 14731                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14732                                  
 14733                                  read_volume_id:
 14734 00001930 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14735 00001931 51                      		push	cx
 14736 00001932 53                      		push	bx
 14737 00001933 50                      		push	ax
 14738 00001934 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14739 00001935 57                      		push	di
 14740 00001936 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14741 00001937 07                      		pop	es
 14742 00001938 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14743 0000193B BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14744 0000193E B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14745 00001941 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14746 00001943 5F                      		pop	di
 14747 00001944 07                      		pop	es
 14748 00001945 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14749                                  					; # of fats
 14750 00001949 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14751                                  					; sectors / fat
 14752 0000194D F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14753 0000194F 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14754                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14755                                  					;
 14756                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14757                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14758 00001953 2EA3[2E19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14759                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14760                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14761 00001957 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14762                                  					; # root dir entries
 14763 0000195B B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14764 0000195D D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14765 0000195F 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14766                                  next_sec:				
 14767 00001961 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14768 00001962 2EA1[2E19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14769                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14770                                  					; get sector #
 14771 00001966 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14772                                  					; sectors / track
 14773 0000196A 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14774 0000196C F7F1                    		div	cx
 14775                                  
 14776                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14777                                  
 14778 0000196E 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14779                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14780 0000196F 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14781 00001971 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14782 00001973 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14783                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14784 00001977 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14785 00001979 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14786 0000197B E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14787                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14788 0000197E 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14789 00001980 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14790 00001983 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14791                                  fvid_loop:				
 14792 00001985 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14793 00001988 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14794 0000198A 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14795 0000198D 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14796 0000198F 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14797 00001992 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14798                                  ent_loop:				
 14799 00001994 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14800 00001997 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14801 00001999 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14802 0000199A 2EFF06[2E19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14803                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14804                                  					; next sector
 14805 0000199F E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14806                                  notfound:				
 14807 000019A1 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14808 000019A3 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14809                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14810                                  
 14811                                  found_vid:				
 14812 000019A5 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14813 000019A6 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14814 000019A8 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14815 000019A9 57                      		push	di
 14816 000019AA 1E                      		push	ds
 14817 000019AB 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14818 000019AC BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14819 000019AF B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14820                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14821 000019B2 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14822 000019B4 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14823 000019B6 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14824 000019B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14825 000019B9 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14826 000019BA 07                      		pop	es
 14827                                  fvid_ret:				
 14828 000019BB 58                      		pop	ax
 14829                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14830                                  		; cf = 0
 14831                                  		;clc
 14832                                  rvidret:				
 14833 000019BC 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14834 000019BD 59                      		pop	cx
 14835 000019BE 5A                      		pop	dx
 14836 000019BF C3                      		retn
 14837                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14838                                  
 14839                                  no_vid:					
 14840 000019C0 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14841 000019C1 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14842                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14843                                  
 14844                                  readviderr:				
 14845 000019C3 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14846 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14847 000019C5 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14848                                  
 14849                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14850                                  
 14851                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14852                                  ;
 14853                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14854                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14855                                  
 14856                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14857 000019C7 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14858 000019C8 56                      		push	si
 14859 000019C9 51                      		push	cx
 14860 000019CA BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14861                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14862 000019CD 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14863                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14864 000019D0 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14865 000019D3 FC                      		cld
 14866 000019D4 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14867 000019D6 59                      		pop	cx
 14868 000019D7 5E                      		pop	si
 14869 000019D8 5F                      		pop	di
 14870 000019D9 C3                      		retn
 14871                                  
 14872                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14873                                  
 14874                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14875                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14876                                  ;
 14877                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14878                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14879                                  
 14880                                  check_volume_id:	
 14881 000019DA 57                      		push	di
 14882 000019DB 51                      		push	cx
 14883 000019DC BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14884                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14885 000019DF 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14886                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14887 000019E2 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14888 000019E5 FC                      		cld
 14889 000019E6 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 14890 000019E8 59                      		pop	cx
 14891 000019E9 5F                      		pop	di
 14892 000019EA C3                      		retn
 14893                                  
 14894                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14895                                  
 14896                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14897                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 14898                                  ;
 14899                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 14900                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 14901                                  ;
 14902                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 14903                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 14904                                  ;
 14905                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 14906                                  
 14907                                  fat_check:		
 14908 000019EB 50                      		push	ax
 14909 000019EC 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 14910 000019EE A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 14911 000019F1 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 14912                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 14913 000019F5 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 14914 000019F7 4E                      		dec	si
 14915                                  okret1:					
 14916 000019F8 58                      		pop	ax
 14917 000019F9 C3                      		retn
 14918                                  
 14919                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14920                                  
 14921                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14922                                  		;times 7 db 0
 14923                                  
 14924                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 14925                                  
 14926                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14927                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 14928                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 14929                                  
 14930                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14931                                  
 14932                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14933                                  		;db 0
 14934                                  
 14935                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 14936                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 14937                                  
 14938                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 14939 000019FA 00<rep 6h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 14940                                  %endif
 14941                                  
 14942                                  ;align 16
 14943                                  
 14944                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14945                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 14946                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 14947                                  ; 13/12/2022
 14948                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 14949                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 14950                                  
 14951                                  ; 30/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.2
 14952                                  ; (SYSINITSEG is 473h for MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 14953

 14958                                  ; ============================================================================
 14959                                  ; end of BIOSCODE
