 30804                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30805                                  ;*** findUMB - makes ES:0 point to the first MCB in UMB given as AL
 30806                                  ;            -- returns UmbHEAD pointer (0x9FFF) if passed AL==0
 30807                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30808                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30809                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to first MCB in UMB (_not_ the 8+SC MCB that heads it)
 30810                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (too high)
 30811                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30812                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30813                                  
 30814                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30815                                  	; (SYSINIT:3344h)
 30816                                  findUMB:
 30817                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30818                                  	;push	ax
 30819                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30820 00002E17 51                      	push	cx ; *
 30821                                  	;push	dx
 30822                                  
 30823 00002E18 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 30824                                  
 30825 00002E1A 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the to-be-found UMB number in DX
 30826                                  
 30827 00002E1C E8B8FE                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 30828 00002E1F 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 30829 00002E21 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 30830                                  
 30831                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30832                                  ; FU10--CX - This UMB number; 0 == conventional
 30833                                  ;       DX - The UMB number they're looking for
 30834                                  ;       ES - The current MCB address
 30835                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30836                                  
 30837                                  fu10:	
 30838 00002E23 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If CX==DX, we've found the UMB we're
 30839 00002E25 741B                    	je	short fuX	; searching for--so exit.
 30840                                  
 30841 00002E27 E8BAFE                  	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 30842 00002E2A 7501                    	jnz	short fu20
 30843                                  
 30844 00002E2C 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 30845                                  fu20:	
 30846 00002E2D 26A00000                	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30847 00002E31 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 30848 00002E33 740C                    	je	short fuE	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 30849                                  
 30850                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30851 00002E35 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 30852                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30853 00002E37 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30854 00002E3C 40                      	inc     ax
 30855 00002E3D 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 30856                                  
 30857 00002E3F EBE2                    	jmp	short fu10
 30858                                  fuE:	
 30859 00002E41 F9                      	stc
 30860                                  fuX:
 30861                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30862                                  	;pop	dx
 30863                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30864 00002E42 59                      	pop	cx ; *
 30865                                  	;pop	ax		; The address is already in ES.
 30866 00002E43 C3                      	retn
 30867                                  
 30868                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30869                                  ;*** BigFree - makes ES:0 point to the largest free MCB in UMB given as AL
 30870                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30871                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30872                                  ; EXIT:     ES:0 points to largest free MCB in UMB, AX returns its size
 30873                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if couldn't reach UMB (0 or too high)
 30874                                  ; USES:     Flags, ES
 30875                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30876                                  
 30877                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 30878                                  BigFree:
 30879                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30880                                  	;push	bx
 30881 00002E44 51                      	push	cx
 30882                                  
 30883 00002E45 E8CFFF                  	call	findUMB			; Returns with CF if err, else ES==MCB
 30884 00002E48 723A                    	jc	short bfX		; (would be "jc bfE"; it just does stc)
 30885                                  
 30886 00002E4A 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; Segment address of largest free MCB
 30887 00002E4C 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx			; Size of largest free MCB
 30888                                  
 30889                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30890                                  ; BF10--ES - Current MCB address
 30891                                  ;       BX - Address of largest free MCB so far
 30892                                  ;       CX - Size of largest free MCB so far
 30893                                  ; ---------------------------------------------
 30894                                  
 30895                                  bf10:	
 30896 00002E4E E893FE                  	call	isSysMCB		; If we've left the MCB, we're done.
 30897 00002E51 7428                    	jz	short bf30
 30898                                  
 30899                                  	;call	isFreeMCB		; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 30900 00002E53 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 30901 00002E59 750C                    	jnz	short bf20
 30902                                  
 30903 00002E5B 26A10300                	mov	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30904                                  	;cmp	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; Compare sizes...
 30905 00002E5F 39C1                    	cmp	cx,ax
 30906 00002E61 7F04                    	jg	short bf20		; Unless we're bigger,
 30907                                  
 30908 00002E63 8CC3                    	mov	bx,es			; Store this new element's address,
 30909                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; and its size.
 30910 00002E65 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 30911                                  
 30912 00002E67 26A00000                bf20:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 30913 00002E6B 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end	; 'Z'
 30914 00002E6D 740C                    	jz	short bf30		; 'Z' means this was the last MCB.
 30915                                  
 30916                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 30917 00002E6F 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 30918                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 30919 00002E71 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 30920 00002E76 40                      	inc     ax
 30921 00002E77 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 30922                                  
 30923 00002E79 EBD3                    	jmp	short bf10
 30924                                  
 30925 00002E7B 8EC3                    bf30:	mov	es,bx			; Return the address
 30926 00002E7D 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx			; Return the size
 30927 00002E7F 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 30928 00002E81 7501                    	jnz	short bfX		; (if size==0, there's nothing free)
 30929                                  bfE:	
 30930 00002E83 F9                      	stc
 30931                                  bfX:
 30932 00002E84 59                      	pop	cx
 30933                                  	; 01/01/2023
 30934                                  	;pop	bx
 30935 00002E85 C3                      	retn
 30936                                  
 30937                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30938                                  ;*** isSpecified - sets ZF if UMB in AL wasn't specified in DH/LH line.
 30939                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30940                                  ; ENTRY:    AL should be to a valid UMB number
 30941                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if UMB wasn't specified, ZF clear if it was
 30942                                  ; ERROR:    None
 30943                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30944                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30945                                  
 30946                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 30947                                  
 30948                                  isSpecified:
 30949                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30950                                  	;push	ax
 30951                                  
 30952 00002E86 30FF                    	xor	bh,bh
 30953 00002E88 88C3                    	mov	bl,al
 30954                                  
 30955                                  	;getdata al,DS:UmbUsed[bx]
 30956                                  	;
 30957                                  	;push	ds
 30958                                  	;push	cs
 30959                                  	;pop	ds
 30960                                  	;mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30961                                  	;pop	ds
 30962                                  	
 30963                                  	;mov	al,[cs:bx+UmbUsed]
 30964                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30965                                  	; ds = cs
 30966 00002E8A 8A87[BA1F]              	mov	al,[bx+UmbUsed]
 30967                                  
 30968 00002E8E 08C0                    	or	al,al			; Sets ZF if al==0 (ie, if unspecified)
 30969                                  
 30970                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30971 00002E90 58                      	pop	ax
 30972 00002E91 C3                      	retn
 30973                                  
 30974                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30975                                  ;*** shrinkMCB - breaks an MCB into two pieces, the lowest one's size==AX
 30976                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30977                                  ; ENTRY:    AX == new size, ES:0 == current MCB
 30978                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB broken if carry clear
 30979                                  ; ERROR:    Carry set if MCB isn't as large as AX+0x20 (not a useful split)
 30980                                  ; USES:     Flags
 30981                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30982                                  ; If the size of the to-be-split MCB isn't at least 0x20 bytes greater than
 30983                                  ; the specified new size, the split is useless; if it's only 0x10 bytes, that
 30984                                  ; 0x10 will be used to make a header that mentions a 0-byte free space, and
 30985                                  ; that just sucks up 0x10 bytes for nothing. So we make 0x20 bytes the
 30986                                  ; minimum for performing a split.
 30987                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 30988                                  
 30989                                  MIN_SPLIT_SIZE	equ	20h
 30990                                  
 30991                                  	; 02/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 30992                                  
 30993                                  shrinkMCB:
 30994                                  	;pushreg <bx,cx,es>
 30995                                  	; 02/01/2023
 30996                                  	;push	bx
 30997 00002E92 51                      	push	cx
 30998 00002E93 06                      	push	es
 30999                                  
 31000 00002E94 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; Move things around... and
 31001                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31002                                  	;mov	ax,es			; save this one for later.
 31003                                  
 31004 00002E96 268B0E0300              	mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31005                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31006 00002E9B 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx 
 31007                                  
 31008 00002E9D 83E820                  	sub	ax,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31009                                  	;sub	cx,MIN_SPLIT_SIZE ; 32
 31010                                  	;;cmp	bx,cx			; {New size} vs {Current Size-20h}
 31011                                  	;ja	short smE		; if wanted_size > cur-20h, abort.
 31012                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31013                                  	;cmp	cx,bx
 31014                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31015 00002EA0 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx
 31016 00002EA2 7228                    	jb	short smE ; (*)
 31017                                  
 31018 00002EA4 268A160000              	mov	dl,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31019                                  	
 31020                                  	;mov	cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31021                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31022 00002EA9 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 31023                                  
 31024 00002EAB 26891E0300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],bx
 31025 00002EB0 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],'M'
 31026                                  
 31027 00002EB6 01D8                    	add	ax,bx
 31028 00002EB8 40                      	inc	ax
 31029 00002EB9 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax			; Move to new arena area
 31030                                  
 31031 00002EBB 89C8                    	mov	ax,cx
 31032 00002EBD 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx
 31033                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31034                                  	; ax > 0
 31035 00002EBF 48                      	dec	ax			; And prepare the new size
 31036                                  
 31037                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31038 00002EC0 2688160000              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],dl
 31039                                  	;mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0 ; (**)
 31040 00002EC5 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax
 31041                                  	;mov	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31042                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+0],ax ; (**)
 31043                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+2],ax ; (**)
 31044                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+4],ax ; (**)
 31045                                  	;mov	[es:ARENA.NAME+6],ax ; (**)
 31046                                  
 31047                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31048 00002EC9 E8B601                  	call	freeMCB	; (**)
 31049                                  
 31050                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31051                                  	; cf=0
 31052                                  	;clc
 31053                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31054                                  	;jmp	short smX
 31055                                  smE:	
 31056                                  	; 18/12/2022
 31057                                  	; cf=1 (*)
 31058                                  	;stc
 31059                                  smX:	
 31060                                  	;popreg	<es,cx,bx>
 31061 00002ECC 07                      	pop	es
 31062 00002ECD 59                      	pop	cx
 31063                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31064                                  	;pop	bx
 31065 00002ECE C3                      	retn
 31066                                  
 31067                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31068                                  ;*** hideUMB? - hides as appropriate the UMB in CL
 31069                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31070                                  ; ENTRY:    CL should be to a valid UMB number, and AX to its address (findUMB)
 31071                                  ; EXIT:     None; UMB is hidden as necessary
 31072                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31073                                  ; USES:     Flags, AX, CX
 31074                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31075                                  ; PRIMARY LOGIC:
 31076                                  ;
 31077                                  ; If the UMB is specified in the DH/LH statement, then:
 31078                                  ;    If the largest free segment is too small (check specified size), then:
 31079                                  ;       Pretend it wasn't ever specified, and fall out of this IF.
 31080                                  ;    Else, if largest free segment is LARGER than specified size, then:
 31081                                  ;       If /S was given on the command-line, then:
 31082                                  ;          Break that element into two pieces
 31083                                  ;          Set a flag that we're shrinking
 31084                                  ;       Endif
 31085                                  ;    Endif
 31086                                  ; Endif
 31087                                  ; If the UMB is NOT specified (or was removed by the above):
 31088                                  ;    Hide all free elements in the UMB
 31089                                  ;    If the flag that we're shrinking was set, then:
 31090                                  ;       UN-hide the lower portion of the shrunken UMB
 31091                                  ;    ENDIF
 31092                                  ; ENDIF
 31093                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31094                                  
 31095                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31096                                  	; (SYSINIT:3426h)
 31097                                  _hideUMB_:
 31098                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31099                                  	; ds = cs
 31100                                  
 31101                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31102                                  	;push	bx
 31103                                  	;push	dx
 31104 00002ECF 06                      	push	es
 31105                                  
 31106 00002ED0 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 31107 00002ED2 E8B1FF                  	call	isSpecified	; Returns ZF set if al's umb was NOT specified
 31108 00002ED5 742D                    	jz	short hu_20
 31109                                  
 31110 00002ED7 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the size of the largest
 31111 00002ED9 E868FF                  	call	BigFree		; free element in AX; put its address in ES
 31112 00002EDC 7226                    	jc	short hu_20	; Oops. Errors mean skip this part.
 31113                                  
 31114 00002EDE 50                      	push	ax		; TOS==size of BigFree in UMB (popped as BX)
 31115 00002EDF 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		; Retrieve the user's specified
 31116 00002EE1 E8ACFE                  	call	GetSize		; minimum size for this umb (into AX)
 31117 00002EE4 5B                      	pop	bx		; Now BX==BigFree, AX==Specified Size
 31118                                  
 31119 00002EE5 09C0                    	or	ax,ax		; If they didn't specify one,
 31120 00002EE7 741B                    	jz	short hu_20	; Skip over all this.
 31121                                  
 31122 00002EE9 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx		; Ah... if (specified > max free)
 31123 00002EEB 7607                    	jbe	short hu_10
 31124                                  
 31125 00002EED 88C8                    	mov	al,cl		;  Then mark that UMB as unused. Nya nya.
 31126 00002EEF E8F2FC                  	call	unMarkUMB
 31127 00002EF2 EB10                    	jmp	short hu_20
 31128                                  hu_10:	
 31129                                  	;call	isTiny		; Returns ZF clear if user specified /S
 31130                                  	;jz	short hu_20
 31131                                  	; 02/01/2023
 31132                                  ;isTiny:
 31133                                  	;mov	al,[fUmbTiny] ; ds = cs
 31134                                  	;or	al,al
 31135 00002EF4 800E[B61F]00            	or	byte [fUmbTiny],0
 31136 00002EF9 7409                    	jz	short hu_20
 31137                                  
 31138 00002EFB E894FF                  	call	shrinkMCB	; They specified /S, so shrink the MCB to AX
 31139 00002EFE 7204                    	jc	short hu_20	; Ah... if didn't shrink after all, skip this:
 31140                                  
 31141 00002F00 8CC2                    	mov	dx,es
 31142 00002F02 EB09                    	jmp	short hu_30	; Skip the spec check.. we wanna hide this one.
 31143                                  
 31144 00002F04 89C8                    hu_20:	mov	ax,cx
 31145 00002F06 E87DFF                  	call	isSpecified	; If they specified this UMB, we're done...
 31146 00002F09 7510                    	jnz	short hu_X	; so leave.
 31147                                  
 31148 00002F0B 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31149                                  hu_30:	
 31150 00002F0D 88C8                    	mov	al,cl
 31151                                  
 31152 00002F0F E898FE                  	call	hideUMB		; Hides everything in UMB #al
 31153                                  
 31154 00002F12 09D2                    	or	dx,dx		; Did we shrink a UMB? If not, DX==0,
 31155 00002F14 7405                    	jz	short hu_X	; So we should leave.
 31156                                  
 31157 00002F16 8EC2                    	mov	es,dx		; Ah, but if it isn't, DX==the MCB's address;
 31158 00002F18 E8E1FE                  	call	unHideMCB	; Un-hides the lower portion of that MCB.
 31159                                  hu_X:	
 31160 00002F1B 07                      	pop	es
 31161                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31162                                  	;pop	dx
 31163                                  	;pop	bx
 31164 00002F1C C3                      	retn
 31165                                  
 31166                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31167                                  ;*** UnFreeze - Marks FROZEN elements as FREE
 31168                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31169                                  ; Entry:  None
 31170                                  ; Exit:   None; all 8+FROZEN elements are marked as FREE, from any UMB.
 31171                                  ; Error:  None
 31172                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31173                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31174                                  
 31175                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31176                                  
 31177                                  UnFreeze:
 31178                                  	; 03/01/2023
 31179                                  	;push	ax
 31180 00002F1D 06                      	push	es
 31181                                  
 31182 00002F1E E8B6FD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns with carry if err, else ES == MCB
 31183 00002F21 721E                    	jc	short ufX
 31184                                  
 31185 00002F23 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31186                                  
 31187                                  ; ------------------------------
 31188                                  ; UF10--ES - Current MCB address
 31189                                  ; ------------------------------
 31190                                  
 31191 00002F25 E81B00                  uf10:	call	isFrozMCB	; Returns with ZF set if MCB is FROZEN
 31192 00002F28 7503                    	jnz	short uf20
 31193 00002F2A E8CFFE                  	call	unHideMCB
 31194                                  uf20:	
 31195 00002F2D 26A00000                	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31196                                  
 31197 00002F31 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31198 00002F33 740C                    	jz	short ufX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31199                                  
 31200                                  	;NextMCB es,ax		; Go on forward.
 31201 00002F35 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 31202                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31203 00002F37 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31204 00002F3C 40                      	inc     ax
 31205 00002F3D 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 31206                                  
 31207 00002F3F EBE4                    	jmp	short uf10
 31208                                  ufX:	
 31209 00002F41 07                      	pop	es
 31210                                  	; 03/01/2023
 31211                                  	;pop	ax
 31212 00002F42 C3                      	retn
 31213                                  
 31214                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31215                                  ;*** isFrozMCB - returns with ZF set if current MCB (ES:0) is FROZEN
 31216                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31217                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31218                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is frozen, else !ZF
 31219                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31220                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31221                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31222                                  
 31223                                  isFrozMCB:
 31224                                  	;push	ax
 31225                                  
 31226                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.OWNER]	; Check the owner...
 31227                                  	;cmp	ax,SystemPSPOwner	; 8 (for US OR Japan) is valid
 31228 00002F43 26833E010008            	cmp	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],SystemPSPOwner
 31229 00002F49 7522                    	jne	short ifmX
 31230                                  
 31231                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+0]
 31232                                  	;cmp	ax,'FR' ; 5246h
 31233 00002F4B 26813E08004652          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'
 31234 00002F52 7519                    	jne	short ifmX
 31235                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]
 31236                                  	;cmp	ax,'OZ' ; 5A4Fh
 31237 00002F54 26813E0A004F5A          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'OZ'
 31238 00002F5B 7510                    	jne	short ifmX
 31239                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+4]
 31240                                  	;cmp	ax,'EN' ; 4E45h
 31241 00002F5D 26813E0C00454E          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+4],'EN'
 31242 00002F64 7507                    	jne	short ifmX
 31243                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+6]
 31244                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h
 31245 00002F66 26813E0E002020          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+6],'  '
 31246                                  ifmX:	
 31247                                  	;pop	ax
 31248 00002F6D C3                      	retn
 31249                                  
 31250                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31251                                  ;*** frezMCB - marks as 8+FROZEN the MCB at ES:0
 31252                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 31254                                  ; EXIT:     None; MCB frozen
 31255                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31256                                  ; USES:     None

 31259                                  frezMCB:

 31261 00002F75 26C70608004652          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'FR'

 31266                                  
 31267                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31268                                  ;*** FreezeUM - Marks FROZEN all UM elements now FREE, save those in load UMB
 31269                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31270                                  ; Entry:  None
 31271                                  ; Exit:   None; all free elements not in load UMB marked as 8+FROZEN
 31272                                  ; Error:  None
 31273                                  ; Uses:   Flags
 31274                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 31278                                  	; 01/01/2023

 31283

 31289                                  
 31290 00002F96 30E4                    	xor	ah,ah		; Zap ah, so al==ax
 31291 00002F98 89C2                    	mov	dx,ax		; Store the load UMB in DX, so we can skip it
 31292                                  
 31293 00002F9A E83AFD                  	call	UmbHead		; Returns first UMB segment in AX
 31294 00002F9D 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31295 00002F9F 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx		; Pretend we're on UMB 0 for now...
 31296                                  
 31297                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31298                                  ; FUM10--ES - Current MCB address
 31299                                  ;        CX - Current UMB number
 31300                                  ;        DX - UMB number to skip (load UMB)
 31301                                  ; -----------------------------------------
 31302                                  
 31303 00002FA1 E840FD                  fum10:	call	isSysMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is SYSTEM
 31304 00002FA4 7501                    	jnz	short fum20
 31305                                  
 31306 00002FA6 41                      	inc	cx		; If it _was_ SYSTEM, we're in a new UMB.
 31307                                  fum20:	
 31308 00002FA7 39D1                    	cmp	cx,dx		; If this is the load UMB, we don't want to
 31309 00002FA9 740B                    	je	short fum30	; freeze anything... so skip that section.
 31310                                  
 31311                                  	;call	isFreeMCB	; Oh. If it's not free, we can't freeze it
 31312 00002FAB 26830E010000            	or	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],0
 31313 00002FB1 7503                    	jnz	short fum30	; either.
 31314                                  
 31315 00002FB3 E8B8FF                  	call	frezMCB
 31316                                  fum30:	
 31317 00002FB6 26A00000                	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31318 00002FBA 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31319 00002FBC 740C                    	je	short fumX	; 'Z' means this was the last MCB... that's it.
 31320                                  
 31321                                  	;NextMCB es, ax		; Go on forward.
 31322 00002FBE 8CC0                    	mov     ax,es
 31323                                  	;add	ax,[es:3]
 31324 00002FC0 2603060300              	add     ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31325 00002FC5 40                      	inc     ax
 31326 00002FC6 8EC0                    	mov     es,ax
 31327                                  	
 31328 00002FC8 EBD7                    	jmp	short fum10
 31329                                  
 31330 00002FCA 07                      fumX:	pop	es
 31331                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31332                                  	;pop	dx
 31333                                  	;pop	cx
 31334                                  	;pop	ax
 31335 00002FCB C3                      	retn
 31336                                  
 31337                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31338                                  ;*** UmbTest - returns with carry set if UMBs are not available, else CF==false
 31339                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31340                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31341                                  ; EXIT:     Carry is clear if UMBs are available, or set if they are not
 31342                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31343                                  ; USES:     CF (AX,BX,DS,ES pushed 'cause they're used by others)
 31344                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 31361 00002FD8 9D                      	popf				; And restore what we found out.

 31367                                  	;pop	ax

 31371                                  ;*** WalkMem - travels memory chain and returns carry clear iff UMBs are linked
 31372                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31373                                  ; ENTRY:    None
 31374                                  ; EXIT:     Carry SET if MCB chain stops before 9FFF, CLEAR if stops >= 9FFF.
 31375                                  ; ERROR:    None
 31376                                  ; USES:     Flags
 31377                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31378                                  
 31379                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)

 31383                                  	;push	ax ; ?
 31384                                  	;push	bx ; ?
 31385                                  	;;push	ds ; ? ; 01/01/2023 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:352Fh)
 31386                                  	;push	es ; ? no need to save contents of these registers ?
 31387                                  		   	
 31388 00002FDC B452                    	mov	ah,GET_IN_VARS		; Call int 21h, function 52h...
 31389 00002FDE CD21                    	int	21h
 31390                                  
 31391 00002FE0 268B47FE                	mov	ax,[es:bx-2]
 31392 00002FE4 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31393                                  
 31394                                  ; ------------------------------
 31395                                  ; UM10: ES = Current MCB pointer
 31396                                  ; ------------------------------
 31397                                  
 31398 00002FE6 26A00000                um10:	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31399 00002FEA 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 31400 00002FEC 740C                    	je	short um20		; If signature == 'Z', hay no more.
 31401                                  
 31402                                  	;NextMCB es,bx			; Move to the next MCB
 31403                                  
 31404 00002FEE 8CC3                    	mov     bx,es
 31405                                  	;add	bx,[es:3]
 31406 00002FF0 26031E0300              	add     bx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31407 00002FF5 43                      	inc     bx
 31408 00002FF6 8EC3                    	mov     es,bx
 31409                                  		
 31410 00002FF8 EBEC                    	jmp	short um10		; And restart the loop.
 31411                                  um20:	
 31412 00002FFA 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 31413                                  
 31414 00002FFC 3DFF9F                  	cmp	ax,9FFFh		; This sets CF iff ax < 9FFF.
 31415                                  
 31416                                  	;pop	es ; ?
 31417                                  	;;pop	ds ; ? ; 01/01/2023 (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS, SYSINIT:353Dh)
 31418                                  	;pop	bx ; ?
 31419                                  	;pop	ax ; ?
 31420                                  	
 31421 00002FFF C3                      	retn

 31572                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31573                                  ;*** freeUMBs - frees all HIDDEN memory elements in upper-memory.
 31574                                  ; -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

 31586 00003034 721E                    	jc	short fusX
 31587                                  
 31588 00003036 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax		; Prepare for the loop; ES = current MCB addr.
 31589                                  fus10:	
 31590 00003038 E81C00                  	call	isHideMCB	; Returns with ZF set if owner is 0
 31591 0000303B 7503                    	jnz	short fus20
 31592 0000303D E84200                  	call	freeMCB
 31593                                  fus20:	   
 31594 00003040 26A00000                	mov	al,[es:ARENA.SIGNATURE]
 31595 00003044 3C5A                    	cmp	al,arena_signature_end ; 'Z'

 31597

 31599 0000304A 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 31600 0000304F 40                      	inc	ax

 31604                                  fusX:

 31612                                  ; ENTRY:    ES:0 should point to an MCB
 31613                                  ; EXIT:     ZF set if MCB is hidden, else !ZF

 31623                                  
 31624                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME]

 31626 0000305F 26813E08004849          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+0],'HI'
 31627 00003066 7519                    	jne	short ihm_x
 31628                                  	;mov	ax,[es:ARENA.NAME+2]

 31630 00003068 26813E0A004444          	cmp	word [es:ARENA.NAME+2],'DD'
 31631 0000306F 7510                    	jne	short ihm_x

 31635 00003078 7507                    	jne	short ihm_x

 31637                                  	;cmp	ax,'  ' ; 2020h

 31729                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31730                                  ; SYSCONF.ASM (MSDOS 6.0 - 1991) 	
 31731                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 31732                                  ; 09/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 31733                                  
 31734                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31735                                  ;
 31736                                  ; procedure : InitDevLoad
 31737                                  ;
 31738                                  ;	Input : DeviceHi = 0 indicates load DD in low memory
 31739                                  ;			 = 1 indicates load in UMB:
 31740                                  ;		           ConvLoad = 0 indicates a new-style load (see below)
 31741                                  ;		                    = 1 indicates a DOS 5-style load
 31742                                  ;		DevSize  = Size of the device driver file in paras
 31743                                  ;
 31744                                  ;	Output : none
 31745                                  ;
 31746                                  ;	Initializes DevLoadAddr, DevLoadEnd & DevEntry.
 31747                                  ;	Also sets up a header for the Device driver entry for mem utility
 31748                                  ;
 31749                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31750                                  ; For a "new-style load", we break off the current DevEntry and link the umbs
 31751                                  ; as we see fit, using HideUMBs (and UnHideUMBs at exit, though _it_ decides
 31752                                  ; whether it's entitled to do anything). HideUMBs uses the chart built by
 31753                                  ; ParseVar to determine which UMBs to leave FREE, and which not.
 31754                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31755                                  
 31756                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31757                                  	; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31758                                  	; (SYSINIT:364Ah)
 31759                                  InitDevLoad:
 31760                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31761                                  	;push	es ; *
 31762                                  
 31763                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31764                                  	; ds = cs
 31765 000030BC 803E[0B20]00            	cmp	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31766                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; Are we loading in UMB ?
 31767                                  	;je	short InitForLo		; no, init for lo mem
 31768 000030C1 743B                    	je	short initforlo_x ; 09/04/2019
 31769                                  
 31770                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 31771                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31772                                  ; %if 0
 31773                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31774 000030C3 803E[FB1F]01            	cmp	byte [ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31775                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:ConvLoad],1	; Are we loading as per DOS 5?
 31776 000030C8 7415                    	je	short InitForConv
 31777                                  
 31778                                  ; There are two stages to preparing upper-memory; first, we mark as 8+HIDDEN
 31779                                  ; any areas not specified on the /L:... chain. Second, we mark as 8+FROZEN
 31780                                  ; any areas left in upper-memory, except for elements in the load UMB...
 31781                                  ; we then malloc space as per Dos-5 style, and mark as free any spaces which
 31782                                  ; are 8+FROZEN (but leave 8+HIDDEN still hidden). The load is performed,
 31783                                  ; and UnHideUMBs later on marks all 8+HIDDEN as free.
 31784                                  
 31785 000030CA E87A04                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; Stop using the old device arena
 31786                                  
 31787 000030CD E883FC                  	call	HideUMBs		; Mark up the UM area as we see fit
 31788 000030D0 E8BFFE                  	call	FreezeUM		; Hide everything BUT the load area
 31789 000030D3 E85900                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; And grab that load area as needed
 31790 000030D6 9C                      	pushf
 31791 000030D7 E843FE                  	call	UnFreeze		; Then unhide everything frozen
 31792 000030DA 9D                      	popf
 31793                                  
 31794 000030DB 721C                    	jc	short InitForLo		; (if carry, it's loading low)
 31795                                  
 31796 000030DD EB0D                    	jmp	short InitForHi
 31797                                  
 31798                                  ;%endif ; 01/11/2022
 31799                                  
 31800                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31801                                  	; (SYSINIT:2B67h)
 31802                                  InitForConv:
 31803                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31804                                  	; ds = cs
 31805 000030DF E83700                  	call	SpaceInUMB		; Do we have space left in the
 31806                                  					;  current UMB ?
 31807 000030E2 7308                    	jnc	short InitForHi		; yes, we have
 31808 000030E4 E86004                  	call	ShrinkUMB		; shrink the current UMB in use
 31809 000030E7 E84500                  	call	GetUMBForDev		; else try to allocate new UMB
 31810 000030EA 720D                    	jc	short InitForLo		; we didn't succeed, so load
 31811                                  					;  in low memory
 31812                                  InitForHi:
 31813                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31814                                  	; ds = cs
 31815                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; get Para addr of free mem
 31816                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; UMB start addr
 31817                                  	;add	dx,[cs:DevUMBSize]	; DX = UMB End addr
 31818 000030EC A1[0120]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBFree]
 31819 000030EF 8B16[FD1F]              	mov	dx,[DevUMBAddr]
 31820 000030F3 0316[FF1F]              	add	dx,[DevUMBSize]
 31821 000030F7 EB0C                    	jmp	short idl1
 31822                                  
 31823                                  InitForLo:
 31824                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31825                                  	; ds = cs
 31826                                  	;mov	byte [cs:DeviceHi],0	; in case we failed to load
 31827 000030F9 C606[0B20]00            	mov	byte [DeviceHi],0
 31828                                  initforlo_x:
 31829                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31830                                  	; ds = cs
 31831                                  					;  into UMB indicate that
 31832                                  					;  we are loading low
 31833                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; AX = start of Low memory
 31834                                  	;mov	dx,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; DX = End of Low memory
 31835 000030FE A1[6203]                	mov	ax,[memhi]
 31836 00003101 8B16[A302]              	mov	dx,[ALLOCLIM]
 31837                                  idl1:
 31838 00003105 E86C00                  	call	DevSetMark		; setup a sub-arena for DD
 31839                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31840                                  	; ds = cs
 31841                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadAddr],ax	; init the Device load address
 31842                                  	;mov	[cs:DevLoadEnd],dx	; init the limit of the block
 31843                                  	;mov	word [cs:DevEntry],0	; init Entry point to DD
 31844                                  	;mov	[cs:DevEntry+2],ax
 31845 00003108 A3[EF1F]                	mov	[DevLoadAddr],ax
 31846 0000310B 8916[F11F]              	mov	[DevLoadEnd],dx
 31847 0000310F C706[F31F]0000          	mov	word [DevEntry],0
 31848 00003115 A3[F51F]                	mov	[DevEntry+2],ax
 31849                                  	; 01/01/2023
 31850                                  	;pop	es ; *
 31851 00003118 C3                      	retn
 31852                                  
 31853                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31854                                  ;
 31855                                  ; procedure : SpaceInUMB?
 31856                                  ;
 31857                                  ;	Input : DevUMBAddr, DevUMBSize, DevUMBFree & DevSize
 31858                                  ;	Output : Carry set if no space in UMB
 31859                                  ;		 Carry clear if Space is available for the device in
 31860                                  ;		   current UMB
 31861                                  ;
 31862                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31863                                  
 31864                                  SpaceInUMB:
 31865                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31866                                  	; ds = cs
 31867                                  	;mov	ax,[cs:DevUMBSize]
 31868                                  	;add	ax,[cs:DevUMBAddr]	; End of UMB
 31869                                  	;sub	ax,[cs:DevUMBFree]	; - Free = Remaining space
 31870 00003119 A1[FF1F]                	mov	ax,[DevUMBSize]
 31871 0000311C 0306[FD1F]              	add	ax,[DevUMBAddr]		; End of UMB
 31872 00003120 2B06[0120]              	sub	ax,[DevUMBFree]		; - Free = Remaining space
 31873                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31874                                  	;or	ax,ax			; Nospace ?
 31875                                  	;jnz	short spcinumb1
 31876                                  	;stc
 31877                                  	;retn
 31878                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31879 00003124 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1
 31880 00003127 7205                    	jb	short spcinumb2	; cf=1
 31881                                  spcinumb1:
 31882 00003129 48                      	dec	ax			; space for sub-arena
 31883                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31884                                  	; ds = cs
 31885 0000312A 3B06[ED1F]              	cmp	ax,[DevSize]
 31886                                  	;cmp	ax,[cs:DevSize]		; do we have space ?
 31887                                  spcinumb2:
 31888 0000312E C3                      	retn

 31890                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31891                                  ;
 31892                                  ; procedure : PrepareMark
 31893                                  ;
 31894                                  ;	Input : AX==Address of MCB (not addr of free space), BX==Size
 31895                                  ;	Output : None; MCB marked appropriately and DevUMB* set as needed.
 31896                                  ;
 31897                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31898                                  
 31899                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31900                                  ;
 31901                                  ;PrepareMark:
 31902                                  ;	push	ds
 31903                                  ;	mov	ds,ax
 31904                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31905                                  ;	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31906                                  ;	pop	ds
 31907                                  ;
 31908                                  ;	inc	ax
 31909                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31910                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31911                                  ;	mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31912                                  ;	retn
 31913                                  
 31914                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31915                                  ;
 31916                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31917                                  ;
 31918                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31919                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31920                                  ;		 the device.
 31921                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31922                                  ;
 31923                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31924                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31925                                  ;	UMB.
 31926                                  ;
 31927                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31928                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31929                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31930                                  ;
 31931                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31932                                  
 31933                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31934                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31935                                  
 31936                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31937                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31938                                  	; ds = cs
 31939 0000312F BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31940 00003132 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31941 00003135 CD21                    	int	21h
 31942                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31943                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31944                                  
 31945 00003137 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31946 00003139 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31947                                  
 31948 0000313B 4B                      	dec	bx
 31949                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31950                                  	; ds = cs
 31951 0000313C 391E[ED1F]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31952                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31953 00003140 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31954 00003142 43                      	inc	bx
 31955                                  
 31956 00003143 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31957 00003146 CD21                    	int	21h
 31958 00003148 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31959                                  
 31960                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31961                                  	;dec	ax
 31962                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31963                                  	;
 31964                                  PrepareMark:
 31965 0000314A 1E                      	push	ds
 31966 0000314B 48                      	dec	ax
 31967 0000314C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31968 0000314E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31969 00003154 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31970 0000315A 40                      	inc	ax
 31971 0000315B 1F                      	pop	ds
 31972                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31973                                  	; ds = cs
 31974                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31975                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31976                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31977 0000315C 891E[FF1F]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31978 00003160 A3[FD1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31979 00003163 A3[0120]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31980                                  	;
 31981                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31982                                  	; cf=0
 31983                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31984 00003166 C3                      	retn
 31985                                  gufd_err:
 31986 00003167 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31987                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31988                                  	; ds = cs
 31989                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31990                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31991                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31992 00003169 A3[FF1F]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31993 0000316C A3[FD1F]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31994 0000316F A3[0120]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31995 00003172 F9                      	stc
 31996 00003173 C3                      	retn

 31999                                  ;
 32000                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 32001                                  ;
 32002                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 32003                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 32004                                  ;
 32005                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 32006                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 32007                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 32008                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 32009                                  ;
 32010                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 32011                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 32012                                  ;
 32013                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32014                                  
 32015                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32016                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 32017                                  
 32018                                  DevSetMark:
 32019 00003174 06                      	push	es
 32020                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32021                                  	;push	di
 32022 00003175 1E                      	push	ds
 32023 00003176 56                      	push	si
 32024 00003177 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32025 00003179 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 32026 0000317F 40                      	inc	ax
 32027 00003180 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 32028                                  
 32029                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 32030                                  
 32031 00003184 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 32032 00003185 2EC536[7A03]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 32033                                  
 32034 0000318A 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32035 0000318C FC                      	cld
 32036                                  dsm_again:
 32037 0000318D AC                      	lodsb
 32038 0000318E 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32039 00003190 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 32040 00003192 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32041 00003194 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32042                                  isit_slash:
 32043 00003196 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 32044 00003198 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 32045 0000319A 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 32046 0000319C EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 32047                                  isit_null:
 32048 0000319E 08C0                    	or	al,al
 32049 000031A0 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 32050 000031A2 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 32051                                  
 32052 000031A4 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 32053 000031A7 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 32054                                  dsm_next_char:
 32055 000031AA AC                      	lodsb
 32056 000031AB 08C0                    	or	al, al
 32057 000031AD 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 32058 000031AF 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 32059 000031B1 7403                    	je	short blankout
 32060 000031B3 AA                      	stosb
 32061 000031B4 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 32062                                  blankout:
 32063 000031B6 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 32064 000031B8 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 32065 000031BA F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 32066                                  dsm_exit:
 32067 000031BC 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 32068 000031BD 5E                      	pop	si
 32069 000031BE 1F                      	pop	ds
 32070                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32071                                  	;pop	di
 32072 000031BF 07                      	pop	es
 32073 000031C0 C3                      	retn
 32074

 32076                                  ;
 32077                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 32078                                  ;
 32079                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 32080                                  ;
 32081                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 32082                                  ;
 32083                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 32084                                  ;	in DevSize
 32085                                  ;
 32086                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32087                                  
 32088                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32089                                  SizeDevice:
 32090                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32091                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32092 000031C1 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 32093 000031C2 06                      	push	es
 32094 000031C3 1F                      	pop	ds
 32095 000031C4 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 32096 000031C6 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 32097 000031C9 CD21                    	int	21h
 32098 000031CB 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 32099                                  
 32100 000031CD 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 32101 000031CF B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 32102 000031D2 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 32103 000031D4 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 32104 000031D6 CD21                    	int	21h
 32105 000031D8 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 32106 000031DA 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 32107 000031DD 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32108 000031E0 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 32109 000031E4 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 32110 000031E6 2EC706[ED1F]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 32111                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 32112 000031ED EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 32113                                  szdev1:
 32114 000031EF B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 32115 000031F1 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 32116 000031F3 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 32117 000031F5 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 32118 000031F7 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 32119                                  	;
 32120                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32121 000031F9 2E3B06[0C20]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32122 000031FE 7705                    	ja      short szdev2
 32123 00003200 2EA1[0C20]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 32124                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32125 00003204 F8                      	clc
 32126                                  szdev2:
 32127 00003205 2EA3[ED1F]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 32128                                  
 32129                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32130                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32131                                  	; cf=0
 32132                                  	;clc
 32133                                  sd_close:
 32134 00003209 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 32135                                  					;  carry flag
 32136 0000320A B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 32137 0000320D CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 32138 0000320F 9D                      	popf
 32139                                  sd_err:
 32140                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32141                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 32142 00003210 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 32143 00003211 C3                      	retn

 32146                                  ;
 32147                                  ; procedure : ExecDev
 32148                                  ;
 32149                                  ;	Input : ds:dx -> device to be executed
 32150                                  ;		DevLoadAddr - contains where device has to be loaded
 32151                                  ;
 32152                                  ;	Output : Carry if error
 32153                                  ;		 Carry clear if no error
 32154                                  ;

 32156                                  ;

 32158

 32160                                  ExecDev:
 32161 00003212 2E8B1E[EF1F]            	mov	bx,[cs:DevLoadAddr]

 32163                                  					;  block for exec with
 32164                                  					;  Load address

 32175                                  		; AL = subfunction

 32217                                  ;

 32219                                  ;

 32221                                  ;

 32223                                  ;

 32248                                  ;
 32249                                  ; procedure : RoundBreakAddr
 32250                                  ;
 32251                                  ;	Input : DevBrkAddr
 32252                                  ;	Output : DevBrkAddr
 32253                                  ;

 32464                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32465                                  ;
 32466                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 32467                                  ;
 32468                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 32469                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 32470                                  ;
 32471                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 32472                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 32473                                  ;
 32474                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 32475                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 32476                                  ;
 32477                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32478                                  
 32479                                  ; 13/05/2019
 32480                                  
 32481                                  	; 036/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 32482                                  	; (SYSINIT:38C5h)
 32483                                  
 32484                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32485                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 32486                                  GetHexNum:
 32487 00003308 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 32488 0000330A 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 32489                                  ghn_next:
 32490 0000330C 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 32491 0000330F 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 32492 00003312 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 32493 00003314 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 32494 00003317 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 32495 00003319 50                      	push	ax
 32496 0000331A 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 32497 0000331C E8FA0F                  	call	delim
 32498 0000331F 58                      	pop	ax
 32499                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32500 00003320 B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 32501 00003323 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 32502 00003325 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 32503                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 32504                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32505 00003328 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 32506                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32507                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32508                                  ghn_shift1:
 32509 0000332A D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 32510 0000332C D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 32511 0000332E E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 32512 00003330 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 32513 00003332 46                      	inc	si
 32514 00003333 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 32515                                  ghn_into_paras:
 32516 00003335 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 32517 00003338 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 32518 0000333B F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 32519 0000333F 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 32520                                  	; 03/01/2023
 32521                                  	;mov	cx,4
 32522                                  ghn_shift2:
 32523 00003341 F8                      	clc
 32524 00003342 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 32525 00003344 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 32526 00003346 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 32527 00003348 F8                      	clc
 32528 00003349 C3                      	retn
 32529                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32530                                  ghn_err:
 32531                                  gnib_err:
 32532 0000334A F9                      	stc
 32533                                  ghn_ret:
 32534                                  gnib_ret:
 32535 0000334B C3                      	retn

 32538                                  ;
 32539                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 32540                                  ;
 32541                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 32542                                  ;
 32543                                  ;	Returns binary value in BL
 32544                                  ;
 32545                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 32546                                  ;
 32547                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32548                                  
 32549                                  GetNibble:
 32550 0000334C 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 32551                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 32552                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32553 0000334F 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32554 00003351 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 32555 00003354 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 32556 00003356 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 32557 00003359 C3                      	retn
 32558                                  is_it_hex:
 32559 0000335A 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 32560                                  	;jb	short gnib_err

 32562 0000335D 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 32563 0000335F 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 32564 00003362 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 32565 00003364 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 32566 00003367 C3                      	retn
 32567                                  	; 11/12/2022

 32569                                  ;	stc
 32570                                  ;gnib_ret:
 32571                                  ;	retn

 32656                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32657                                  ;
 32658                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 32659                                  ;
 32660                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 32661                                  ;
 32662                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 32663                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 32664                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 32665                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 32666                                  ;				NC
 32667                                  ;			  else 
 32668                                  ;				CY
 32669                                  ;
 32670                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 32671                                  ;
 32672                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32673                                  
 32674                                  umb_allocate:
 32675                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32676                                  	; ds = cs
 32677 000033A9 50                      	push	ax
 32678 000033AA B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32679 000033AC BAFFFF                  	mov	dx,0FFFFh		; try to allocate largest
 32680                                  					;   possible
 32681                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32682 000033AF FF1E[0320]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32683                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32684                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 32685                                  					; the largest UMB
 32686 000033B3 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 32687 000033B5 740D                    	jz	short ua_err
 32688                                  	
 32689 000033B7 B410                    	mov	ah,XMM_REQUEST_UMB ; 16
 32690                                  
 32691                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32692 000033B9 FF1E[0320]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 32693                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 32694                                  
 32695 000033BD 83F801                  	cmp	ax,1			; Q: was the reqst successful
 32696 000033C0 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 32697                                  	;clc
 32698                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32699                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32700                                  	; cf=0
 32701                                  	;clc 
 32702                                  ua_done:
 32703 000033C2 58                      	pop	ax
 32704 000033C3 C3                      	retn
 32705                                  ua_err:
 32706 000033C4 F9                      	stc
 32707 000033C5 EBFB                    	jmp	short ua_done
