 32709                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32710                                  ;
 32711                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 32712                                  ;
 32713                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 32714                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 32715                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 32716                                  ;			; DS = data
 32717                                  ;
 32718                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 32719                                  ;
 32720                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32721                                  ;
 32722                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32723                                  
 32724                                  umb_insert:
 32725 000033C7 1E                      	push	ds
 32726                                  
 32727                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32728                                  	; ds = cs
 32729                                  
 32730                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32731 000033C8 8E1E[1A20]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32732                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32733 000033CC 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32734 000033D0 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32735 000033D2 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32736                                  ui_next:
 32737 000033D4 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32738                                  					;    new block
 32739 000033D6 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32740                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32741                                  					;    last
 32742 000033D8 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32743 000033DE 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32744                                  					; N: get next block
 32745 000033E0 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32746                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32747 000033E2 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32748 000033E5 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32749                                  
 32750                                  ui_insert:
 32751 000033E7 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32752 000033E9 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32753                                  
 32754 000033EA 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32755 000033EC F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32756                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32757 000033EE C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32758                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32759 000033F3 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32760                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32761 000033F9 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32762                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32763 000033FD C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32764                                  
 32765                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32766                                  
 32767 00003403 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32768 00003405 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32769 0000340B 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32770                                  					; mark as free
 32771 00003412 83EA02                  	sub	dx,2			; make room for arena at
 32772                                  					; start & end of new block
 32773 00003415 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx
 32774                                  
 32775                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32776                                  	
 32777 0000341A 01D3                    	add	bx,dx
 32778 0000341C 43                      	inc	bx
 32779 0000341D 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es=arena at top of new block
 32780 0000341F 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32781                                  
 32782                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32783                                  					; this block
 32784 00003420 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32785                                  	
 32786 00003422 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32787 00003428 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32788 0000342F 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32789 00003433 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32790                                  
 32791 0000343A EB47                    	jmp	short ui_done
 32792                                  
 32793                                  ui_append:
 32794                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32795 0000343C 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32796 00003441 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32797                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32798                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32799                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32800 00003447 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32801                                  
 32802 0000344D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32803 0000344F 40                      	inc	ax
 32804 00003450 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32805                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32806 00003452 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32807                                  
 32808 00003454 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block
 32809                                  
 32810 00003456 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32811 0000345C 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32812 00003463 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32813 00003467 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32814                                  
 32815                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32816 0000346E 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32817 00003470 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32818 00003476 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32819                                  					; mark as free
 32820 0000347D 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32821 0000347E 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32822                                  ui_done:
 32823                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32824 00003483 1F                      	pop	ds
 32825                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32826                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32827 00003484 C3                      	retn
 32828                                  
 32829                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32830                                  
 32831                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32832                                  ;
 32833                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32834                                  ;
 32835                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32836                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32837                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32838                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32839                                  ;
 32840                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32841                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32842                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32843                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32844                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32845                                  ;
 32846                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32847                                  
 32848                                  umb_coalesce:
 32849                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32850                                  	; ds = cs
 32851 00003485 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32852                                  
 32853 00003486 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32854                                  
 32855                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32856                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32857 00003488 8E06[1A20]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32858 0000348C 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32859                                  uc_nextfree:
 32860 00003491 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32861 00003493 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32862                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32863 00003495 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32864 0000349A 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32865                                  					; N: get next arena
 32866 0000349C E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32867 0000349F 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32868 000034A1 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32869                                  uc_again:
 32870 000034A3 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32871 000034A6 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32872                                  uc_check:
 32873 000034A8 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32874 000034AD 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32875                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32876 000034AF 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32877 000034B4 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32878                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32879 000034B5 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32880 000034B9 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32881 000034BC 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32882 000034BE EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32883                                  
 32884                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32885                                  ;uc_done:
 32886                                  	;retn
 32887                                  
 32888                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32889                                  ;
 32890                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32891                                  ;
 32892                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32893                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32894                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32895                                  ;
 32896                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32897                                  
 32898                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32899                                  get_next:
 32900 000034C0 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32901 000034C5 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32902                                  _get_next_:
 32903 000034C7 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32904 000034C9 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32905 000034CD 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32906 000034CE 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32907                                  	;clc
 32908                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32909                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32910                                  	; cf=0
 32911                                  	;clc
 32912 000034D0 C3                      	retn
 32913                                  gn_err:
 32914 000034D1 F9                      	stc
 32915                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32916                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32917 000034D2 C3                      	retn
 32918                                  
 32919                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32920                                  ;
 32921                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32922                                  ;
 32923                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32924                                  
 32925                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32926                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32927                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32928                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32929                                  	; ds = cs
 32930 000034D3 E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32931 000034D6 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32932                                  
 32933                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32934                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32935                                  
 32936                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32937                                  	; ds = cs
 32938                                  
 32939 000034D8 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32940 000034DA B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32941 000034DC D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32942                                  
 32943 000034DE 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32944 000034E0 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32945                                  
 32946 000034E2 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32947                                  
 32948 000034E4 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32949 000034E7 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32950                                  	
 32951 000034E9 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32952 000034EF 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32953                                  					
 32954 000034F6 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32955 000034FA 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32956                                  
 32957                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32958                                  
 32959 00003501 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32960 00003503 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32961 00003509 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32962                                  					; mark as free 
 32963 00003510 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32964 00003511 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32965                                  
 32966                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32967                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32968 00003516 8E06[1A20]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32969 0000351A BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32970 0000351D 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32971                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32972                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32973                                  
 32974                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32975                                  
 32976 00003520 BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32977 00003523 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32978 00003526 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32979                                  ;scan_next
 32980                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32981                                  scannext:
 32982 00003528 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32983 0000352C 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32984                                  	
 32985 0000352E 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32986 00003530 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32987 00003535 40                      	inc	ax
 32988 00003536 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32989                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32990                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32991 00003538 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32992                                  got_last:
 32993 0000353A 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32994 00003540 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32995                                  	;clc
 32996                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32997                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32998                                  	; cf=0
 32999                                  	;clc
 33000 00003546 C3                      	retn
 33001                                  
 33002                                  ; 11/12/2022
 33003                                  ;;lfu_err:
 33004                                  ;	;stc
 33005                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33006                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 33007                                  ;	; cf=1
 33008                                  ;	;stc
 33009                                  ;	retn
 33010                                  
 33011                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33012                                  ;
 33013                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 33014                                  ;
 33015                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 33016                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 33017                                  ;
 33018                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33019                                  
 33020                                  ShrinkUMB:
 33021                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33022                                  	; ds = cs
 33023 00003547 833E[FD1F]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 33024                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 33025 0000354C 741F                    	je	short su_exit
 33026 0000354E 06                      	push	es
 33027                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33028                                  	;push	bx
 33029                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33030                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 33031                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33032                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 33033 0000354F 8B1E[0120]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 33034 00003553 2B1E[FD1F]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 33035 00003557 8E06[FD1F]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 33036                                  	
 33037 0000355B B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 33038 0000355E CD21                    	int	21h
 33039                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 33040                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 33041                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 33042 00003560 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 33043 00003562 48                      	dec	ax
 33044 00003563 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 33045 00003565 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 33046                                  	; 01/01/2023
 33047                                  	;pop	bx
 33048 0000356C 07                      	pop	es
 33049                                  su_exit:
 33050 0000356D C3                      	retn

 33054                                  ; procedure : UnlinkUMB
 33055                                  ;
 33056                                  ;	Unlinks the UMBs from the DOS arena chain
 33057                                  ;
 33058                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33059                                  
 33060                                  UnlinkUMB:
 33061                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33062                                  	; ds = cs
 33063 0000356E 1E                      	push	ds
 33064 0000356F 06                      	push	es
 33065                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33066 00003570 803E[1920]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 33067                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 33068 00003575 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 33069                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33070 00003577 8E06[1A20]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 33071                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 33072 0000357B 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 33073 00003580 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 33074                                  ulu_next:
 33075 00003585 E838FF                  	call	get_next
 33076 00003588 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 33077 0000358A 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 33078 0000358C 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 33079 0000358E 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 33080 00003590 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 33081                                  ulu_found:
 33082                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 33083 00003592 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 33084                                  ulu_x:
 33085 00003597 07                      	pop	es
 33086 00003598 1F                      	pop	ds
 33087 00003599 C3                      	retn

 33089                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33090                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 33091                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 33092                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33093                                  
 33094                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 33095                                  ;
 33096                                  ; Summary:
 33097                                  ;
 33098                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 33099                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 33100                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 33101                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 33102                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 33103                                  ;
 33104                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 33105                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 33106                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 33107                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 33108                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 33109                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 33110                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 33111                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 33112                                  ;
 33113                                  ; Example:
 33114                                  ;
 33115                                  ;   [menu]
 33116                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 33117                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 33118                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 33119                                  ;
 33120                                  ;   [network]
 33121                                  ;   include misc
 33122                                  ;   device=foo
 33123                                  ;
 33124                                  ;   [misc]
 33125                                  ;   device=bar
 33126                                  ;   include alternate
 33127                                  ;
 33128                                  ;   [alternate]
 33129                                  ;   device=tar
 33130                                  ;
 33131                                  ;
 33132                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 33133                                  ;
 33134                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 33135                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 33136                                  ;
 33137                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 33138                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 33139                                  ;   following order:
 33140                                  ;
 33141                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 33142                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 33143                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 33144                                  ;
 33145                                  
 33146                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 33147                                  
 33148                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 33149                                  
 33150                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 33151                                  
 33152                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 33153                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 33154                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 33155                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 33156                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 33157                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 33158                                  
 33159                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33160                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33161                                  
 33162                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 33163                                  
 33164                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33165                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 33166                                  
 33167 0000359A 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 33168

 33170                                  ;
 33171                                  ; procedure : setparms
 33172                                  ;
 33173                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 33174                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 33175                                  ;
 33176                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33177                                  
 33178                                  setparms:
 33179 0000359B 1E                      	push	ds
 33180 0000359C 50                      	push	ax
 33181 0000359D 53                      	push	bx
 33182 0000359E 51                      	push	cx
 33183 0000359F 52                      	push	dx
 33184                                  
 33185 000035A0 0E                      	push	cs
 33186 000035A1 1F                      	pop	ds
 33187                                  
 33188 000035A2 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 33189 000035A4 8A1E[B34A]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 33190                                  	; 18/12/2022
 33191 000035A8 43                      	inc	bx
 33192                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 33193                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 33194 000035A9 BA[8B49]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 33195 000035AC B444                    	mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 33196 000035AE B00D                    	mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 33197 000035B0 B508                    	mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 33198 000035B2 B140                    	mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 33199 000035B4 CD21                    	int	21h
 33200                                  
 33201                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33202                                  ;
 33203                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 33204                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 33205                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 33206                                  ;	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 33207                                  ;	mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 33208                                  ;
 33209                                  ;	test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 33210                                  ;	jz	short not_ec35
 33211                                  
 33212                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33213                                  	;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 33214                                  	; 12/12/2022
 33215 000035B6 F606[B44A]04            	test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 33216 000035BB 7411                    	jz	short eot_ok
 33217                                  
 33218                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 33219                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33220 000035BD 8A0E[B34A]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 33221 000035C1 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 33222 000035C4 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax	
 33223                                  
 33224 000035C6 B001                    	mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 33225 000035C8 D2E0                    	shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 33226                                  	;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 33227 000035CA 0806[3105]              	or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 33228                                  
 33229                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 33230                                  ;
 33231                                  ;not_ec35:
 33232                                  ;;	Now adjust the BIOS's EOT variable if our new drive has more
 33233                                  ;;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 33234                                  ;
 33235                                  ;	;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+20]
 33236                                  ;	mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 33237                                  ;	;cmp	al,[12Ch] ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EB4h)
 33238                                  ;	cmp	al,[EOT]
 33239                                  ;	jbe	short eot_ok
 33240                                  ;	mov	[EOT],al
 33241                                  
 33242                                  eot_ok:
 33243 000035CE 5A                      	pop	dx			; fix up all the registers
 33244 000035CF 59                      	pop	cx
 33245 000035D0 5B                      	pop	bx
 33246 000035D1 58                      	pop	ax
 33247 000035D2 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 33248 000035D3 C3                      	retn
 33249

 33257                                  
 33258                                  diddleback:
 33259 000035D4 1E                      	push	ds
 33260 000035D5 0E                      	push	cs
 33261 000035D6 1F                      	pop	ds
 33262                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+4],80
 33263 000035D7 C706[8F49]5000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],80
 33264                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+1],2
 33265 000035DD C606[8C49]02            	mov	byte [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],DEV_3INCH720KB ; 2
 33266                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+2],0
 33267 000035E2 C706[8D49]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],0

 33368                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 33369                                  ;
 33370                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 33371                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 33372                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 33373                                  ; error.

 33631                                  ; procedure : setdeviceparameters
 33632                                  ;
 33633                                  ; setdeviceparameters sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the
 33634                                  ; system based on the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the
 33635                                  ; various form factors are present in the bpbtable. for hard files,
 33636                                  ; the recommended bpb is the same as the bpb on the drive.
 33637                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
 33638                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
 33639                                  ;
 33640                                  ;	if we return carry, the DRIVPARM will be aborted, but presently
 33641                                  ;	  we always return no carry
 33642                                  ;
 33643                                  ;	note:  there is a routine by the same name in msdioctl.asm
 33644                                  ;
 33645                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 33646                                  
 33647                                  ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 33648                                  
 33649                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 33650                                  
 33651                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 33652                                  	; (SYSINIT:3FC4h)
 33653                                  
 33654                                  setdeviceparameters:
 33655                                  	; 03/01/2023
 33656                                  	; ds = cs
 33657

 33729

 33733

 33737                                  ;	   a 320K diskette (40 tracks, 8 secs per track). It uses
 33738                                  ;	   a mediaid of 0fch. The other is 1.44M, which uses only
 33739                                  ;	   one sector/cluster.
 33740                                  
 33741                                  ;	any drive with 18secs/trk, 2 heads, 80 tracks, will be assumed
 33742                                  ;	   to be a 1.44M and use only 1 sector per cluster. Any other
 33743                                  ;	   type of 2 headed drive is all set.

 33748 00003718 7502                    	jne	short not_144m

 33751

 33759 00003723 833E[9F49]08            	cmp	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK],8
 33760 00003728 751A                    	jne	short got_correct_mediad

 33768

 33770 00003733 740B                    	je	short got_one_secperclus_drive
 33771                                  
 33772                                  ;	single sided 360K drive uses either 0fch or 0feh, depending on
 33773                                  ;	  whether sectorspertrack is 8 or 9. For our purposes, anything
 33774                                  ;	  besides 8 will be considered 0fch
 33775

 33780                                  
 33781 0000373E B3FE                    	mov	bl,0FEh			; 160K mediaid
 33782                                  
 33783                                  ;	we've either got a one sided drive, or a 1.44M drive
 33784                                  ;	  either case we'll use 1 sector per cluster instead of 2
 33785

 33787                                  	; 03/01/2023

 33792                                  
 33793                                  got_correct_mediad:

 34216 0000391B 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line feed?
 34217 0000391D 740F                    	je	short org1_brdg		; handles the next command line.
 34218 0000391F EBCE                    	jmp	short org5		; handles next char in this line.
 34219                                  
 34220                                  org_dhlf:				; M051 - Start
 34221                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34222                                  	; ds = cs
 34223 00003921 803E[9A35]01            	cmp	byte [insert_blank],1
 34224                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:insert_blank],1 ; Q:has a blank already been inserted
 34225 00003926 7406                    	je	short org1_brdg		; Y:
 34226 00003928 26C645FF20              	mov	byte [es:di-1],' '	; overwrite lf with blank
 34227 0000392D AA                      	stosb				; put lf after blank
 34228                                  					; M051 - End
 34229                                  org1_brdg:
 34230 0000392E C606[9A35]00            	mov	byte [insert_blank],0 
 34231                                  	;mov	byte [cs:insert_blank],0 ; M051: clear blank indicator for 
 34232                                  					; M051: devicehigh
 34233 00003933 E931FE                  	jmp	org1
 34234                                  
 34235                                  at_quote:
 34236 00003936 803E[4E03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34237                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0
 34238 0000393B 7407                    	je	short up_level
 34239                                  	;mov	byte [cs:com_level],0	; reset it.
 34240 0000393D C606[4E03]00            	mov	byte [com_level],0
 34241 00003942 EBAB                    	jmp	short org5
 34242                                  
 34243                                  up_level:
 34244                                  	;inc	byte [cs:com_level]	; set it.
 34245 00003944 FE06[4E03]              	inc	byte [com_level]
 34246 00003948 EBA5                    	jmp	short org5
 34247                                  
 34248                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34249                                  ;
 34250                                  ; procedure : get2
 34251                                  ;
 34252                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34253                                  
 34254                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 34255                                  	; (SYSINIT:33FAh)
 34256                                  
 34257                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34258                                  	; (SYSINIT:4270h)
 34259                                  get2:
 34260 0000394A E304                    	jcxz	noget
 34261                                  	;
 34262                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34263                                  	;;lods	byte ptr es:[si]
 34264                                  	; 12/12/2022
 34265 0000394C 26                      	es	
 34266 0000394D AC                      	lodsb
 34267                                  	;mov	al, [es:si]
 34268                                  	;inc	si
 34269                                  	;
 34270 0000394E 49                      	dec	cx
 34271 0000394F C3                      	retn
 34272                                  noget:
 34273 00003950 59                      	pop	cx
 34274                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34275                                  	; ds = cs
 34276                                  	;mov	[cs:count],di ; 13/05/2019
 34277                                  	;mov	[cs:org_count],di
 34278 00003951 893E[5403]              	mov	[count],di
 34279 00003955 893E[5603]              	mov	[org_count],di
 34280 00003959 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 34281                                  	;mov	[cs:chrptr],si
 34282 0000395B 8936[5803]              	mov	[chrptr],si
 34283                                  
 34284                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34285                                  
 34286                                  ; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34287                                  
 34288                                  ;ifndef MULTI_CONFIG
 34289                                  ;	retn
 34290                                  ;else
 34291                                  
 34292                                  ;   This was the rather kludgy way out of procedure "organize", but instead
 34293                                  ;   of returning to doconf, we now want to check config.sys BEGIN/END blocks
 34294                                  ;   and the new boot menu stuff...
 34295                                  
 34296 0000395F 89F9                    	mov     cx,di
 34297 00003961 E9E300                  	jmp     menu_check
 34298                                  
 34299                                  ;endif
 34300                                  	; 02/11/2022
 34301                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 34302                                  	;retn

 34304                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34305                                  ;
 34306                                  ; procedure : skip_comment
 34307                                  ;
 34308                                  ;skip the commented string until lf, if current es:si-> a comment string.
 34309                                  ;in) es:si-> string
 34310                                  ;	 cx -> length.
 34311                                  ;out) zero flag not set if not found a comment string.
 34312                                  ;	  zero flag set if found a comment string and skipped it. al will contain
 34313                                  ;	  the line feed character at this moment when return.
 34314                                  ;	  ax register destroyed.
 34315                                  ;	  if found, si, cx register adjusted accordingly.
 34316                                  ;
 34317                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34318                                  
 34319                                  	; 03/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34320                                  	; (SYSINIT:428Dh)
 34321                                  
 34322                                  skip_comment:
 34323 00003964 E3EA                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of the organize routine.
 34324                                  
 34325                                  	; 03/01/2023
 34326                                  	; ds = cs	
 34327                                  
 34328 00003966 803E[4E03]00            	cmp	byte [com_level],0
 34329                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:com_level],0 ; only check it if parameter level is 0.
 34330 0000396B 752C                    	jne	short no_commt	 ; (not inside quotations)
 34331                                  
 34332 0000396D 803E[4F03]01            	cmp	byte [cmmt],1
 34333                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],1
 34334 00003972 7225                    	jb	short no_commt
 34335                                  
 34336 00003974 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34337                                  	
 34338 00003977 3806[5003]              	cmp	[cmmt1],al
 34339                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt1],al
 34340 0000397B 751C                    	jne	short no_commt
 34341                                  
 34342 0000397D 803E[4F03]02            	cmp	byte [cmmt],2
 34343                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:cmmt],2
 34344 00003982 750A                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34345                                  
 34346 00003984 268A4401                	mov	al,[es:si+1]
 34347                                  	
 34348 00003988 3806[5103]              	cmp	[cmmt2],al
 34349                                  	;cmp	[cs:cmmt2],al
 34350 0000398C 750B                    	jne	short no_commt
 34351                                  skip_cmmt:
 34352 0000398E E3C0                    	jcxz	noget		; get out of organize routine.
 34353 00003990 268A04                  	mov	al,[es:si]
 34354 00003993 46                      	inc	si
 34355 00003994 49                      	dec	cx
 34356 00003995 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf		; line feed?
 34357 00003997 75F5                    	jne	short skip_cmmt
 34358                                  no_commt:
 34359 00003999 C3                      	retn
 34360                                  
 34361                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34362                                  ; (SYSINIT:42C8h)
 34363                                  
 34364                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 34365                                  ;%if 0
 34366                                  
 34367                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 34368                                  
 34369                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34370                                  ;
 34371                                  ;   kbd_read: wait for keystroke
 34372                                  ;
 34373                                  ;   INPUT
 34374                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34375                                  ;
 34376                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34377                                  ;       Carry SET to clean boot, CLEAR otherwise
 34378                                  ;
 34379                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34380                                  ;       All
 34381                                  ;
 34382                                  ;   HISTORY
 34383                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34384                                  ;
 34385                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34386                                  
 34387                                  kbd_read:
 34388 0000399A F606[5748]02                    test    byte [bDisableUI],2
 34389 0000399F 7520                            jnz     short kbd_nodelay
 34390                                  
 34391 000039A1 1E                              push    ds              ; the bios timer tick count is incremented
 34392 000039A2 29C0                            sub     ax,ax           ; 18.2 times per second;
 34393 000039A4 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax           ; watch the timer tick count for 37 transitions
 34394                                  	;mov	dx,[046Ch]	; get initial value
 34395                                  kbd_loop:
 34396 000039A6 B401                            mov     ah,1            ;
 34397 000039A8 CD16                            int     16h             ; peek the keyboard
 34398 000039AA 7514                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; something's there, get out
 34399 000039AC B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34400 000039AE CD16                            int     16h             ;
 34401 000039B0 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34402 000039B2 750C                            jnz	short kbd_loopdone ; yes
 34403 000039B4 A16C04                          mov     ax,[046Ch]	;
 34404                                  	;sub	ax,dx           ; get difference
 34405                                  	; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34406 000039B7 2E2B06[8403]            	sub	ax,[cs:_timer_lw_] ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:42E5h        
 34407                                  
 34408 000039BC 3C25                    	cmp     al,37           ; reached limit?  ; (2 seconds)
 34409 000039BE 72E6                            jb	short kbd_loop	; not yet
 34410                                  kbd_loopdone:
 34411 000039C0 1F                              pop     ds              ; delay complete!
 34412                                  kbd_nodelay:
 34413 000039C1 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; assume clean boot
 34414 000039C3 B402                            mov     ah,2            ; peek the shift states
 34415 000039C5 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 34416 000039C7 A803                            test    al,03h          ; either right or left shift key bits set?
 34417 000039C9 7407                            jz      short kbd_notshift ; no
 34418 000039CB 43                              inc     bx              ; yes
 34419 000039CC 43                              inc     bx
 34420                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4301h
 34421 000039CD 800E[5B48]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 34422                                  kbd_notshift:                   ;
 34423 000039D2 B401                            mov     ah,1            ; peek the keyboard
 34424 000039D4 CD16                            int     16h             ;
 34425 000039D6 743E                            jz	short kbd_test	; no key present
 34426 000039D8 08C0                            or      al,al           ; is it a function key?
 34427 000039DA 753A                            jnz	short kbd_test	; no
 34428                                  
 34429                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:430Bh
 34430 000039DC 80FC62                          cmp     ah,62h          ; CTRL F5
 34431 000039DF 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_bypass
 34432                                  	
 34433 000039E1 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh          ; F5 function key?
 34434 000039E4 750D                            jne	short kbd_notf5	; no
 34435                                  kbd_cfg_bypass:
 34436 000039E6 BA[EF4C]                        mov     dx,_$CleanMsg
 34437 000039E9 E83D0C                          call    print
 34438                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:431Bh
 34439 000039EC 800E[5B48]04            	or	byte [bQueryOpt],4 
 34440 000039F1 EB16                            jmp     short kbd_eat   ; yes, clean boot selected
 34441                                  kbd_notf5:
 34442                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4322h
 34443 000039F3 80FC65                          cmp     ah,65h          ; CTRL F8
 34444 000039F6 7405                            je	short kbd_cfg_confirm
 34445                                  
 34446 000039F8 80FC42                          cmp     ah,42h          ; F8 function key?
 34447 000039FB 7523                            jne	short kbd_exit	; no
 34448                                  kbd_cfg_confirm:
 34449 000039FD BA[2D4D]                        mov     dx,_$InterMsg
 34450 00003A00 E8260C                          call    print           ;
 34451 00003A03 B301                            mov     bl,1            ; yes, interactive-boot option enabled
 34452 00003A05 881E[5B48]                      mov     [bQueryOpt],bl  ; change default setting
 34453                                  kbd_eat:                        ;
 34454 00003A09 B400                            mov     ah,0            ;
 34455 00003A0B CD16                            int     16h             ; eat the key we assumed was a signal
 34456 00003A0D C606[6148]FF                    mov	byte [secElapsed],-1
 34457 00003A12 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ;
 34458 00003A14 7405                            jz	short kbd_clean	;
 34459                                  kbd_test:                       ;
 34460 00003A16 80FB02                          cmp     bl,2            ;
 34461 00003A19 7205                            jb	short kbd_exit	;
 34462                                  kbd_clean:                      ;
 34463 00003A1B E88808                          call    disable_autoexec; yes, tell COMMAND to skip autoexec.bat
 34464 00003A1E F9                              stc                     ; set carry to indicate abort
 34465 00003A1F C3                              retn			;
 34466                                  kbd_exit:                       ;
 34467 00003A20 F8                              clc                     ; clear carry to indicate success
 34468 00003A21 C3                              retn			;
 34469                                  
 34470                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34471                                  ;
 34472                                  ;   set_numlock: set numlock LED
 34473                                  ;
 34474                                  ;   INPUT
 34475                                  ;       ES:SI -> numlock setting (ie, "ON" or "OFF")
 34476                                  ;
 34477                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34478                                  ;       None
 34479                                  ;
 34480                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34481                                  ;       None
 34482                                  ;
 34483                                  ;   HISTORY
 34484                                  ;       Created 16-Nov-1992 by JeffPar
 34485                                  ;
 34486                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34487                                  
 34488                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 34489                                  
 34490                                  set_numlock:
 34491                                          ; 04/01/2023
 34492                                  	;push	ax
 34493 00003A22 1E                              push    ds
 34494 00003A23 29C0                            sub     ax,ax
 34495 00003A25 8ED8                            mov     ds,ax
 34496 00003A27 268B04                          mov     ax,[es:si]      ; get 1st 2 bytes of value (ON or OF)
 34497 00003A2A 2E3B06[CA4C]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff+2]	; should we turn it off?
 34498 00003A2F 7507                            jne	short not_off	; no
 34499 00003A31 80261704DF                      and     byte [0417h],~20h ; 0DFh
 34500 00003A36 EB0D                            jmp     short set_done
 34501                                  not_off:
 34502 00003A38 2E3B06[C84C]                    cmp     ax,[cs:OnOff]	; should we turn it on?
 34503 00003A3D F9                              stc
 34504 00003A3E 7505                            jne	short set_done	; no
 34505 00003A40 800E170420                      or      byte [0417h],20h
 34506                                  set_done:
 34507 00003A45 1F                              pop     ds
 34508                                  	; 04/01/2023
 34509                                  	;pop	ax
 34510 00003A46 C3                              retn
 34511                                  
 34512                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 34513                                  
 34514                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34515                                  ;
 34516                                  ;   menu_check:  check for presence of menu (and other) configuration blocks
 34517                                  ;
 34518                                  ;   INPUT
 34519                                  ;       CX == "organized" config.sys memory image length
 34520                                  ;    ES:SI -> "organized" config.sys memory image
 34521                                  ;       DS == CS == sysinitseg
 34522                                  ;
 34523                                  ;   OUTPUT
 34524                                  ;       Same as above; the idea is that menu_check simply transforms
 34525                                  ;       a block-structured config.sys image into a conventional image,
 34526                                  ;       based on the user's block selection and any other boot-time options
 34527                                  ;       the user may have employed...
 34528                                  ;
 34529                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 34530                                  ;       All
 34531                                  ;
 34532                                  ;   NOTES
 34533                                  ;       [count] and [org_count] are set to the new config.sys image length
 34534                                  ;
 34535                                  ;   HISTORY
 34536                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 34537                                  ;
 34538                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 34539                                  
 34540                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 34541                                  	; (SYSINIT:4378h)
 34542                                  
 34543                                  menu_check:
 34544                                  
 34545                                  ;   Search for SWITCHES, determine if /N or /F are present; if so, then
 34546                                  ;   disable clean/interactive boot options
 34547                                  
 34548 00003A47 51                              push    cx              ;
 34549 00003A48 56                              push    si              ;
 34550 00003A49 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; remains ZERO until first block
 34551                                  swchk_loop:                     ;
 34552 00003A4B E84E07                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34553 00003A4E 724C                            jc	short swchk_end	; hit eof
 34554 00003A50 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; '['
 34555 00003A52 7503                            jne	short swchk_next1 ;
 34556 00003A54 43                              inc     bx              ; remember that we've seen a block
 34557 00003A55 EB40                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34558                                  swchk_next1:                    ;
 34559 00003A57 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34560 00003A59 750E                            jne	short swchk_next2 ;
 34561 00003A5B 09DB                            or      bx,bx           ; only do NUMLOCK commands that exist
 34562 00003A5D 7538                            jnz	short swchk_nextline ; before the first block
 34563 00003A5F E8C0FF                          call    set_numlock     ; REM it out so we don't act on it later, too
 34564 00003A62 26C644FF30                      mov     byte [es:si-1],CONFIG_REM
 34565 00003A67 EB2E                            jmp     short swchk_nextline
 34566                                  swchk_next2:                    ;
 34567 00003A69 3C31                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SWITCHES
 34568 00003A6B 752A                            jne	short swchk_nextline ; this line ain't it
 34569                                  swchk_scan:                     ;
 34570 00003A6D E82C07                          call    get_char        ; look for /N or /F
 34571                                  swchk_scan1:                    ;
 34572 00003A70 3C0A                            cmp     al,LF           ; end of line?
 34573 00003A72 7423                            je	short swchk_nextline ; yes
 34574 00003A74 3C2F                            cmp     al,'/'          ; switch-char?
 34575 00003A76 75F5                            jne	short swchk_scan ; no
 34576 00003A78 E82107                          call    get_char        ;
 34577 00003A7B 24DF                            and     al,~20h ; 0DFh	; convert to upper case
 34578 00003A7D 3A06[491F]                      cmp     al,[swit_n+1]
 34579 00003A81 7507                            jne	short swchk_scan2 ; no
 34580 00003A83 800E[5748]01                    or      byte [bDisableUI],1
 34581 00003A88 EBE3                            jmp	short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34582                                  swchk_scan2:                    ;
 34583 00003A8A 3A06[551F]                      cmp     al,[swit_f+1]
 34584 00003A8E 75E0                            jne	short swchk_scan1 ; no
 34585 00003A90 800E[5748]02                    or      byte [bDisableUI],2
 34586 00003A95 EBD6                            jmp     short swchk_scan ; continue looking for switches of interest
 34587                                  swchk_nextline:                 ;
 34588 00003A97 E8D306                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34589 00003A9A EBAF                            jmp     short swchk_loop ;
 34590                                  swchk_end:                      ;
 34591 00003A9C 5E                              pop     si              ;
 34592 00003A9D 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34593                                  
 34594                                  ;   Do the keyboard tests for clean/interactive boot now, but only if
 34595                                  ;   the DisableUI flag is still clear
 34596                                  
 34597 00003A9E F606[5748]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 34598 00003AA3 7508                            jnz	short menu_search
 34599                                  ;
 34600                                  ;   Wait for 2 seconds first, UNLESS the /F bit was set in bDisableUI, or
 34601                                  ;   there is anything at all in the keyboard buffer
 34602                                  ;
 34603 00003AA5 E8F2FE                          call    kbd_read
 34604 00003AA8 7303                            jnc	short menu_search
 34605 00003AAA E9F901                          jmp	menu_abort
 34606                                  
 34607                                  ;   Search for MENU block; it is allowed to be anywhere in config.sys
 34608                                  
 34609                                  menu_search:
 34610 00003AAD 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; if no MENU, default to zero for no_selection
 34611 00003AAF BF[9C48]                        mov     di,szMenu	;
 34612 00003AB2 E81B04                          call    find_block      ; find the MENU block
 34613 00003AB5 7340                            jnc	short menu_found ;
 34614 00003AB7 C606[9448]00                    mov     byte [szBoot],0
 34615 00003ABC E91702                          jmp	no_selection ; not found
 34616                                  
 34617                                  ;   Process the requested menu color(s)
 34618                                  
 34619                                  menu_color:
 34620 00003ABF 51                              push    cx              ;
 34621 00003AC0 52                              push    dx              ;
 34622 00003AC1 BA0700                          mov     dx,0007h        ; default color setting
 34623 00003AC4 E8B406                          call    get_number	; get first number
 34624 00003AC7 80E30F                          and     bl,0Fh		; first # is foreground color (for low nibble)
 34625 00003ACA 88DD                            mov     ch,bl           ; save it in CH
 34626 00003ACC 80E2F0                          and     dl,0F0h         ;
 34627 00003ACF 08DA                            or      dl,bl           ;
 34628 00003AD1 E84508                          call    delim           ; did we hit a delimiter
 34629 00003AD4 7511                            jne	short check_color ; no, all done
 34630 00003AD6 E8A206                          call    get_number	; get next number
 34631 00003AD9 80E30F                          and     bl,0Fh		; second # is background color (for high nibble)
 34632 00003ADC 88DE                            mov     dh,bl           ; save it in DH
 34633 00003ADE 80E20F                          and     dl,0Fh		;
 34634 00003AE1 B104                            mov     cl,4            ;
 34635 00003AE3 D2E3                            shl     bl,cl           ;
 34636 00003AE5 08DA                            or      dl,bl           ;
 34637                                  check_color:                    ;
 34638 00003AE7 38F5                            cmp     ch,dh           ; are foreground/background the same?
 34639 00003AE9 7503                            jne	short set_color	; no
 34640 00003AEB 80F208                          xor     dl,08h          ; yes, so modify the fgnd intensity
 34641                                  set_color:
 34642 00003AEE 8816[5248]                      mov     [bMenuColor],dl ;
 34643 00003AF2 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 34644 00003AF3 59                              pop     cx              ;
 34645 00003AF4 E9AB00                          jmp	menu_nextitem
 34646                                  
 34647                                  ;   Back to our regularly scheduled program (the COLOR and other goop
 34648                                  ;   above is there simply to alleviate short jump problems)
 34649                                  
 34650                                  menu_found:
 34651 00003AF7 C606[5C48]01                    mov     byte [bDefBlock],1
 34652 00003AFC C706[5E48]0000                  mov     word [offDefBlock],0
 34653 00003B02 C606[6048]FF                    mov     byte [secTimeOut],-1
 34654 00003B07 8026[5B48]FD                    and     byte [bQueryOpt],~2 ; 0FDh
 34655                                  
 34656 00003B0C E85E06                          call    skip_opt_line   ; skip to next line
 34657 00003B0F 29D2                            sub     dx,dx           ; initialize total block count (0 => none yet)
 34658                                  
 34659                                  ;   Process the menu block now
 34660                                  
 34661                                  menu_process:
 34662 00003B11 E88806                          call    get_char        ; get first char of current line
 34663 00003B14 722E                            jc	short to_menu_getdefault ; could happen if menu block at end (rare)
 34664 00003B16 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 34665 00003B18 3C5B                            cmp     al,CONFIG_BEGIN ; BEGIN implies END
 34666 00003B1A 7428                            je	short to_menu_getdefault
 34667 00003B1C 3C4F                            cmp     al,CONFIG_SUBMENU
 34668 00003B1E 744D                            je	short menu_item	; go process sub-menu
 34669 00003B20 3C45                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUITEM
 34670 00003B22 7449                            je	short menu_item	; go process menu item
 34671 00003B24 3C41                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUDEFAULT
 34672 00003B26 741E                            je	short menu_default ; go process menu default
 34673 00003B28 3C52                            cmp     al,CONFIG_MENUCOLOR
 34674 00003B2A 7493                            je	short menu_color ; go process menu color
 34675 00003B2C 3C4E                            cmp     al,CONFIG_NUMLOCK
 34676 00003B2E 740F                            je	short menu_numlock ;
 34677 00003B30 3C30                            cmp     al,CONFIG_REM   ; allow remarks in menu block
 34678 00003B32 746E                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34679 00003B34 E8D207                          call    any_delim       ; allow blank lines and such
 34680 00003B37 7469                            je	short menu_nextitem ;
 34681 00003B39 F9                              stc                     ;
 34682 00003B3A E83507                          call    print_error     ; non-MENU command!
 34683 00003B3D EB63                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34684                                  menu_numlock:
 34685 00003B3F E8E0FE                          call    set_numlock
 34686 00003B42 EB5E                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34687                                  to_menu_getdefault:
 34688 00003B44 EB62                            jmp     short menu_getdefault
 34689                                  
 34690                                  ;   Save the offset of the default block name, we'll need it later
 34691                                  
 34692                                  menu_default:
 34693 00003B46 8936[5E48]                      mov     [offDefBlock],si; save address of default block name
 34694 00003B4A 803E[6148]00                    cmp     byte [secElapsed],0
 34695 00003B4F 751A                            jne	short timeout_skip ; secElapsed is only zero for the FIRST menu,
 34696 00003B51 E8F405                          call    skip_token      ; and for subsequent menus IF nothing was typed;
 34697 00003B54 724C                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; secElapsed becomes -1 forever as soon as
 34698 00003B56 E80506                          call    skip_delim      ; something is typed
 34699 00003B59 7247                            jc	short menu_nextitem ;
 34700 00003B5B 89DE                            mov     si,bx           ;
 34701 00003B5D E81B06                          call    get_number      ; get number (of seconds for timeout)
 34702 00003B60 80FB5A                          cmp     bl,90           ; limit it to a reasonable number
 34703 00003B63 7202                            jb	short timeout_ok ; (besides, 99 is the largest # my simple
 34704 00003B65 B35A                            mov     bl,90           ;  display function can handle)
 34705                                  timeout_ok:                     ;
 34706 00003B67 881E[6048]                      mov     [secTimeOut],bl ;
 34707                                  timeout_skip:
 34708 00003B6B EB35                            jmp     short menu_nextitem
 34709                                  
 34710                                  ;   Verify that this is a valid menu item by searching for the named block
 34711                                  
 34712                                  menu_item:
 34713                                  	;cmp	dl,9	; 04/01/2023
 34714 00003B6D 80FA09                          cmp     dl,MAX_MULTI_CONFIG ; have we reached the max # of items yet?
 34715 00003B70 7330                            jae	short menu_nextitem ;
 34716 00003B72 89F7                            mov     di,si           ; DS:DI -> block name to search for
 34717 00003B74 E84003                          call    srch_block      ;
 34718 00003B77 7406                            je	short menu_itemfound ;
 34719 00003B79 F9                              stc                     ;
 34720 00003B7A E8F506                          call    print_error     ; print error and pause
 34721 00003B7D EB23                            jmp     short menu_nextitem ; if not found, ignore this menu item
 34722                                  
 34723                                  ;   srch_block, having succeeded, returns DI -> past the token that it
 34724                                  ;   just matched, which in this case should be a descriptive string; ES:SI
 34725                                  ;   and CX are unmodified
 34726                                  
 34727                                  menu_itemfound:
 34728 00003B7F 42                              inc     dx              ; otherwise, increment total block count
 34729 00003B80 89D3                            mov     bx,dx           ; and use it to index the arrays of offsets
 34730 00003B82 8887[6248]                      mov	[abBlockType+bx],al
 34731 00003B86 01DB                            add     bx,bx           ; of recorded block names and descriptions
 34732                                  
 34733                                  ;   There should be a description immediately following the block name on
 34734                                  ;   MENUITEM line; failing that, we'll just use the block name as the
 34735                                  ;   description...
 34736                                  
 34737 00003B88 89B7[6C48]                      mov     [aoffBlockName+bx],si
 34738 00003B8C 89B7[8048]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],si
 34739 00003B90 89DF                            mov     di,bx           ; skip_delim modifies BX, so stash it in DI
 34740 00003B92 E8B305                          call    skip_token      ;
 34741 00003B95 720B                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34742 00003B97 E8C405                          call    skip_delim      ;
 34743 00003B9A 7206                            jc	short menu_nextitem ; hit eol/eof
 34744 00003B9C 87DF                            xchg    bx,di           ;
 34745 00003B9E 89BF[8048]                      mov     [aoffBlockDesc+bx],di
 34746                                  
 34747                                  menu_nextitem:
 34748 00003BA2 E8C805                          call    skip_opt_line   ;
 34749 00003BA5 E969FF                          jmp     menu_process    ; go back for more lines
 34750                                  
 34751                                  ;   Display menu items now, after determining which one is default
 34752                                  
 34753                                  menu_getdefault:
 34754 00003BA8 08D2                            or      dl,dl           ; where there any valid blocks at all?
 34755 00003BAA 7505                            jnz	short menu_valid ; yes
 34756 00003BAC 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; no, so force autoselect of 0
 34757 00003BAE E9ED00                          jmp     menu_autoselect ; (meaning: process common blocks only)
 34758                                  menu_valid:
