 35799                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35800                                  ;
 35801                                  ;   disp_input:  display a single character + cr/lf
 35802                                  ;
 35803                                  ;   INPUT
 35804                                  ;       AL == character to display
 35805                                  ;
 35806                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35807                                  ;       None
 35808                                  ;
 35809                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35810                                  ;       None
 35811                                  ;
 35812                                  ;   NOTES
 35813                                  ;       This function is used not only for the menu input selection but
 35814                                  ;       also for the interactive line prompting (the y/n/a thing).
 35815                                  ;
 35816                                  ;   HISTORY
 35817                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35818                                  ;
 35819                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35820                                  
 35821                                  disp_input:
 35822 000040E4 50                              push    ax
 35823 000040E5 3C20                            cmp     al,' '
 35824 000040E7 7302                            jae	short disp_ok
 35825 000040E9 B020                            mov     al,' '
 35826                                  disp_ok:
 35827 000040EB 88C2                            mov     dl,al
 35828 000040ED B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 35829 000040EF CD21                            int     21h
 35830 000040F1 BA[764B]                        mov     dx,crlfm
 35831 000040F4 E83205                          call    print
 35832 000040F7 58                              pop     ax
 35833 000040F8 C3                              retn
 35834                                  
 35835                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35836                                  
 35837                                  disp_num:
 35838 000040F9 53                              push    bx
 35839 000040FA 0430                            add     al,'0'
 35840 000040FC B40A                            mov     ah,0Ah
 35841 000040FE 8B1E[5248]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35842 00004102 B90100                          mov     cx,1
 35843 00004105 CD10                            int     10h
 35844 00004107 5B                              pop     bx
 35845 00004108 C3                              retn
 35846                                  
 35847                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35848                                  ;
 35849                                  ;   show_status:  display current interactive mode setting (on/off/none)
 35850                                  ;
 35851                                  ;   INPUT
 35852                                  ;       None
 35853                                  ;
 35854                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35855                                  ;       None
 35856                                  ;
 35857                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35858                                  ;       None
 35859                                  ;
 35860                                  ;   NOTES
 35861                                  ;       None
 35862                                  ;
 35863                                  ;   HISTORY
 35864                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35865                                  ;
 35866                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35867                                  
 35868                                  show_status:
 35869 00004109 53                              push    bx              ; BL = video page #
 35870 0000410A 8B1E[5248]                      mov     bx,[bMenuColor]
 35871 0000410E B403                            mov     ah,03h          ; get cursor position
 35872 00004110 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35873 00004112 52                              push    dx              ; save it
 35874 00004113 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ; set cursor position
 35875 00004115 8B16[5548]                      mov     dx,[bLastCol]   ; set correct row/col
 35876 00004119 F606[5748]01                    test    byte [bDisableUI],1
 35877 0000411E 740E                            jz	short show_onoff ; just show on/off
 35878 00004120 B200                            mov     dl,0            ;
 35879 00004122 CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35880 00004124 B8200A                          mov     ax,0A20h        ; write multiple spaces
 35881 00004127 B95000                          mov     cx,80           ; 80 of them, to be exact
 35882 0000412A CD10                            int     10h             ; to obliterate the status line
 35883 0000412C EB13                            jmp     short show_done ;
 35884                                  show_onoff: 
 35885 0000412E CD10                            int     10h
 35886                                  		; - VIDEO - WRITE CHARACTERS ONLY AT CURSOR POSITION
 35887                                  		; AL = character, BH = display page - alpha mode
 35888                                  		; BL = color of character (graphics mode, PCjr only)
 35889                                  		; CX = number of times to write character
 35890                                  
 35891 00004130 A0[124E]                        mov     al,[_$NO]	; assume OFF
 35892 00004133 803E[5B48]01                    cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1 ; is interactive mode on?
 35893 00004138 7503                            jne	short show_noton ; no
 35894 0000413A A0[0E4E]                        mov     al,[_$YES]	; yes
 35895                                  show_noton:                     ;
 35896 0000413D B40E                            mov     ah,0Eh          ; write TTY
 35897 0000413F CD10                            int     10h             ;
 35898                                  show_done:                      ;
 35899 00004141 5A                              pop     dx              ;
 35900 00004142 B402                            mov     ah,02h          ;
 35901 00004144 CD10                            int     10h             ; restore original cursor position
 35902 00004146 5B                              pop     bx              ;
 35903 00004147 C3                              retn			;
 35904                                  
 35905                                  ; 16/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35906                                  
 35907                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35908                                  ;
 35909                                  ;   skip_token: advances ES:SI/CX past the current token
 35910                                  ;
 35911                                  ;   INPUT
 35912                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35913                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35914                                  ;
 35915                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35916                                  ;       CF set if EOL/EOF hit
 35917                                  ;       AL == 1st char of delimiter
 35918                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the delimiter
 35919                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35920                                  ;
 35921                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35922                                  ;       AX
 35923                                  ;
 35924                                  ;   NOTES
 35925                                  ;       None
 35926                                  ;
 35927                                  ;   HISTORY
 35928                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35929                                  ;
 35930                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35931                                  
 35932                                  skip_token:
 35933 00004148 E85100                          call    get_char
 35934 0000414B 7210                            jc	short skip_token_done
 35935 0000414D E8B901                          call    any_delim
 35936 00004150 75F6                            jne	short skip_token
 35937                                  skip_check_eol:
 35938 00004152 3C0D                            cmp     al,cr ; 0Dh
 35939 00004154 7406                            je	short skip_token_eol
 35940 00004156 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 35941 00004158 7402                            je	short skip_token_eol
 35942 0000415A F8                              clc
 35943                                          ;jmp	short skip_token_done
 35944 0000415B C3                      	retn
 35945                                  skip_token_eol:
 35946 0000415C F9                              stc
 35947                                  skip_token_done:
 35948 0000415D C3                              retn
 35949                                  
 35950                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35951                                  ;
 35952                                  ;   skip_delim: advances ES:SI/CX past the current delimiter
 35953                                  ;
 35954                                  ;   INPUT
 35955                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35956                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35957                                  ;
 35958                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35959                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35960                                  ;       AL == 1st char of token
 35961                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past the token
 35962                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35963                                  ;    ES:BX -> new token (since ES:SI is already pointing 1 byte past token)
 35964                                  ;
 35965                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 35966                                  ;       AX
 35967                                  ;
 35968                                  ;   NOTES
 35969                                  ;       None
 35970                                  ;
 35971                                  ;   HISTORY
 35972                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 35973                                  ;
 35974                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35975                                  
 35976                                  skip_delim:	; returns carry set if eol/eof
 35977 0000415E E83B00                          call    get_char        ;
 35978 00004161 8D5CFF                          lea     bx,[si-1]       ; also returns BX -> next token
 35979 00004164 72F7                            jc	short skip_token_done ;
 35980 00004166 E8B001                          call    delim           ;
 35981 00004169 74F3                            je	short skip_delim ;
 35982 0000416B EBE5                            jmp	short skip_check_eol  ; 13/05/2019
 35983                                  
 35984                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35985                                  ;
 35986                                  ;   skip_opt_line: same as skip_line provided AL != LF
 35987                                  ;
 35988                                  ;   INPUT
 35989                                  ;       AL == last character read
 35990                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 35991                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 35992                                  ;
 35993                                  ;   OUTPUT
 35994                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 35995                                  ;       AL == 1st char of new line
 35996                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 35997                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 35998                                  ;
 35999                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36000                                  ;       AX
 36001                                  ;
 36002                                  ;   NOTES
 36003                                  ;       In other words, the purpose here is to skip to the next line,
 36004                                  ;       unless ES:SI is already sitting at the front of the next line (which
 36005                                  ;       it would be if the last character fetched -- AL -- was a linefeed)
 36006                                  ;
 36007                                  ;   HISTORY
 36008                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36009                                  ;
 36010                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36011                                  
 36012                                  skip_opt_line:
 36013 0000416D 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36014 0000416F 7409                            je	short skip_line_done
 36015                                       
 36016                                  	; fall into skip_line
 36017                                  
 36018                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36019                                  ;
 36020                                  ;   skip_line: skip to the next line
 36021                                  ;
 36022                                  ;   INPUT
 36023                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36024                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36025                                  ;
 36026                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36027                                  ;       CF set if EOF hit
 36028                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st char of new line
 36029                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36030                                  ;
 36031                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36032                                  ;       AX
 36033                                  ;
 36034                                  ;   NOTES
 36035                                  ;       None
 36036                                  ;
 36037                                  ;   HISTORY
 36038                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36039                                  ;
 36040                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36041                                  
 36042                                  skip_line:
 36043 00004171 E82800                          call    get_char
 36044 00004174 7204                            jc	short skip_line_done
 36045 00004176 3C0A                            cmp     al,lf ; 0Ah
 36046 00004178 75F7                            jne	short skip_line
 36047                                  skip_line_done:
 36048                                  num_done:	; 18/12/2022
 36049 0000417A C3                              retn
 36050                                  
 36051                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36052                                  ;
 36053                                  ;   get_number: return binary equivalent of numeric string
 36054                                  ;
 36055                                  ;   INPUT
 36056                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36057                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36058                                  ;
 36059                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36060                                  ;       AL == non-digit encountered
 36061                                  ;       BX == binary #
 36062                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past 1st non-digit
 36063                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36064                                  ;
 36065                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36066                                  ;       AX
 36067                                  ;
 36068                                  ;   NOTES
 36069                                  ;       None
 36070                                  ;
 36071                                  ;   HISTORY
 36072                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36073                                  ;
 36074                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36075                                  
 36076                                  ; 13/05/2019
 36077                                  
 36078                                  get_number:
 36079 0000417B 29DB                            sub     bx,bx           ; BX = result
 36080                                  num_loop:

 36096 00004198 01C3                            add     bx,ax           ;

 36100                                  ;num_done:
 36101                                          ;retn

 36103                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36104                                  ;
 36105                                  ;   get_char:  return next character, advance ES:SI, and decrement CX
 36106                                  ;
 36107                                  ;   INPUT
 36108                                  ;    ES:SI -> position in config.sys
 36109                                  ;       CX == remaining bytes in config.sys
 36110                                  ;
 36111                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36112                                  ;       AL == next character
 36113                                  ;    ES:SI -> just past next character
 36114                                  ;       CX == # bytes remaining from that point
 36115                                  ;
 36116                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36117                                  ;       AX
 36118                                  ;
 36119                                  ;   NOTES
 36120                                  ;       None
 36121                                  ;
 36122                                  ;   HISTORY
 36123                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36124                                  ;
 36125                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36126                                  
 36127                                  get_char:
 36128 0000419C 83E901                          sub     cx,1            ; use SUB to set carry,zero
 36129 0000419F 7205                            jb	short get_fail	; out of data
 36130                                          ;lods	byte ptr es:[si] ;
 36131 000041A1 26                      	es	
 36132 000041A2 AC                      	lodsb
 36133 000041A3 88C4                            mov     ah,al           ;
 36134 000041A5 C3                              retn			;
 36135                                  get_fail:                       ; restore CX to zero
 36136 000041A6 B90000                          mov     cx,0            ; leave carry set, zero not set
 36137                                  nearby_ret:
 36138 000041A9 C3                              retn

 36140                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36141                                  ;
 36142                                  ;   query_user: ask user whether to execute current config.sys command
 36143                                  ;
 36144                                  ;   INPUT
 36145                                  ;       AL == current command code
 36146                                  ;    ES:SI -> current command line in config.sys
 36147                                  ;    config_cmd == current command code, but with QUERY bit intact
 36148                                  ;                  (00h used to generate "Process AUTOEXEC.BAT" prompt)
 36149                                  ;
 36150                                  ;   OUTPUT
 36151                                  ;       CF set if command should be ignored (it is also REM'ed out)
 36152                                  ;
 36153                                  ;   OTHER REGS USED
 36154                                  ;       BX, CX, DX, DI
 36155                                  ;
 36156                                  ;   NOTES
 36157                                  ;       None
 36158                                  ;
 36159                                  ;   HISTORY
 36160                                  ;       Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 36161                                  ;
 36162                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36163                                  
 36164                                  	; 31/12/2022 - Retro UNIX 386 v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36165                                  	; (SYSINIT:4AE5h)
 36166                                  
 36167                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36168                                  query_user:
 36169 000041AA F606[5B48]04                    test    byte [bQueryOpt],4	; answer no to everything?
 36170                                  	; 01/01/2023
 36171 000041AF 7403                    	jz	short qu_1		;
 36172 000041B1 E9BA00                  	jmp	skip_all
 36173                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36174                                  	;;jmp	short skip_all		;
 36175                                  	;jnz	short skip_all
 36176                                  qu_1:
 36177 000041B4 F606[5B48]02            	test    byte [bQueryOpt],2	; answer yes to everything?

 36194                                  query_all:
 36195                                  
 36196                                  ;   Search for the command code (AL) in "comtab", and then print
 36197                                  ;   out the corresponding keyword, followed by the rest of the actual
 36198                                  ;   line pointed to by ES:SI
 36199                                  
 36200 000041CC 56                              push    si                      ; save pointer to rest of CONFIG.SYS line
 36201 000041CD BA[684E]                        mov     dx,_$AutoPrmpt    	;
 36202 000041D0 247F                            and     al,~CONFIG_OPTION_QUERY ; 7Fh
 36203 000041D2 7451                            jz	short generic_prompt	; config_cmd must have been 0
 36204                                  
 36205 000041D4 88C6                            mov     dh,al                   ; save config_cmd in DH
 36206 000041D6 29DB                            sub     bx,bx                   ;
 36207 000041D8 BF[A848]                        mov     di,comtab		;
 36208                                  find_match:                             ;
 36209 000041DB 8A1D                            mov     bl,[di]                 ; get size of current keyword
 36210 000041DD 08DB                            or      bl,bl                   ;
 36211 000041DF 7425                            jz	short line_print	; end of table
 36212 000041E1 47                              inc     di                      ;
 36213 000041E2 3A01                            cmp     al,[di+bx]              ; match?
 36214 000041E4 7405                            je	short cmd_match		; yes
 36215 000041E6 8D7901                          lea     di,[di+bx+1]            ; otherwise, skip this command code
 36216                                  	; 13/05/2019	
 36217 000041E9 EBF0                            jmp	short find_match	; loop
 36218                                  cmd_match:                              ;
 36219 000041EB 8A4DFF                          mov     cl,[di-1]               ;
 36220 000041EE B500                            mov	ch,0                    ;
 36221 000041F0 B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2
 36222                                  cmd_print:                              ;
 36223 000041F2 8A05                            mov     al,[di]                 ;
 36224 000041F4 47                              inc     di                      ;
 36225 000041F5 88C2                            mov     dl,al                   ;
 36226 000041F7 CD21                            int     21h                     ;
 36227 000041F9 E2F7                            loop    cmd_print               ;
 36228 000041FB B23D                            mov     dl,'='                  ;
 36229 000041FD 80FE56                          cmp     dh,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'    ; for SET commands, don't display a '='
 36230 00004200 7502                            jne	short cmd_notset	;
 36231 00004202 B220                            mov     dl,' '                  ;
 36232                                  cmd_notset:
 36233 00004204 CD21                            int     21h                     ; '=' looks funny on SET commands
 36234                                  line_print:                             ;
 36235                                  	;lods	byte ptr es:[si]        ;
 36236 00004206 26                              es
 36237 00004207 AC                      	lodsb
 36238 00004208 08C0                    	or      al,al                   ;
 36239 0000420A 7502                            jnz	short non_null		;
 36240 0000420C B020                            mov     al,' '                  ;
 36241                                  non_null:                               ;
 36242 0000420E 3C20                            cmp     al,' '                  ; control code?

 36244 00004212 7506                            jne	short non_space		;

 36246 00004218 7208                            jb	short prompt_user	;

 36249 0000421C B402                            mov     ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2	;

 36253 00004222 BA[064E]                        mov     dx,_$InterPrmpt		;
 36254                                  
 36255                                  generic_prompt:
 36256 00004225 E80104                          call    print                   ;
 36257                                  input_loop:                             ;
 36258 00004228 B400                            mov     ah,0                    ; read a key
 36259 0000422A CD16                            int     16h                     ;
 36260 0000422C 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; is it a function key?
 36261 0000422E 750F                            jnz	short not_func		; no
 36262 00004230 80FC3F                          cmp     ah,3Fh                  ; F5 function key?
 36263 00004233 75F3                            jne	short input_loop	; no

 36265 00004238 800E[5B48]04                    or      byte [bQueryOpt],4	; no more queries
 36266 0000423D EB21                            jmp     short legal_char        ;
 36267                                  not_func:

 36269 00004241 3A06[124E]                      cmp     al,[_$NO]		; verify character is legal
 36270 00004245 7419                            je	short legal_char	;

 36272 0000424B 7413                            je	short legal_char	;

 36275 00004254 3C1B                            cmp     al,1Bh                  ; Esc?

 36278 0000425D A0[0E4E]                        mov     al,[_$YES]

 36282

 36356                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36357                                  
 36358                                  ;   This function is very simple: it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 36359                                  ;   command-line for the shell; this (undocumented) switch disables
 36360                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 36361                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 36362                                  
 36363                                  disable_autoexec:
 36364                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 36365                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 36366                                  
 36367 000042A6 F606[5B48]04            	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 36368 000042AB 7443                    	jz	short disable_exit
 36369 000042AD F606[5148]01            	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 36370 000042B2 753C                    	jnz	short disable_exit
 36371 000042B4 800E[5148]01            	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 36372                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 36373 000042B9 810E[5B48]0201          	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 36374 000042BF BA4420                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 36375                                  dae_1:
 36376                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 36377 000042C2 A0[9047]                	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 36378 000042C5 08C0                            or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 36379 000042C7 7427                            jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 36380 000042C9 8A1E[9147]                      mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 36381 000042CD B700                            mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 36382 000042CF 89D9                            mov     cx,bx                   ;

 36384 000042D4 80FB7E                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 36385 000042D7 7717                            ja	short disable_exit	;
 36386 000042D9 881E[9147]                      mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 36387 000042DD 81C3[9247]                      add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 36388 000042E1 41                              inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 36389                                  disable_loop:                           ;

 36419                                  ; procedure : delim
 36420                                  ;
 36421                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36422                                  
 36423                                  ; 01/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36424                                  ; (SYSINIT:4C45h)
 36425                                  
 36426                                  ; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36427                                  ;%if 0
 36428                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36429                                  ;
 36430                                  any_delim:
 36431 00004309 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 36432 0000430B 7427                    	je	short delim_ret
 36433 0000430D 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 36434 0000430F 7423                    	je	short delim_ret
 36435 00004311 3C5B                    	cmp	al,'['
 36436 00004313 741F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36437 00004315 3C5D                    	cmp	al,']'
 36438 00004317 741B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36439                                  ;
 36440                                  ;;endif ;MULTI_CONFIG
 36441                                  ;%endif ; 02/11/2022
 36442                                  
 36443                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36444                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 36445                                  delim:
 36446 00004319 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 36447 0000431B 7417                    	je	short delim_ret
 36448                                  
 36449 0000431D 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 36450 0000431F 7413                    	je	short delim_ret
 36451                                  
 36452                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 36453 00004321 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 36454 00004323 740F                    	je	short delim_ret
 36455 00004325 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 36456 00004327 740B                    	je	short delim_ret
 36457 00004329 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 36458 0000432B 7407                    	je	short delim_ret
 36459 0000432D 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 36460 0000432F 7403                    	je	short delim_ret
 36461 00004331 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 36462                                  
 36463                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36464                                  
 36465                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.2
 36466                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36467                                  ;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 36468 00004333 F8                      	clc
 36469                                  ;endif
 36470                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36471                                  delim_ret:
 36472                                  	; 04/01/2023
 36473                                  	; cf = 0
 36474 00004334 C3                      	retn

 36494                                  ; 
 36495                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 36496                                  ;
 36497                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36498                                  
 36499                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 36500                                  
 36501                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36502                                  	; (SYSINIT:4C7Eh)
 36503                                  mapcase:
 36504 00004342 51                      	push	cx
 36505 00004343 56                      	push	si
 36506 00004344 1E                      	push	ds
 36507                                  
 36508 00004345 06                      	push	es
 36509 00004346 1F                      	pop	ds
 36510                                  
 36511                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36512                                  
 36513                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 36514                                  
 36515                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36516 00004347 88C3                    	mov	bl,al			; same cmd code this line
 36517                                  ;else
 36518                                  ;	xor	si,si
 36519                                  ;endif
 36520                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36521                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 36522                                  	;xor	si, si
 36523                                  
 36524                                  convloop:
 36525 00004349 AC                      	lodsb
 36526 0000434A 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 36527 0000434C 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 36528 0000434E 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 36529 00004350 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 36530 00004352 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 36531 00004354 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 36532                                  noconv:
 36533                                  
 36534                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36535                                  
 36536                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS 4.2
 36537                                  ;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 36538                                  
 36539                                  ;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 36540                                  ;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 36541                                  ;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 36542                                  ;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 36543                                  ;
 36544 00004357 80FB56                  	cmp	bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 36545 0000435A 7504                    	jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 36546 0000435C 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 36547 0000435E 740A                    	je	short convdone		; yes
 36548                                  check_eol:
 36549 00004360 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr
 36550 00004362 7406                    	je	short convdone
 36551 00004364 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf
 36552 00004366 7402                    	je	short convdone
 36553                                  ;endif
 36554                                  	; 02/11/2022
 36555 00004368 E2DF                    	loop	convloop
 36556                                  convdone:
 36557 0000436A 1F                      	pop	ds
 36558 0000436B 5E                      	pop	si
 36559 0000436C 59                      	pop	cx
 36560 0000436D C3                      	retn

 36563                                  ;
 36564                                  ; procedure : round
 36565                                  ;
 36566                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 36567                                  ; perform bounds check.
 36568                                  ;
 36569                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36570                                  
 36571                                  round:
 36572 0000436E 50                      	push	ax
 36573 0000436F 2EA1[6003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 36574                                  
 36575 00004373 E8F3CD                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 36576                                  
 36577 00004376 2E0106[6203]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 36578 0000437B 2EC706[6003]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 36579 00004382 2EA1[6203]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 36580 00004386 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 36581 0000438B 7322                    	jae	short mem_err

 36589 000043A0 48                      	dec	ax
 36590                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 36591 000043A1 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 36592 000043A5 2E8026[E414]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 36593 000043AB 5E                      	pop	si
 36594 000043AC 07                      	pop	es
 36595                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 36596 000043AD 58                      	pop	ax

 36601 000043AE C3                      	retn

 36641                                  
 36642                                  todigit:
 36643 000043DD 2C30                    	sub	al,'0'
 36644                                  	;jb	short notdig  ; 02/11/2022
 36645                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36646 000043DF 7203                    	jb	short notdig2
 36647                                  	;cmp	al,9
 36648                                  	;ja	short notdig
 36649                                  	;clc
 36650                                  	;retn
 36651                                  	; 12/12/2022

 36655                                  	;stc

 36659                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36660                                  ;
 36661                                  ; procedure : getnum
 36662                                  ;
 36663                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 36664                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 36665                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 36666                                  ;
 36667                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36668                                  
 36669                                  getnum:
 36670 000043E5 53                      	push	bx
 36671 000043E6 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 36672                                  b2:
 36673 000043E8 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 36674 000043EB 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 36675                                  
 36676 000043ED 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 36677 000043EE 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 36678                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 36679                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36680 000043EF B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 36681 000043F1 F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 36682 000043F3 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 36683 000043F4 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 36684 000043F6 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 36685 000043F9 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 36686                                  
 36687 000043FB 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 36688                                  
 36689 000043FC E8BEE5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 36690 000043FF 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 36691 00004401 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 36692 00004403 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 36693 00004405 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 36694 00004407 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 36695 00004409 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 36696 0000440B 7417                    	je	short b15
 36697 0000440D 2E3A06[AC02]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 36698 00004412 7410                    	je	short b15
 36699 00004414 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 36700                                  	; 12/12/2022
 36701                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36702                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 36703                                  	;nop
 36704 00004416 740C                    	je	short b15
 36705 00004418 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 36706 0000441A 7408                    	je	short b15
 36707 0000441C 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 36708 0000441E 7404                    	je	short b15
 36709 00004420 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 36710 00004422 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 36711                                  b15:
 36712 00004424 2EFF06[5403]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 36713 00004429 2EFF0E[5803]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 36714                                  b1:
 36715 0000442E 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 36716 00004430 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 36717 00004432 5B                      	pop	bx
 36718 00004433 C3                      	retn
 36719                                  badnum:
 36720                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 36721                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 36722 00004434 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 36723                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 36724 00004436 2EA2[AC02]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 36725 0000443A 5B                      	pop	bx
 36726 0000443B F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 36727 0000443C C3                      	retn
 36728                                  
 36729                                  ;****************************************************************************
 36730                                  
 36731                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 36732                                  
 36733                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36734                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 36735                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 36736                                  ;	si = 0
 36737                                  ;	ax = country id
 36738                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 36739                                  ;	bx = file handle
 36740                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 36741                                  ;
 36742                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 36743                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 36744                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 36745                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 36746                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36747                                  
 36748                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36749                                  	; (SYSINIT:4D83h)
 36750                                  
 36751 0000443D 57                      	push	di
 36752 0000443E 50                      	push	ax
 36753 0000443F 52                      	push	dx
 36754                                  
 36755 00004440 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 36756 00004442 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 36757 00004444 B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 36758 00004447 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 36759 0000444A 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36760                                  
 36761 0000444C 06                      	push	es
 36762 0000444D 56                      	push	si
 36763                                  
 36764 0000444E 0E                      	push	cs
 36765 0000444F 07                      	pop	es
 36766                                  
 36767 00004450 BF[F646]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 36768 00004453 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 36769 00004456 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 36770                                  
 36771 00004458 5E                      	pop	si
 36772 00004459 07                      	pop	es
 36773 0000445A 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 36774                                  
 36775 0000445C 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 36776 0000445F 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 36777 00004462 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 36778                                  
 36779 00004464 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 36780 00004465 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 36781 00004467 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 36782 0000446A B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 36783 0000446D E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 36784 00004470 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36785                                  
 36786 00004472 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 36787 00004474 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 36788 00004478 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36789                                  
 36790 0000447A 46                      	inc	si
 36791 0000447B 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 36792 0000447C 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 36793 0000447D 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 36794 0000447E 5F                      	pop	di
 36795                                  
 36796                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 36797 0000447F 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 36798 00004482 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 36799                                  
 36800 00004484 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 36801 00004487 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 36802 00004489 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 36803 0000448C 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 36804                                  
 36805                                  setdoscntry_next:
 36806 0000448E 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 36807 00004490 46                      	inc	si
 36808 00004491 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 36809 00004492 E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 36810                                  
 36811 00004494 B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 36812                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 36813 00004497 F9                      	stc
 36814 00004498 C3                      	retn
 36815                                  
 36816                                  setdosdata_fail:
 36817 00004499 5E                      	pop	si
 36818 0000449A 59                      	pop	cx
 36819 0000449B 5F                      	pop	di
 36820 0000449C EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 36821                                  
 36822                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 36823 0000449E 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 36824                                  
 36825                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 36826 000044A1 2E8916[FE46]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 36827 000044A6 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 36828 000044A9 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 36829 000044AC B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 36830 000044AF E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 36831 000044B2 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 36832                                  
 36833 000044B4 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the number of entries to handle.
 36834 000044B6 46                      	inc	si
 36835 000044B7 46                      	inc	si			;si -> first entry
 36836                                  
 36837                                  setdoscntry_data:
 36838 000044B8 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36839 000044B9 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left
 36840 000044BA 56                      	push	si			;si -> current entry in control buffer
 36841

 36843 000044BE E8AA00                  	call	getcountrydestination	;get the address of destination in es:di
 36844 000044C1 727D                    	jc	short setdoscntry_data_next ;no matching data entry id in dos
 36845                                  
 36846 000044C3 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data
 36847 000044C6 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36848 000044C9 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36849 000044CC F9                      	stc
 36850 000044CD CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36851 000044CF 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36852                                  
 36853 000044D1 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36854 000044D4 B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to
 36855 000044D7 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;look at the length of the data in the file.
 36856 000044D9 F9                      	stc
 36857 000044DA CD21                    	int	21h			;read the country.sys data
 36858 000044DC 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36859                                  
 36860 000044DE 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36861 000044E0 75B7                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail ; 13/05/2019
 36862                                  
 36863 000044E2 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]		;get offset of data again.
 36864 000044E5 8B4C06                  	mov	cx,[si+6]
 36865 000044E8 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36866 000044EB F9                      	stc
 36867 000044EC CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer back again
 36868 000044EE 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36869                                  
 36870 000044F0 56                      	push	si
 36871 000044F1 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;get length of the data from the file
 36872 000044F4 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]
 36873 000044F6 5E                      	pop	si
 36874 000044F7 BA0002                  	mov	dx,512			;start of data buffer
 36875 000044FA 83C10A                  	add	cx,10			;signature + a word for the length itself
 36876 000044FD B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read the data from the file.
 36877 000044FF F9                      	stc
 36878 00004500 CD21                    	int	21h
 36879 00004502 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36880                                  
 36881 00004504 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36882 00004506 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 36883                                  
 36884 00004508 8A4402                  	mov	al,[si+2]		;save data id for future use.
 36885 0000450B BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 36886 0000450E 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 36887 00004510 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 36888 00004511 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 36889 00004512 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 36890 00004516 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 36891                                  
 36892                                  	;if	bugfix
 36893 00004518 E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 36894                                  	;endif
 36895                                  
 36896 0000451B 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 36897 0000451D 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 36898                                  
 36899 0000451F 26FF7518                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen]  
 36900                                  	;push	word [es:di+24]		;cannot destroy ccmono_ptr address. save them.
 36901 00004523 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2] 
 36902                                  	;push	word [es:di+26]		;at this time di -> cccountryinfolen
 36903                                  	
 36904 00004527 57                      	push	di			;save di
 36905                                  
 36906 00004528 50                      	push	ax
 36907 00004529 2EA1[FE46]              	mov	ax,[cs:cntrycodepage_id] ;do not use the code page info in country_info
 36908 0000452D 894404                  	mov	[si+4],ax		;use the saved one for this !!!!
 36909 00004530 58                      	pop	ax
 36910                                  
 36911                                  setdoscntry_mov:

 36913 00004533 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo	;was the ccmono_ptr saved?

 36915

 36918                                  	;pop	word [es:di+26]		;restore
 36919 0000453C 268F4518                	pop	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen] 
 36920                                  	;pop	word [es:di+24]
 36921                                  
 36922                                  setdoscntry_data_next:
 36923 00004540 5E                      	pop	si			;restore control buffer pointer
 36924 00004541 59                      	pop	cx			;restore # of entries left

 36926 00004543 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;try to get the next entry
 36927 00004545 46                      	inc	si
 36928 00004546 46                      	inc	si			;take a word of entry length itself
 36929 00004547 49                      	dec	cx
 36930 00004548 83F900                  	cmp	cx,0
 36931 0000454B 741D                    	je	short setdoscntry_ok
 36932 0000454D E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data
 36933                                  
 36934                                  	; 18/12/2022
 36935                                  ;setdoscntry_ok:
 36936                                  	;retn
 36937

 36940                                  	;if	bugfix
 36941                                  
 36942                                  setdbcs_before_copy:

 36945 00004554 26833D00                	cmp	word [es:di],0		; zero byte data block?
 36946 00004558 7410                    	je	short sdbcsbc		; jump if so
 36947                                  
 36948 0000455A 57                      	push	di
 36949 0000455B 50                      	push	ax
 36950 0000455C 51                      	push	cx

 36956 00004568 58                      	pop	ax

 36962                                  	;endif

 36965                                  
 36966                                  getcountrydestination:
 36967                                  
 36968                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36969                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36970                                  ;
 36971                                  ;input: al - data id
 36972                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36973                                  ;on return:
 36974                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36975                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36976                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 36977                                  
 36978                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 36979                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EB2h)
 36980                                  
 36981 0000456B 51                      	push	cx
 36982                                  	;add	di,74
 36983 0000456C 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36984                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.
 36985 0000456F 268B0D                  	mov	cx,[es:di]		;get the number of entries
 36986 00004572 47                      	inc	di
 36987 00004573 47                      	inc	di			;si -> the first start entry id
 36988                                  
 36989                                  getcntrydest:
 36990 00004574 263805                  	cmp	byte [es:di],al
 36991 00004577 7413                    	je	short getcntrydest_ok
 36992 00004579 26803D01                	cmp	byte [es:di],SetCountryInfo ;was it setcountryinfo entry?
 36993 0000457D 7405                    	je	short getcntrydest_1
 36994                                  
 36995 0000457F 83C705                  	add	di,5			;next data id
 36996 00004582 EB03                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_loop
 36997                                  
 36998                                  getcntrydest_1:
 36999                                  	;add	di,41
 37000 00004584 83C729                  	add	di,NEW_COUNTRY_SIZE+3	;next data id
 37001                                  getcntrydest_loop:
 37002 00004587 E2EB                    	loop	getcntrydest
 37003 00004589 F9                      	stc
 37004 0000458A EB0B                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37005                                  
 37006                                  getcntrydest_ok:
 37007 0000458C 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;select country info?
 37008 0000458E 7503                    	jne	short getcntrydest_ok1
 37009                                  
 37010 00004590 47                      	inc	di			;now di -> cccountryinfolen
 37011 00004591 EB04                    	jmp	short getcntrydest_exit
 37012                                  
 37013                                  getcntrydest_ok1:
 37014 00004593 26C47D01                	les	di,[es:di+1]		;get the destination in es:di
 37015                                  
 37016                                  getcntrydest_exit:
 37017 00004597 59                      	pop	cx
 37018 00004598 C3                      	retn
 37019                                  
 37020                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37021                                  
 37022                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 37023                                  
 37024                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37025                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 37026                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 37027                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 37028                                  ;
 37029                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 37030                                  ;	 be moved.
 37031                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 37032                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 37033                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 37034                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 37035                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 37036                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 37037                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37038                                  
 37039 00004599 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 37040 0000459A B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 37041 0000459D F9                      	stc
 37042 0000459E CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 37043 000045A0 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 37044 000045A1 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 37045                                  
 37046 000045A3 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 37047 000045A5 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 37048 000045A7 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 37049 000045A9 F9                      	stc
 37050 000045AA CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 37051                                  ricb_exit:
 37052 000045AC C3                      	retn
 37053                                  
 37054                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37055                                  
 37056                                  set_country_path:
 37057                                  
 37058                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37059                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 37060                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 37061                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 37062                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 37063                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 37064                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 37065                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37066                                  
 37067                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2 (Modified MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS)
 37068                                  	; (SYSINIT:4EF4h)
 37069                                  
 37070 000045AD 56                      	push	si
 37071                                  
 37072 000045AE 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37073 000045AF 06                      	push	es
 37074 000045B0 1F                      	pop	ds
 37075 000045B1 07                      	pop	es			;now ds -> confbot, es -> sysinitseg
 37076                                  
 37077 000045B2 E82C00                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?
 37078 000045B5 7206                    	jc	short scp_default_drv 	;no, use current default drive.
 37079                                  
 37080 000045B7 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 37081 000045B9 46                      	inc	si
 37082 000045BA 46                      	inc	si			;si -> next char after ":"
 37083 000045BB EB06                    	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 37084                                  
 37085                                  scp_default_drv:
 37086 000045BD B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 37087 000045BF CD21                    	int	21h
 37088 000045C1 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 37089                                  
 37090                                  scp_setdrv:
 37091 000045C3 2EA2[B346]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 37092 000045C7 BF[B646]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 37093 000045CA 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 37094 000045CC 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 37095 000045CE 7404                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 37096                                  
 37097 000045D0 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 37098                                  	;je	short scp_root_dir
 37099                                  	;jmp	short scp_path
 37100                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37101 000045D2 7501                    	jne	short scp_path
 37102                                  
 37103                                  scp_root_dir:
 37104 000045D4 4F                      	dec	di			;di -> cntry_root
 37105                                  scp_path:
 37106 000045D5 E81D00                  	call	move_asciiz		;copy it
 37107                                  
 37108 000045D8 BF[B346]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 37109                                  scpath_exit:
 37110                                  
 37111 000045DB 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 37112 000045DC 06                      	push	es
 37113 000045DD 1F                      	pop	ds
 37114 000045DE 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 37115                                  
 37116 000045DF 5E                      	pop	si
 37117 000045E0 C3                      	retn
 37118                                  
 37119                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37120                                  
 37121                                  chk_drive_letter:
 37122                                  
 37123                                  ;check if ds:[si] is a drive letter followed by ":".
 37124                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 37125                                  ;carry set if not.
 37126                                  
 37127                                  	; 04/01/2023 - Retrodos v4.2
 37128                                  
 37129 000045E1 50                      	push	ax
 37130 000045E2 803C41                  	cmp	byte [si],"A"
 37131                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
 37132 000045E5 720C                    	jb	short cdletter_exit
 37133 000045E7 803C5A                  	cmp	byte [si],"Z"
 37134 000045EA 7706                    	ja	short cdletter_no
 37135 000045EC 807C013A                	cmp	byte [si+1],":"
 37136                                  	;jne	short cdletter_no
 37137                                  	;jmp	short cdletter_exit
 37138                                  	; 04/01/2023
 37139 000045F0 7401                    	je	short cdletter_exit
 37140                                  
 37141                                  cdletter_no:
 37142 000045F2 F9                      	stc
 37143                                  cdletter_exit:
 37144 000045F3 58                      	pop	ax
 37145 000045F4 C3                      	retn
 37146                                  
 37147                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37148                                  
 37149                                  move_asciiz:
 37150                                  
 37151                                  ;in: ds:si -> source es:di -> target
 37152                                  ;out: copy the string until 0.
 37153                                  ;assumes there exists a 0.
 37154                                  
 37155                                  masciiz_loop:
 37156 000045F5 A4                      	movsb
 37157 000045F6 807CFF00                	cmp	byte [si-1],0	; was it 0?
 37158 000045FA 75F9                    	jne	short masciiz_loop
 37159 000045FC C3                      	retn
 37160                                  
 37161                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37162                                  
 37163                                  ;	ds:dx points to string to output (asciz)
 37164                                  ;
 37165                                  ;	prints <badld_pre> <string> <badld_post>
 37166                                  
 37167                                  badfil:
 37168 000045FD 0E                      	push	cs
 37169 000045FE 07                      	pop	es
 37170                                  
 37171 000045FF 89D6                    	mov	si,dx
 37172                                  badload:
 37173 00004601 BA[B94B]                	mov	dx,badld_pre	; want to print config error
 37174 00004604 BB[764B]                	mov	bx,crlfm
 37175                                  prnerr:
 37176 00004607 0E                      	push	cs
 37177 00004608 1F                      	pop	ds ; *
 37178 00004609 E81D00                  	call	print
 37179                                  prn1:
 37180 0000460C 268A14                  	mov	dl,[es:si]
 37181 0000460F 08D2                    	or	dl,dl
 37182 00004611 7407                    	jz	short prn2
 37183 00004613 B402                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_OUTPUT ; 2 
 37184 00004615 CD21                    	int	21h
 37185 00004617 46                      	inc	si
 37186 00004618 EBF2                    	jmp	short prn1
 37187                                  prn2:
 37188 0000461A 89DA                    	mov	dx,bx
 37189 0000461C E80A00                  	call	print
 37190                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37191                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 37192 0000461F 803E[5303]01            	cmp	byte [donotshownum],1
 37193                                  				; suppress line number when handling command.com
 37194                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:donotshownum],1 
 37195 00004624 7407                    	je	short prnexit
 37196                                  	
 37197                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37198                                  	;call	error_line
 37199 00004626 E9ABE3                  	jmp	error_line
 37200                                  ;prnexit:
 37201                                  	;retn
 37202                                  
 37203                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 37204                                  
 37205                                  print:
 37206 00004629 B409                    	mov	ah,STD_CON_STRING_OUTPUT ; 9
 37207 0000462B CD21                    	int	21h
 37208                                  prnexit:	; 18/12/2022
 37209 0000462D C3                      	retn
 37210

 37213                                  ;  open device pointed to by dx, al has access code
 37214                                  ;   if unable to open do a device open null device instead
 37215

 37217                                  	; (SYSINIT:3764h)
 37218                                  open_dev:

 37220 00004631 7309                    	jnc	short open_dev3
 37221                                  
 37222                                  open_dev1:
 37223 00004633 BA[9746]                	mov	dx,nuldev
 37224                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37225                                  	;call	open_file
 37226                                  ;of_retn:
 37227                                  	;retn
 37228                                  	; 18/12/2022
 37229                                  	;jmp	short open_file
 37230                                  open_file:
 37231 00004636 B43D                    	mov	ah,OPEN	; 3Dh
 37232 00004638 F9                      	stc
 37233 00004639 CD21                    	int	21h
 37234                                  of_retn:	; 18/12/2022
 37235 0000463B C3                      	retn
 37236                                  
 37237                                  open_dev3:
 37238 0000463C 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; handle from open to bx
 37239                                  	;;xor	ax,ax			; get device info
 37240                                  	;;mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 37241                                  	;mov	ax,(IOCTL<<8) ; 13/05/2019
 37242                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 37243                                  	;xor	ax,ax
 37244                                  	;mov	ah,44h	; IOCTL
 37245                                  	; 11/12/2022
 37246 0000463E B80044                  	mov	ax,4400h ; IOCTL<<8 
 37247                                  
 37248 00004641 CD21                    	int	21h
 37249                                  
 37250 00004643 F6C280                  	test	dl,10000000b ; 80h
 37251 00004646 75F3                    	jnz	short of_retn
 37252                                  
 37253 00004648 B43E                    	mov	ah,CLOSE ; 3Eh
 37254 0000464A CD21                    	int	21h
 37255 0000464C EBE5                    	jmp	short open_dev1
 37256
